movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I should have known that you would be here...Professor McGonagall.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Good evening, Professor Dumbledore. Are the rumours true, Albus?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I'm afraid so, Professor. The good, and the bad.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: And the boy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hagrid is bringing him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Do you think it wise to trust Hagrid with something as important as this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ah, Professor, I would trust Hagrid with my life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Professor Dumbledore, Sir. Professor McGonagall.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No problems, I trust, Hagrid?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, sir. Little tyke fell asleep just as we were flying over Bristol. Heh. Try not to wake him. There you go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Albus, do you really think it's safe, leaving him with these people? I've watched them all day. They're the worst sort of Muggles imaginable. They really are...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: The only family he has.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: This boy will be famous. There won't be a child in our world who doesn't know his name.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Exactly. He's better off growing up away from all that. Until he is ready.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: There, there, Hagrid. It's not really goodbye, after all.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Good luck...Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Up. Get up.  Now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Wake up, cousin! We're going to the zoo!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, here he comes, the birthday boy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Happy birthday, son.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Why don't you just cook the breakfast, and try not to burn anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yes, Aunt Petunia.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I want everything to be perfect for my Dudley's special day.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hurry up! Bring my coffee, boy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yes, Uncle Vernon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Aren't they wonderful, darling?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: How many are there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Thirty-six. Counted 'em myself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Thirty-six?! But last year last year I had thirty-seven!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Err yes, well, some of them are quite a bit bigger than last year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I don't care how big they are!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, now, now, now. This is what we're going to do, is that when we go out, we're going to buy you two new presents! How's that, pumpkin?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: This will be a lovely day at the zoo. I'm really looking forward to it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I'm warning you now, boy. Any funny business, any at all, and you won't have any meals for a week. Get in.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Make it move.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Move!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: MOVE!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He's asleep!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He's boring.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Sorry about him. He doesn't understand what it's like, lying there day after day, having people press their ugly faces in on you.  Can you...hear me?  It's just...I've never talked to a snake before. Do you...I mean...do you talk to people often?  You're from Burma, aren't you? Was it nice there, do you miss your family?  I see. That's me as well. I never knew my parents, either.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Mummy, dad, come here! You won't believe what this snake is doing!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Whoa! Ahh! Ahh!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Anytime.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: SNAKE!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Mum, mummy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: AHH!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Mum, help! Help me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: My darling boy! How did you get in there?! How did you get in there? Dursley, oh, Dursley!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's all right. It's all right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ow!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What happened?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I swear I don't know!  One minute, the glass was there and then it was gone! It was like magic!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: There's no such thing as magic!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Awww, smile.  Vernon, just look at him. I can't believe it. In just a week you'll be off to Smeltings.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Caveat Smeltona. Proudest moment of my life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Will I have to wear that, too?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What, you? Go to Smeltings?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ha!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, don't be so stupid, you're going to the state school where you belong.  And this is what you're gonna be wearing when I've finished dyeing it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But that's Dudley's old uniform. It'll fit me like bits of old Elephant skin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It'll fit you well enough. Go get the post.  Go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, Marge is ill! Ate a funny whelk.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Dad! Look! Harry's got a letter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hey, give it back! It's mine!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yours? Who'd be writing to you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No more mail through this letterbox.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Have a lovely day at the office, dear.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Shoo! Go on!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Fine day Sunday. In my opinion, best day of the week. Why is that, Dudley?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Because there's no post on Sunday?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ah, right you are, Harry. No post on Sunday. Ha! No blasted letters today. No, sir. Not one single bloody letter, not one.  No, sir, not one blasted, miserable-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: AHH! Make it stop! Please make it stop!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Go away, ahh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What is it? Please tell me what's happening!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Give me that! Give me that letter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Get off! Ahh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ahh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: They're my letters! Let go of me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: That's it! We're going away! Far away! Where they can't find us!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Daddy's gone mad, hasn't he?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Make a wish, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Who's there? Ahh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Sorry 'bout that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I demand that you leave at once, sir! You are breaking and entering!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Dry up, Dursley, you great prune.  Boy, I haven't seen you since you was a baby, Harry, but you're a bit more along than I would have expected. Particularly 'round the middle!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I-I-I'm not Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I-I am.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, well, of course you are! Got something for ya. 'Fraid I might have sat on it at some point! I imagine that it'll taste fine just the same. Ahh. Baked it myself.  Words and all. Heh.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Thank you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's not every day that your young man turns eleven, now is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Excuse me, who are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Rubeus Hagrid. Keeper of keys and grounds at Hogwarts. Course, you'll know all about Hogwarts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Sorry, no.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No? Blimey, Harry, didn't you ever wonder where your mum and dad learned it all?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Learned what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You're a wizard, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I-I'm a what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: A wizard. And a thumping good one at that, I'd wager. Once you train up a little.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, you've made a mistake. I can't be...a-a wizard. I mean, I'm just... Harry. Just Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Well, just Harry. Did you ever make anything happen? Anything you couldn't explain when you were angry or scared?  Ah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Dear, Mr. Potter. We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts' School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He'll not be going! We swore when we took him in, we'd put a stop to this rubbish!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You knew? You knew all along and you never told me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Of course we knew. How could you not be? My perfect sister being who she was. Oh, my mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter. We have a witch in the family. Isn't it wonderful? I was the only one to see her for what she was. A freak! And then she met that Potter, and then she had you, and I knew you'd be just the same, just as strange, just as ... abnormal. And then, if you please, she went and got herself blown up. And we got landed with you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Blown up? You told me my parents died in a car crash!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: A car crash? A car crash kill James and Lily Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: We had to tell him something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's an outrage! It's a scandal!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He'll not be going!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, and I suppose a great Muggle like yourself's going to stop him, are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Muggle?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Non magic folk.  This boy's had his name down ever since he was born!  He's going to the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world, and he'll be under the finest headmaster that Hogwarts has ever seen: Albus Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I will not pay for some crackpot old fool to teach him magic tricks!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Never, insult Albus Dumbledore, in front of me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ahh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, um, I'd appreciate if you didn't tell anyone at Hogwarts about that. Strictly speaking, I'm not allowed to do magic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Okay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ooh, we're a bit behind schedule. Best be off.  Unless you'd rather stay, of course. Hmm?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: First year students will require: three sets of work robes, one wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Essential bit of equipment, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: One pair of dragon-hide gloves.  Hagrid, do they mean for a real dragon?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Well, they don't mean for a penguin, do they? Heh. Crikey, but not a dragon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But you like a dragon?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Fast and misunderstood beasts, Harry. Fast and misunderstood.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: All students must be equipped with...one standard size two pewter cauldron and may bring if they desire either an owl, a cat or a toad. Could we find all this in London?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: If you know where to go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ah, Hagrid! The usual, I presume?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No thanks, Tom. I'm on official Hogwarts business today. Just helping young Harry here buy his school supplies.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Bless my soul. It's Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Welcome back, Mr. Potter, welcome back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Doris Crockford, Mr. Potter. I can't believe I'm meeting you at last.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Harry P-potter. C-can't tell you how pleased I am to meet you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hello, Professor. I didn't see you there. Harry, this is Professor Quirrell. He'll be your Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, nice to meet you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: F-fearfully fascinating subject. N-not that you need it, e-eh, Potter? Heheh.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yes, well, must be going now. Lots to buy. Heh.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Goodbye.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: See, Harry, you're famous!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But why am I famous, Hagrid? All those people back there, how is it they know who I am?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I'm not exactly sure I'm the right person to tell you that, Harry.  Welcome, Harry, to Diagon Alley.  Here's where you'll get your quills and ink, and over there all your bits and bobs for doing your wizardry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's a world class racing broom. Look at it, it's the new Nimbus 2000! It's the fastest model yet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But, Hagrid, how am I to pay for all this? I haven't any money.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Well, there's your money, Harry.  Gringotts, the Wizard Bank. T'aint no place safer, 'cept perhaps Hogwarts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Uh, Hagrid, what exactly are these things?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: They're goblins, Harry. Clever as they come goblins, but not the most friendly of beasts. Best stick close to me.  Mr. Harry Potter wishes to make a withdrawal.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: And does Mr. Harry Potter have his key?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh. Wait a minute. Got it here somewhere. Hah. There's the little devil.  Oh, and there's something else as well.  Professor Dumbledore gave me this.  It's about you-know-what in vault you-know-which.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Very well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Vault 687. Lamp, please.  Key please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Didn't think your mum and dad would leave you with nothing now, did ya?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Vault 713.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What's in there, Hagrid?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Can't tell you, Harry. It's Hogwarts business. Very secret.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Stand back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Best not mention this to anyone, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I still need...a wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: A wand? Well, you'll want Ollivanders.  No place better. Run along there, but wait. I just got one more thing I got to do. Won't be long.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hello? Hello?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I wondered when I'd be seeing you, Mr. Potter. It seems only yesterday that your mother and father were in here buying their first wands.  Ah. Here we are.  Well, give it a wave.  Apparently not.  Perhaps this.  No, no, definitely not! No matter...  I wonder.  Curious, very curious.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Sorry, but what's curious?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I remember every wand I've ever sold, Mr. Potter. It just so happens that the phoenix, whose tail feather resides in your wand gave one other feather, just one. It is curious that you should be destined for this wand when its brother gave you that scar.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: And...who owned that wand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, we do not speak his name. The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. It's not always clear why, but I think it is clear that we can expect great things from you. After all, He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named did great things...terrible, yes, but great.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Harry! Harry! Happy birthday!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Wow.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You all right, Harry? You seem very quiet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He killed my parents, didn't he? The one who gave me this. You know, Hagrid, I know you do.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: First, and understand this, Harry, 'cause it's very important. Not all wizards are good. Some of them go bad. A few years ago, there was one wizard who went as bad as you can go. And his name was V-...his name was V-...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Maybe if you wrote it down?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, I can't spell it. All right.  Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Voldemort?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Shh!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It was dark times, Harry, dark times.  Voldemort started to gather some followers, brought 'em over to the dark side. Anyone that stood up to him ended up dead. Your parents fought against him, but nobody lived once he decided to kill 'em.  Nobody...not one. Except you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Me? Voldemort tried to kill...me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yes. That ain't no ordinary cut on your forehead, Harry. A mark like that only comes from being touched by a curse...and an evil curse at that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What happened to...to You-Know-Who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Well, some say he died. Codswallop in my opinion. Nope, I reckon he's out there, still, too tired to go on. But one thing's absolutely certain. Something about you stumped him that night. That's why you're famous. That's why everybody knows your name. You're the boy who lived.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What're you looking at?  Blimey, is that the time? Sorry, Harry, I'm gonna have to leave you. Dumbledore'll be wanting his- well, he'll be wanting to see me. Now, uh, your train leaves in 10 minutes. Here's your ticket.  Stick to it, Harry that's very important. Stick to your ticket.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Platform 9&ѕ? But, Hagrid, there must be a mistake. This says Platform 9&ѕ. There's no such thing...is there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Excuse me, excuse me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Right on your left, ma'am.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Excuse me, sir. Can you tell me where I might find Platform 9&ѕ?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: 9&ѕ? Think you're being funny, do ya?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's the same year after year. Always packed with Muggles, of course.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Muggles?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Come on. Platform 9&ѕ this way! All right, Percy, you first.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Fred, you next.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He's not Fred, I am!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Honestly, woman, you call yourself our mother.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, I'm sorry, George.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I'm only joking. I am Fred.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Excuse me! C-could you tell me how to-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: How to get on the platform? Yes, not to worry, dear. It's Ron's first time to Hogwarts as well.  Now, all you've got to do is walk straight at the wall between platforms 9 and 10. Best do it at a bit of a run if you're nervous.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Good luck.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Excuse me, do you mind? Everywhere else is full.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, not at all.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I'm Ron, by the way. Ron Weasley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I'm Harry. Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: So-so it's true? I mean, do you really have the...the...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: The what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Scar...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Wicked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Anything off the trolley, dears?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, thanks, I'm all set.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: We'll take the lot!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Whoa!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Bertie Bott's Every Flavour Beans?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: They mean every flavour! There's chocolate and peppermint, and there's also spinach, liver and tripe. George sweared he got a bogey-flavoured one once!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: These aren't real chocolate frogs, are they?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's just a spell. Besides, it's the cards you want. Each pack's got a famous witch or wizard. I got about 500 meself.  Watch it!  Oh, that's rotten luck. They've only got one good jump in them to begin with.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I got Dumbledore!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I got about 6 of him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hey, he's gone!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Well, you can't expect him to hang around all day, can you?  This is Scabbers, by the way, pathetic, isn't he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: A little.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Fred gave me a spell as to turn him yellow. Want to see?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yeah!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ahem. Sun-

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Has anyone seen a toad? A boy named Neville's lost one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, are you doing magic? Let's see then.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: That thing has a name?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Sunshine, daises, butter mellow, turn this stupid fat rat yellow!

Any rule breaking, and you will lose points. At the end of the year, the house with the most points is awarded the house cup.

Then again, maybe some of you have come to Hogwarts in possession of abilities so formidable that you feel confidant enough to not...pay...attention.  Mr. Potter. Our...new...celebrity. Tell me, what would I get if I added powdered root of asphodel to an infusion of wormwood?  You don't know? Well, let's try again. movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Be that as it may be...it was an extremely foolish thing to do.  I would have expected more rational behavior on your part, Miss Granger. Five points will be taken from Gryffindor for your serious lack of judgment.  As for you two gentlemen I just hope you realize how fortunate you are. Not many students could take on a fully grown mountain troll and live to tell the tale. Five points...will be awarded to each of you.  For sheer dumb luck.

dialogues: Good luck today, Potter. Then again, now that you've proven yourself against a troll, a little game of Quidditch should be easy work for you...even if it is against Slytherin.

dialogues: Shouldn't have said that. No more questions! Don't ask any more questions. That's top secret, that is.

dialogues: Now, you listen to me, all three of you. You're meddling in things that ought not to be meddled in. It's dangerous. What that dog is guarding is strictly between Dumbledore and Nicholas Flamel.

dialogues: Oh, Professors. I found this, in the Restricted Section. It's still hot. That means there's a student out of bed.

dialogues: Ron! You've really got to see this! Ron! You've got to see this!  Ron, Ron, come on. Get out of bed!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I only see me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Look in properly. Go on. Stand there. There. You see them, don't you? Thats my dad

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: That's me! Only, I'm head boy...and I'm holding the Quidditch cup! And bloody hell, I'm Quidditch Captain too! I look good. Harry, do you think this mirror shows the future?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: How can it? Both my parents are dead.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Do you like yours, Ron?  Ron?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I'll be right back.  Want to play chess?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: We go and visit Hagrid?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Harry, I know what you're thinking, but don't. There's something not quite right about that mirror.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Back again, Harry?  I see that you, like so many before you, have discovered the delights of the Mirror of Erised. I trust by now you realize what it does. Let me give you a clue. The happiest man on earth would look into the mirror and see only himself, exactly as he is.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: So, then it shows us what we want? Whatever we want?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yes...and no. It shows us nothing more or less than the deepest, most desperate desires of our hearts. Now you, who have never known your family, you see them standing beside you. But remember this, Harry. This mirror gives us neither knowledge or truth. Men have wasted away in front of it, even gone mad. That is why tomorrow it will be moved to a new home, and I must ask you not to go looking for it again. It does not do to dwell on dreams, Harry, and forget to live.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hi, Hedwig.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, that's all I need... you to set my bloody kneecaps on fire!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I don't appreciate the insinuation, Longbottom. Besides, if anyone cares to notice, my eyebrows have completely grown back!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I found him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Dumbledore is particularly famous for his defeat of the Dark Wizard Grindelwald in 1945

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: -for his discovery of the 12 uses of Dragon Blood, and his work on alchemy with his partner Nicolas Flamel!

dialogues: This is light?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

dialogues: The what?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air

dialogues: Honestly, don't you two read? "The Philosopher's Stone is a legendary substance with astonishing powers. It will turn any metal into pure gold and produces the Elixir of Life, which will make the drinker immortal."

dialogues: Shh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: "The only stone currently in existence belongs to Mr. Nicholas Flamel, the noted alchemist, who last year celebrated his 665th birthday!" That's what Fluffy's guarding on the 3rd floor. That's what's under the trapdoor...the Philosopher's Stone!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hagrid!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, hello. Sorry, don't wish to be rude, but I'm in no fit state to entertain today.

dialogues: We know about the Philosopher's Stone!

dialogues: Oh.

dialogues: Snape? Blimey, Harry, you're not still on about him, are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hagrid, we know he's after the Stone. We just don't know why.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Snape is one of the teachers protecting the Stone! He's not about to steal it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You heard. Right. Come on, now, I'm a bit preoccupied today.

dialogues: Wait a minute.  One of the teachers?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Of course! There are other things defending the Stone, aren't there? Spells, enchantments.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: That's right. Waste of bloody time, if you ask me.  Ain't no one gonna get past Fluffy. Hehe, not a soul knows how. Except for me and Dumbledore. I shouldn't have told you that. I shouldn't have told you that.  Oh!  Ooh! Ooh! Ooh! Ooh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Uh, Hagrid, what exactly is that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: That? It's a ... its um...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I know what that is! But Hagrid, how did you get one?

dialogues: Is that...a dragon?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Isn't he beautiful? Oh. Bless him, look. He knows his mummy. Hehe. Hallo, Norbert.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Norbert?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yeah, well, he's got to have a name, doesn't he?  Don't you, Norbert?  Dededede.

dialogues: Ohh!  Oooh, ooh, ooh, well...he'll have to be trained up a bit, of course.  Who's that?

dialogues: Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, dear.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hagrid always wanted a dragon. He told me so the first time I met him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's crazy. And worse, Malfoy knows.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I don't understand. Is that bad?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's bad.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Good evening.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Nothing, I repeat, nothing gives a student the right to walk about the school at night. Therefore, as punishment for your actions, 50 points will be taken.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Each.  And to ensure it doesn't happen again, all four of you will receive detention.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Excuse me, Professor. Perhaps I heard you wrong. I thought you said..."the four of us."

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, you heard me correctly, Mr. Malfoy. You see, as honorable as your intentions were, you too were out of bed after hours. You will serve detention with your classmates.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: A pity they let the old punishments die. There was a time detention would find you hanging by your thumbs in the dungeons. God, I miss the screaming.  You'll be serving detention with Hagrid tonight. He's got a little job to do inside the dark forest.  A sorry lot this, Hagrid. Oh, good God, man, you're not still on about that bloody dragon, are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Norbert's gone. Dumbledore sent him off to Romania to live in a colony.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Well, that's good, isn't it? He'll be with his own kind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yeah, but what if he don't like Romania?  What if the other dragons are mean to him? He's only a baby, after all.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, for Gods sake, pull yourself together, man. You're going into the forest, after all. Got to have your wits about you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: The forest? I thought that was a joke! We can't go in there. Students aren't allowed. And there are......werewolves!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: There's more than werewolves in those trees, lad. You can be sure of that.  Nighty-night.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Right. Let's go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hagrid, what's that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What we're here for. See that? That's unicorn's blood, that is. I found one dead a few weeks ago. Now, this one's been injured bad by something.  So, it's our job to find the poor beast. Ron, Hermione, you'll come with me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Okay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I'm fine!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: And Harry, you'll go with Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Okay. Then I get Fang!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Fine. Just so you know, he's a bloody coward.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You wait till my father hears about this. This is servant's stuff.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: If I didn't know better, Draco, I'd say you were scared.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Scared, Potter?!  Did you hear that? Come on, Fang. Scared.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What is it, Fang?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: HELP!!!!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Harry Potter, you must leave. You are known to many creatures here. The forest is not safe at this time. Especially for you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But what was that thing you saved me from?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: A monstrous creature. It is a terrible crime to slay a unicorn. Drinking the blood of a unicorn will keep you alive even if you are an inch from death. But at a terrible price. You have slain something so pure that the moment the blood touches your lips, you will have a half-life. A cursed life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But who would choose such a life?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Can you think of no one?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Do you mean to say...that that thing that killed the unicorn...that was drinking its blood...that was Voldemort?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Do you know what is hidden in the school at this very moment?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: The Philosopher's Stone.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hello there, Firenze. I see you've met our young Mr. Potter. You all right there, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Harry Potter, this is where I leave you. You're safe now. Good luck.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You mean You-Know-Who's out there, right now, in the forest?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But he's weak. He's living off the unicorns. Don't you see? We had it wrong! Snape doesn't want the Stone for himself; he wants the Stone for Voldemort. With the Elixir of Life, Voldemort will be strong again. He'll... he'll come back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But, if he comes back, you don't think he'll try to... kill you, do you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I think if he'd had the chance, he might've tried to kill me tonight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: And to think I've been worrying about my Potions final.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hang on a minute.  We're forgetting one thing. Who's the one wizard Voldemort always feared? Dumbledore. As long as Dumbledore's around, Harry, you're safe. As long as Dumbledore's around, you can't be touched.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I've always heard Hogwarts' end of the year exams were frightful, but I found that rather enjoyable.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Speak for yourself. All right there, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: My scar. It keeps burning.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's happened before.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Not like this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Perhaps you should see the nurse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I think it's a warning. It means dangers coming. Uhh!  Oh. Of course!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Don't you think it's a bit odd that what Hagrid wants more than anything is a dragon, and a stranger shows up and just happens to have one?  I mean, how many people wander around with dragon eggs in their pockets? Why didn't I see it before? Hagrid, who gave you the dragon egg?  What did he look like?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I don't know. I never saw his face. He kept his hood up.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: The stranger, though, you and he must have talked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Well, he wanted to know what sort of creatures I looked after. I told him. I said, "After Fluffy, a dragon's gonna be no problem."

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: And did he seem interested in Fluffy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Well, of course he was interested in Fluffy! How often do you come across a three headed dog, even if you're in the trade? But I told him. I said, "The trick with any beast is to know how to calm him. Take Fluffy, for example, just play him a bit of music and he falls straight to sleep."

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I shouldn't have told you that. Where you going?! Wait!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: We have to see Professor Dumbledore, immediately!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I'm afraid Professor Dumbledore is not here. He received an urgent owl from the Ministry of Magic and left immediately for London.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He's gone?! Now? But this is important! It's about...the Philosopher's Stone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: How do you know ?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Someone's going to try and steal it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I don't know how you three found out about the stone, but I can assure you it is perfectly well-protected. Now would you go back to your dormitories? Quietly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: That was no stranger Hagrid met in the village. It was Snape, which means he knows how to get past Fluffy.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: And with Dumbledore gone

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Good afternoon. Now, what would three young Gryffindors such as yourselves be doing inside on a day like this?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Uh...we were just...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You want to be careful. People will think you're  up to something.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Now what do we do?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: We go down the trapdoor. Tonight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Trevor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Trevor shh! Go, you shouldn't be here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Neither should you. You're sneaking out again, arent you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Now, Neville, listen. We were

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No! I won't let you!  You'll get Gryffindor in trouble again! I-I'll fight you.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Neville, I'm really, really sorry about this... Petrificus Totalus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You're a little scary sometimes...you know that? Brilliant, but scary.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Let's go.  Sorry.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's for your own good, you know.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ow! You stood on my foot!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Sorry.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Alohomora.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Wait a minute...he's.... Sleeping.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Snape's already been here. He's put a spell on the harp.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Uh. It's got horrible breath!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: We have to move its paw.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Do you think it'd be all right if we had some of this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Come on!  Okay. Push!  I'll go first. Don't follow until I give you a sign.  If something bad happens, get yourselves out...Does it seem a bit...quiet?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: The harp. It stopped playing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ew! Yuck! Ugh.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Jump! Go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ahh!  Whoa. Lucky this plant-thing is here, really.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Whoa!  Oh. Ahh!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Stop moving, both of you. This is Devil's Snare. You have to relax. If you don't, it will only kill you faster.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Kill us faster?! Oh, now I can relax!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hermione!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hermione!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Now what are we gonna do?!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Just relax!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hermione! Where are you?!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Do what I say. Trust me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ahh! Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Harry!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Are you okay?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Help!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He's not relaxing, is he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Apparently not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Help! Help me!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: We've got to do something!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Help!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Um Devil's Snare, Devil's Scare,  it's deadly fun...but will sulk in the sun! That's it! Devil's Snare hates sunlight!  Lumos Solem!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ahhh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ron, are you okay?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yeah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Okay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Whew. Lucky we didn't panic!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Lucky Hermione pays attention in Herbology.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What is that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I don't know. Sounds like wings.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Curious. I've never seen birds like these.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: They're not birds, they're keys. And I'll bet one of them fits that door.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What's this all about?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I don't know. Strange.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Alohomora!  Well, it was worth a try.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ugh! What're we going to do? There must be 1000 keys up there!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: We're looking for a big old fashioned one. Probably rusty like the handle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: There! I see it!  The one with the broken wing!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What's wrong, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's too simple.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Oh, go on, Harry! If Snape can catch it on that old broomstick, you can! You're the youngest seeker in a century!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: This complicates things a bit!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Catch the key!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Hurry up!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I don't like this. I don't like this at all.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Where are we? A graveyard.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: This is no graveyard.  It's a chessboard.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: There's the door.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Now what do we do?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: It's obvious, isn't it? We've got to play our way across the room. All right. Harry, you take the Bishop's square. Hermione, you'll be the Queen's side castle. As for me, I'll be a knight.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What happens now?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Well, white moves first, and then...we play.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ron, you don't suppose this is going to be like...real wizard's chess, do you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You there! D-5!  Yes, Hermione, I think this is going to be exactly like wizard's chess!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Castle to E-4! Smash! Ron: Pawn to C-3! Smash! Boom! The Queen turns, and smashes a piece! Harry, Ron and Hermione wince. The Queen turns again. Both Ron and Harry study the game.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Wait a minute.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You understand right, Harry. Once I make my move, the Queen will take me...then you'll be free to check the King.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, Ron! No!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He's going to sacrifice himself!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, Ron, you can't!  There must be another way!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Do you want to stop Snape or not? Harry, it's you that has to go on. I know it. Not me, not Hermione, you.  Knight...to H-3.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Check.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ahhhh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: RON!  NO! Don't move! Dont forget, we're still playing.  Checkmate.  Take care of Ron. Then, go to the owlery. Send a message to Dumbledore. Ron's right...I have to go on.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You'll be okay, Harry. You're a great wizard, you really are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Not as good as you.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Me? Books and cleverness? There are more important things. Friendship, and bravery. And Harry, just be careful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You?  No. I-it can't be. Snape, h-he was the one--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yes. He does seem the type, doesn't he? Next to him, who would suspect p-p-p-poor st-stuttering Professor Quirrell?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But-but that day, during the Quidditch match, Snape tried to kill me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: No, dear boy. I tried to kill you.  And trust me, if Snape's cloak hadn't caught fire and broken my eye contact, I would have succeeded, even with Snape muttering his little countercurse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Snape was trying to save me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I knew you were a danger to me right from the off. Especially after Halloween.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Then-then you let the troll in.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Very good, Potter, yes. Snape, unfortunately, wasn't fooled. While everyone else was running about the dungeon, he went to the third floor to head me off. He, of course, never trusted me again.  He rarely left me alone. But he doesn't understand. I'm never alone, never.  Now, what does this mirror do? I see what I desire. I see myself holding the stone. But how do I get it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Use the boy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Come here, Potter. Now!  Tell me... what do you see?  What is it?  What do you see?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Uhh Hello. Who are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I-I'm shaking hands with Dumbledore. I've won the House Cup.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He lies.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Tell the truth! What do you see?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Let me speak to him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Master, you are not strong enough.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: I have strength enough for this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Harry Potter, we meet again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yes. You see what I've become? See what I must do to survive? Live off another, a mere parasite. Unicorn blood can sustain me, but it cannot give me a body of my own. But there is something that can, something that, conveniently enough, lies in your pocket.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Stop him.  Don't be a fool! Why suffer a horrific death when you can join me and live?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Never!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Haha. Bravery. Your parents had it too. Tell me, Harry, would you like to see your mother and father again? Together, we can bring them back.  All I ask for is something in return.  That's it, Harry. There is no good and evil. There is only power, and those too weak to seek it. Together, we'll do extraordinary things. Just give me the stone!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: You liar!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Kill him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ahh! Ahh!  What is this magic?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Fool! Get the stone!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Good afternoon, Harry. Ah. Tokens from your admirers?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Admirers?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What happened down in the dungeons between you and Professor Quirrell is a complete secret, so, naturally, the whole school knows.  Ah, I see your friend Ronald has saved you the trouble of opening your Chocolate Frogs.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ron was here? Is he all right? What about Hermione?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Fine. They're both just fine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But, what happened to the Stone?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Relax, dear boy. The stone has been destroyed. My friend Nicholas and I had a little chat and agreed it was best all around.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: But Flamel, he'll die, won't he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: He has enough Elixir to set his affairs in order. But yes, he will die.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: How is it I got the Stone, sir? One minute I was staring in the mirror, and the next...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ah. You see, only a person who wanted to find the Stone, find it, but not use it, would be able to get it. That is one of my more brilliant ideas. And between you and me that's saying something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Does that mean, with the Stone gone, I mean, that Voldemort can never come back?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Ah, I'm afraid there are ways in which he can return. Harry, do you know why Professor Quirrell couldn't bear to have you touch him?  It was because of your mother. She sacrificed herself for you, and that kind of act leaves a mark.  No, no, this kind of mark cannot be seen. It lives in your very skin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: What is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Love, Harry, love.  Ah. Bertie Bott's Every Flavor Beans. I was most unfortunate in my youth to come across a vomit flavored one, and since then I have lost my liking for them. But I think I could be safe with a nice toffee... Mm. Alas. Earwax.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: All right there, Ron?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: All right? You?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: All right. Hermione?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Never better.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Another year, gone! And now, as I understand it, the house cup needs awarded and the points stand thus. In fourth place: Gryffindor, with 312 points!  In third place: Hufflepuff, with 352 points!  Second: Ravenclaw, with 426 points!  And in first place, with 472 points: Slytherin house!  Yes, well done Slytherin, well done Slytherin. However, recent events must be taken into account and I have a few last minute points to award.  First, to Miss Hermione Granger, for the cool use of intellect while others were in grave peril: fifty points!  Second, to Mr Ronald Weasley, for the best played game of chess that Hogwarts has seen these many years: fifty points!  And third, to mister Harry Potter, for pure love and outstanding courage, I award Gryffindor house: sixty points!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: We're tied with Slytherin!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: And finally: it takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends. I award ten points to Neville Longbottom!  Assuming that my calculations are correct, I believe that a change of decoration is in order!  Gryffindor wins the House Cup!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Yes!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
dialogues: Neville!

Well, you all know, of course, that Hogwarts was founded over a thousand years ago by the four greatest witches and wizards of the age: Godric Gryffindor, Helga Hufflepuff, Rowena Ravenclaw, and Salazar Slytherin. Now, three of the founders coexisted quite harmoniously. One did not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Salazar Slytherin wished to be more selective about the students admitted to Hogwarts. He believed magical learning should be kept within all-magic families. In other words, pure-bloods.вЂќ Unable to sway the others, he decided to leave the school. Now, according to legend, Slytherin had built a hidden chamber in this castle, known as the Chamber of Secrets. Though, shortly before departing, he sealed it until that time when his own true heir returned to the school. The heir alone would be able to open the Chamber and unleash the horror within, and by so doing purge the school of all those who, in Slytherin's view, were unworthy to study magic.

dialogues: Alright, listen up. We play our game, Hufflepuff doesn't stand a

dialogues: We can't cancel Quidditch.

dialogues: Silence, Wood. You and your teammates will go to Gryffindor Tower, now. Potter, you and I will find Mr. Weasley. There's something the both of you have to see.

dialogues: I warn you, this could be a wee bit of a shock.

dialogues: Hermione!

dialogues: She was found near the Library, along with this. Does it mean anything to either of you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Could I have your attention please? Because of recent events, these new rules will be put into effect immediately. All students will return to their house common rooms by six o'clock every evening. All students will be escorted to each lesson by a teacher. No exceptions.вЂќ I should tell you this: unless the culprit behind these attacks is caught, it is likely the school will be closed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: We've got to talk to Hagrid, Ron. I can't believe it's him, but if he did set the monster loose last time, he'll know how to get inside the Chamber of Secrets, and that's a start.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: But you heard McGonagall! We're not allowed to leave the tower except for class.

dialogues: I think it's time to get my Dad's old cloak out again.

dialogues: Who's there? Hello? Hello?

dialogues: What's that for?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Oh, nothing. I- I was expecting, ah It doesn't matter- come on inI just made a pot o' tea.

dialogues: Hagrid, are you okay?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I'm fine! I'm alright.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Did you hear about Hermione?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Oh, yeah. I heard about that, all righ'.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Look, we have to ask you something. Do you know who's opened the Chamber of Secrets?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: What you had to understand about that is-  Quick under the cloak. Don't say a word. Be quiet, both o' you Professor Dumbledore, sir!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Good evening, Hagrid. I wonder, could we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Of course! Come in! Come in.

dialogues: That's Dad's boss! Cornelius Fudge, Minister of Magic!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Bad business, Hagrid. Very bad business. Had to come-- three attacks on Muggle-borns. Things have gone far enough. The Ministry's got to act.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Oh, but I never- you know I never, Professor!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I want it understood, Cornelius, that Hagrid has my full confidence.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Albus look, Hagrid's record is against him. I've got to take him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Take me? Take me where? Not Azkaban Prison?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I'm afraid we have no choice, Hagrid.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Already here, Fudge? Good

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: What're you doin' here? Get outta my house!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Believe me, I take absolutely no pleasure being inside your-- you call this a house? Huh! No. I simply called at the school, and was told the headmaster was here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Well, what exactly is it that you want with me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: The other governors and I have decided it's time for you to step aside. This is an order of suspension. You'll find all twelve signatures on it. I'm afraid we feel you've rather lost your touch. Well, what, with all these attacks, there'll be no Muggle-borns left at Hogwarts. I can only imagine what an awful loss that would be to the school.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Yeh can' take Professor Dumbledore away. Take him away, an' the Muggle-borns won' stand a chance! You mark my words, there'll be killin's next!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You think so?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Calm yourself, Hagrid. If the governors desire my removal, I will, of course, step aside. However, you will find that help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Admirable sentiments. Shall we? Fudge!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Come, Hagrid Well?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ahem! If, uh, if anybody was looking for some stuff, then all they'd have to do would be to follow the spiders. Yup! That would lead them right! That's all I have to say. Oh, and someone'll need to feed Fang while I'm away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Good boy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Hagrid's right! With Dumbledore gone, there'll be an attack a day!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Look! Well, come on. Come on, Fang!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: What?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You heard what Hagrid said; 'Follow the spiders.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: They're headed to the Dark Forest! Why spiders! Why couldn't it be follow the butterflies?вЂќ

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Harry, I don't like this Harry, I don't like this at all!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Shush!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Can we go back now?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Come on!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Who is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Don't panic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Hagrid? Is that you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: We're friends of Hagrid's. And you? Y- y-you're Aragog aren't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Yes. Hagrid has never sent men into our hollow before.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: He's in trouble. Up at the school, there have been attacks. They think it's Hagrid. They think he opened the Chamber of Secrets, like before.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: That's a lie! Hagrid never opened the Chamber of Secrets.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Then you're not the monster.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: No! The monster was born in the castle. I came to Hagrid from a distant land, in the pocket of a traveler.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Shush. But if you're not the monster, then- then what did kill that girl fifty years ago?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: We do not speak of it. It is an ancient creature we spiders fear above all others.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: But have you seen it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I never saw any part of the castle but the box in which Hagrid kept me. The girl was discovered in a bathroom. When I was accused, Hagrid brought me here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ahh- hhh

dialogues: Well, thank you. We'll justgo.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Go? I think not. My sons and daughters do not harm Hagrid on my command. But I cannot deny them fresh meat when it wanders so willingly into our midst. Good-bye, friend of Hagrid.

dialogues: Can we panic now?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Know any spells?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: One, but it's not powerful enough for all of them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Where's Hermione when you need her?

dialogues: Whoah!

dialogues: Whoah!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Glad we're out of there! Ah- Aaaah!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Arania exumai!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Thanks for that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

dialogues: Aah!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Aah!

dialogues: The flying gear's jammed!

dialogues: Come on! Pull!

dialogues: I'm trying!

dialogues: Follow the spiders! Follow the spiders! If Hagrid ever gets out of Azkaban, I'll kill him! I mean, what was the point of sending us in there? What have we found out?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: We know one thing. Hagrid never opened the Chamber of Secrets. He was innocent.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Wish you were here Hermione. We need you now, more than ever.

dialogues: What's that?
