dialogues: Ron! Ron, are you ok?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ron, this is why Hermione was in the Library the day she was attacked. Come on!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: 'Of the many fearsome beasts that roam our land, none is more deadly than the basilisk. Capable of living for hundreds of years, instant death awaits any who meet this giant serpent's eye. Spiders flee before it.' Ron, this is it. The monster in the Chamber of Secrets is a basilisk. That's why I can hear it speak. It's a snake!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: But if it kills by looking people in the eye, why is it no one's dead?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Because no one did look it in the eye. Not directly, at least. Colin saw it through his camera. JustinJustin must have seen the basilisk through Nearly Headless Nick. Nick got the full blast of it- but he's a ghost- he couldn't die again. And Hermionehad the mirror. I bet you anything she was using it to look around corners, in case it came along.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: And Mrs. Norris? I'm pretty sure she didn't have a camera or a mirror, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: The water. There was water on the floor that night. She only saw the basilisk's reflection. 'Spiders flee before it.' It all fits!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: But how's a basilisk been getting around? A dirty great snake- someone would have seen it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Hermione's answered that, too.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Pipes? It's using the plumbing!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Remember what Aragog said, about that girl fifty years ago? She died in a bathroom? What if she never left?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Moaning Myrtle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: All students are to return to their house dormitories at once. All teachers to the second floor corridor, immediately.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: As you can see, the Heir of Slytherin has left another message. Our worst fear has been realized. A student has been taken by the monster into the Chamber itself. The students must be sent home. I'm afraid this is the end of Hogwarts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: So sorry- dozed off- what have I missed?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: A girl has been snatched by the monster, Lockhart. Your moment has come, at last.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: My m-moment?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Weren't you saying just last night that you've known all along where the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets is?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Well, that's settled. We'll leave you to deal with the monster, Gilderoy. Your skills, after all, are a legend.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Very well- ah- I'll just be in my office getting, umgetting ready.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Who is it that the monster's taken, Minerva?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ginny Weasley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Her skeleton will lie in the chamber forever.' Ginny

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Lockhart may be useless, but he's going to try and get into the Chamber. At least we can tell him what we know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Professor, we have some information for you! Are you going somewhere?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Uh, ah- well, yes- um, urgent call- unavoidable- got to go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: What about my sister?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Well, um- as to that, most unfortunate. No one regrets more than I.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You're the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher! You can't go now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Well- I must say- when I took the job there was nothing in the job description about a

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You're running away? After all that stuff you did in your books?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Books can be misleading!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You wrote them!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: My dear boy, do use your common sense! My books wouldn't have sold half as well if people didn't think I'd done all those things!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You're a fraud! You've just been taking credit for what other wizards have done!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Is there anything you can do?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Yes, now you mention it. I'm rather gifted with Memory Charms. Otherwise, you see, all those wizards would have gone blabbing. And I'd never have sold another book. In fact, ahI'm ahgoing to have to do the same to you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Don't even think about it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Oh! Who's there? Oh! Hello, Harry! Ron. What do you want?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: To ask you how you died.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Oh! It was dreadful. It happened right here in this very cubicle. I'd hidden because Olive Hornby was teasing me about my glasses. I was crying, and then I heard somebody come in.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Who was it Myrtle?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I don't know. I was Distraught! Huhh-huhBut they said something funny, a kind of made up language. And I realized it was a boy speaking, so I unlocked the door to tell him to go away and I died.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Just like that? How?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I just remember seeing a pair of great big yellow eyesover there, by that sink. Ohhhhooo

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: This is it. This is it, Ron. I think this is the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Say something. Harry, say something in Parseltongue!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Hesha- Hassah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Excellent, Harry. Haa! Good work! Well then, I'll just be, ah There's no need for me to stay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Oh, yes there is! You first.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Now, boys what good will it do?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Better you than us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Umbutobviously, yes. Sure you don't want to test it first? No! Aaaah! It's really quite filthy down here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: All right. Let's go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Oh, Harry? If you die down there, you're welcome to share my toilet. Hee, hee.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Uhthanks Myrtle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Aaah!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Aaah!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ugh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Now remember, any sign of movement, close your eyes straightaway.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: This way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: What's this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: It looks like a snake.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: It's a snakeskin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Bloody hell. Whatever shed this must be sixty feet long-- or more! Heart of a lion, this one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: The adventure ends here, boys. But don't fret. The world will know our story. How I was too late to save the girl. How you two tragically lost your minds at the sight of her mangled body. So, you first, Mr. Potter. Say good-bye to your memories. Obliviate!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Harry! Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Really? And uh, who- who am I?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Lockhart's memory charm backfired. He hasn't got a clue who he is!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: It's an odd sort of place this, isn't it? Do you live here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: No!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Really? Well?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: What'll do I do now?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You wait here and try and shift some of this rock so we can get back through. I'll go on and find Ginny!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: OK.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Hesha- Hassah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ginny Ginny! Oh, Ginny, please don't be dead. Wake up. Wake up! Please, wake up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: She won't wake.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Tom. Tom Riddle! What do you mean, 'she won't wake?' She's not?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: She's still alive, but only just.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Are you a ghost?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: A memory, preserved in a diary for fifty years.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: She's cold as ice. Ginny, please don't be dead. Wake up! You've got to help me, Tom. There's a basilisk.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: It won't come until it's called.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Give me my wand, Tom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You won't be needing it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Listen, we've got to go! We've got to save her!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I'm afraid I can't do that, Harry. You see, as poor Ginny grows weaker, I grow stronger. Yes Harry, it was Ginny Weasley who opened the Chamber of Secrets.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: No. She couldn't. She wouldn't!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: It was Ginny who set the basilisk on the Mudbloods and Filch's cat, Ginny who wrote the threatening messages on the walls.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: But why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Because I told her to. You'll find that I can be very persuasive. Not that she knew what she was doing. She was, shall we say, in a kind of trance. Still, the power of the diary began to scare her. And she tried to dispose of it in the girl's bathroom. And then, who should find it, but you? The very person I was most anxious to meet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: But, why did you want to meet me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I knew I had to talk to you, meet you if I could. So I decided to show you my capture of that brainless oaf, Hagrid, to gain your trust.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Hagrid's my friend! And you framed him, didn't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: It was my word against Hagrid's. Only Dumbledore seemed to think he was innocent.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I'll bet Dumbledore saw right through you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: He certainly kept an annoyingly close watch on me after that. I knew it wouldn't be safe to open the Chamber again while I was still at school, so I decided to leave behind a diary preserving my sixteen-year-old self in its pages, so that one day I would be able to lead another to finish Salazar Slytherin's noble work.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Well, you haven't finished it this time. In a few hours, the Mandrake Draught will be ready, and everyone who was Petrified will be all right again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Haven't I told you? Killing Mudbloods doesn't matter to me anymore. For many months now, my new target has been you. How is it that a baby, with no extraordinary magical talent, was able to defeat the greatest wizard of all time? How did you escape with nothing but a scar, while Lord Voldemort's powers were destroyed?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Why do you care how I escaped? Voldemort was after your time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Voldemort is my past, present, and future.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You! You're the Heir of Slytherin. You're Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Surely, you didn't think I was going to keep my filthy Muggle father's name? No. I fashioned myself a new name, a name I knew wizards everywhere would one day fear to speak, when I became the greatest sorcerer in the world.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Albus Dumbledore is the greatest sorcerer in the world!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Dumbledore's been driven out of this castle by the mere memory of me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: He'll never be gone! Not as long as those who remain are loyal to him! Fawkes?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: So, this is what Dumbledore sends his great defender, a songbird and an old hat. Shearhas- Samnathas- SГ©lithaeine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Let's match the power of Lord Voldemort, Heir of Salazar Slytherin, against the famous Harry Potter. Sethae- He- This. Parseltongue won't save you now, Potter. It only obeys me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: No! Your bird may have blinded the basilisk, but it can still hear you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Yes, Potter, the process is nearly complete. In a few minutes Ginny will be dead, and I will cease to be a memory. Lord Voldemort will return- very much alive!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ginny-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Remarkable isn't it, how quickly the venom of the basilisk penetrates the body? I'd guess you have little more than a minute to live. You'll be with your dear Mudblood mother soon, Harry. Funny, the damage a silly little book can do especially in the hands of a silly, little girl. What are you doing? Stop! No! Ahhhh! Ahhhh! Ahhhh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ginny

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Harry. It was me- but I swear, I didn't mean to! Riddle made me, and Harry, you're hurt!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Don't worry. Ginny, you need to get yourself out. Follow the Chamber, and you'll find Ron. You were brilliant, Fawkes. I just wasn't quick enough Of course! Phoenix tears have healing powers. Thanks! It's alright, Ginny. It's over. It's just a memory.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Amazing! This is just like magic!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You both realize, of course, that in the past few hours you have broken perhaps a dozen school rules?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Yes, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Yes, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: And there is sufficient evidence to have you both expelled.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Yes, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Yes, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Therefore, it is only fitting, that you both receive Special Awards for Services to the School.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Thanks, sir!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: And now, Mr. Weasley, if you would, have an owl deliver these release papers to Azkaban? I believe we- we want our gamekeeper back. Harry first, I want to thank you, Harry. You must have shown me real loyalty down in the Chamber. Nothing but that could have called Fawkes to you. And, um second, I sense that something is troubling you. Am I right, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: It's just You see, sir I- I couldn't help but notice certain things, certain- certain similarities, between Tom Riddle and me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I see. Well, you can speak Parseltongue, Harry. Why? Because Lord Voldemort can speak Parseltongue. If I'm not mistaken, Harry, he transferred some of his powers to you the night he gave you that scar.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Voldemort transferred some of his powers to me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Not intentionally, but yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: So the Sorting Hat was right! I should be in Slytherin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: It's true, Harry. You possess many of the qualities that Voldemort himself prizes. Determination, resourcefulness, and if I may say so, a certain disregard for the rules. Why then did the Sorting Hat place you in Gryffindor?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Because I asked it to.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Exactly, Harry! Exactly! Which makes you different from Voldemort. It is not our abilities that show what we truly are. It is our choices. If you want proof why you belong in Gryffindor, then I suggest that you look more closely at this. Be careful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Godric Gryffindor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ah- it would take a true Gryffindor to pull that out of the hat.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Dobby! So this is your master! The family you serve is the Malfoys

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Um-humm

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I'll deal with you later. Out of my way, Potter! So, it's true-- you have returned!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: When the governors learned that Arthur Weasley's daughter was taken into the Chamber, they saw fit to summon me back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ridiculous!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Curiously, Lucius, several of them were under the impression that you would curse their families, if they did not agree to suspend me in the first place.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: How dare you?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I beg your pardon?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: My sole concern has always been, and will always be, the welfare of this school and, of course, its students. The culprit has been identified, I presume?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Oh, yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: And? Who was it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ah!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Only, this time, he chose to act through somebody else, by means of this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: I see.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Fortunately, our young Mr. Potter discovered it. One hopes that no more of Lord Voldemort's old school things should find their way into innocent hands. The consequences for the one responsible would be severe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Well, let us hope that Mr. Potter will always be around to save the day.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Don't worry. I will be.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Dumbledore. Come, Dobby. We're leaving.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Ahh! Oow!

dialogues: Sir, I wonder if I could have that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Mr. Malfoy! Mr. Malfoy! I have something of yours.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Mine? I don't know what you're talking about.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Oh, I think you do, sir. I think you slipped the diary into Ginny Weasley's cauldron, that day at Diagon Alley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You do, do you? Why don't you prove it? Come, Dobby. Dobby!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Open it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Dobby?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Master has given Dobby a sock!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: What? I didn't give.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Master has presented Dobby with clothes! Dobby is free!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You've lost me my servant!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: You shall not harm Harry Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Advada.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Your parents were meddlesome fools, too. You mark my words, Potter, one day soon you are going to meet the same sticky end!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Harry Potter freed Dobby! How can Dobby ever repay him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Just promise me something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Anything, sir!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Never try to save my life again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Welcome back, Sir Nicholas!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Thank you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Good evening, Sir Nicholas!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Good evening!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Good to see you, Sir Nicholas!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Thank you! Hello! Hermione! Welcome back!

dialogues: Thanks, Sir Nicholas!

dialogues: Harry- it's Hermione!

dialogues: Uhh-um Welcome back, Hermione.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: It's good to be back! Congratulations! I can't believe you solved it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Well, we had loads of help from you. We couldn't have done it without you.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
dialogues: Thanks.

dialogues: Could I have your attention, please?

dialogues: Before we begin the feast, let us have a round of applause for Professor Sprout and Madame Pomfrey, whose Mandrake juice has been so successfully administered to all who had been Petrified. Also, in light of the recent events, as a school treat, all exams have been canceled.

dialogues: Sorry I'm late! The owl that delivered my release papers got all lost and confused. Some ruddy bird called Errol. dialogues: Uncle Vernon, I need you to sign this form.

dialogues: What is it?

dialogues: Nothing. School stuff.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Later perhaps, if you behave.

dialogues: I will if she does.

dialogues: Oh, you're still here, are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Don't say yes in that ungrateful way. Damn good of my brother to keep you. He'd have been straight to an orphanage if he'd been dumped on my doorstep. Is that my Dudders? Is that my little neffy-pooh? Give us a kiss! Come on! Up, up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Take Marge's suitcase upstairs!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Okay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mischief managed. Nox.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Finish that off for Mommy. Good boy, Rippy-pooh.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Can I tempt you, Marge?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Just a small one. Excellent nosh, Petunia. A bit more. Usually just a fry-up for me, what with 12 dogs. Just a bit more. That's a boy! Mm! You wanna try a little drop of brandy? A little drop of brandy-brandy windy-wandy for Rippy-pippy-pooh? What are you smirking at? Where did you send the boy, Vernon?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: St. Brutus'. It's a fine institution for hopeless cases.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Do they use a cane at St. Brutus', boy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, yeah. Yeah. I've been beaten loads of times.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Excellent. I won't have this namby-pamby... wishy-washy nonsense about not beating people who deserve it. You mustn't blame yourself about how this one turned out. It's all to do with blood. Bad blood will out. What is it the boy's father did, Petunia?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Nothing. He didn't work. He was unemployed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And a drunk too, no doubt?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's a lie!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What did you say?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: My dad wasn't a drunk!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, don't worry Don't fuss, Petunia. I have a very firm grip.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I think it's time you went to bed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Quiet, Vernon. You, clean it up. Actually, it's nothing to do with the father. It's all to do with the mother. You see it all the time with dogs. If there's something wrong with the bitch, then there's something wrong with the pup.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Shut up! Shut up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mm. Right! Let me tell you... y-y-- Vernon! Vernon! Vernon, do something!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ow! Ripper! Ow! Ripper, get down, boy! Down! Ripper, stop it! Stop! I've got you, Marge! I've got you! Hold on, hold on! Get off!

dialogues: Don't you dare!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sorry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, Vernon!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, God! Marge! Please! Marge! Come back! You bring her back! You bring her back now and you put her right!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No! She deserved what she got! Keep away from me.

dialogues: You're not allowed to do magic outside school.

dialogues: Yeah? Try me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: They won't let you back now. You've nowhere to go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I don't care. Anywhere's better than here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Welcome to the Knight Bus... emergency transport for the stranded witch or wizard. My name is Stan Shunpike, and I will be your conductor for this evening. What you doing down there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I fell over.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What you fall over for?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I didn't do it on purpose.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, come on, then. Let's not wait for the grass to grow. What you looking at?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Nothing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, come on, then. In. No, no, no. I'll get this. You get in. Come on. Come on. Move on, move on, move on.

dialogues: Take her away, Ern.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah, take it away, Ernie. It's going to be a bumpy ride.

dialogues: What did you say your name was again?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I didn't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Whereabouts are you headed?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The Leaky Cauldron. That's in London.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You heard that Ern? The Leaky Cauldron. That's in London.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The Leaky Cauldron. If you have pea soup... make sure you eat it before it eats you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But the Muggles. Can't they see us?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Muggles? They don't see nothing, do they?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No, but if you jab them with a fork, they feel. Ernie, little old lady at 12 o'clock! Ten, nine, eight... seven, six, five... four, three, three and a half... two, one and three quarters. Yes!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Who is that? That man.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Who is that? Who is...? That is Sirius Black, that is. Don't tell me you've never been hearing of Sirius Black. He's a murderer. Got himself locked up in Azkaban for it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How did he escape?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, that's the question, isn't it? He's the first one that done it. He was a big supporter of... You-Know-Who. I reckon you've heard of him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah. Him I've heard of.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ernie, two double-deckers at 12 o'clock. They're getting closer, Ernie. Ernie, they're right on top of us! Mind your head. Hey, guys? Guys? Why the long faces? Yeah, yeah. Nearly there. Nearly there. The Leaky Cauldron. Next stop, Knockturn Alley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ah, Mr. Potter, at last.

dialogues: Take it away, Ern.

dialogues: Hedwig.

dialogues: : Right smart bird you got there, Mr. Potter. He arrived here just five minutes before yourself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: As Minister for Magic, it is my duty to inform you, Mr. Potter... that earlier this evening your uncle's sister was located... a little south of Sheffield, circling a chimney stack. The Accidental Magic Reversal Department was dispatched immediately. She has been properly punctured and her memory modified. She will have no recollection of the incident whatsoever. So that's that... and no harm done.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: : Pea soup?

dialogues: No, thank you. Minister?

dialogues: Yes?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I don't understand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Understand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I broke the law. Underage wizards can't use magic at home.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come now, Harry the Ministry doesn't send people to Azkaban... for blowing up their aunts. On the other hand, running away like that, given the state of things... was very, very irresponsible.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The state of things, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We have a killer on the loose.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sirius Black, you mean? But what's he got to do with me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Nothing, of course. You're safe. And that's what matters. And tomorrow you'll be on your way back to Hogwarts. These are your new schoolbooks. I took the liberty... of having them brought here. Now Tom will show you to your room.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hedwig.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, by the way, Harry. Whilst you're here, it would be best if you didn't... wander.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Housekeeping. I'll come back later.

dialogues: Looking forward to a new term?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah. It should be great.

dialogues: Has this anything to do with Sirius Black, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What do you know about Sirius Black, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Only that he's escaped from Azkaban.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Do you know why? Thirteen years ago, when you stopped...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Don't say his name.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: When you stopped You-Know-Who... Black lost everything. But to this day, he still remains a faithful servant. And in his mind... you are the only thing that stands in the way... of You-Know-Who returning to power. And that is why... he has escaped from Azkaban. To find you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And kill me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, swear to me that whatever you might hear... you won't go looking for Black.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mr. Weasley... why would I go looking for someone who wants to kill me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Quick. Quick. Ron, Ron! Oh, for goodness' sake! Don't lose him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I didn't mean to blow her up. I just... I lost control.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Brilliant.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Honestly, Ron, it's not funny. Harry was lucky not to be expelled.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I think I was lucky not to be arrested actually.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I still think it was brilliant.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come on. Everywhere else is full.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Who do you think that is?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor R.J. Lupin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Do you know everything? How is it she knows everything?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's on his suitcase, Ronald.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Do you think he's really asleep?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Seems to be. Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I gotta tell you something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Let me get this straight. Sirius Black has escaped from Azkaban to come after you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But they'll catch Black, won't they? I mean, everyone's looking for him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sure. Except no one's ever broken out of Azkaban before... and he's a murderous, raving lunatic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Thanks, Ron.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Why are we stopping? We can't be there yet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What's going on?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I don't know. Maybe we've broken down.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ouch, Ron. That was my foot.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: There's something moving out there. I think... someone's coming aboard.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Bloody hell! What's happening?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry. Harry, are you all right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Thank you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Here, eat this. It'll help. It's all right. It's chocolate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What was that thing that came?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It was a dementor. One of the guards of Azkaban. It's gone now. It was searching the train for Sirius Black. If you'll excuse me, I need to have a little word with the driver. Eat. You'll feel better.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What happened to me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, you sort of went rigid. We thought maybe you were having a fit or something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And did either of you two... you know... pass out?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No. I felt weird, though. Like I'd never be cheerful again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But someone was screaming. A woman.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No one was screaming, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: On the slope.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Welcome! Welcome to another year at Hogwarts! Now, I'd like to say a few words... before we all become too befuddled by our excellent feast. First, I'm pleased to welcome Professor R.J. Lupin... who's kindly consented to fill the post... of Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher. Good luck, Professor.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Of course. That's why he knew to give you the chocolate, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Potter. Is it true you fainted? I mean, you actually fainted?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Shove off, Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How did he find out?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Just forget it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Our Care of Magical Creatures teacher... has decided to retire... in order to spend more time with his remaining limbs. Fortunately, I'm delighted to announce... that his place will be taken by none other... than our own Rubeus Hagrid. Finally, on a more disquieting note... at the request of the Ministry of Magic... Hogwarts will, until further notice, play host to the dementors of Azkaban... until such a time as Sirius Black is captured. The dementors will be stationed at every entrance to the grounds. Now whilst I've been assured... that their presence will not disrupt our day-to-day activities... a word of caution. Dementors are vicious creatures. They'll not distinguish... between the one they hunt and the one who gets in their way. Therefore, I must warn each and every one of you... to give them no reason to harm you. It is not in the nature of a dementor to be forgiving. But you know, happiness can be found... even in the darkest of times... if one only remembers to turn on the light.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Fortuna Major. Here, listen. She just won't let me in. Fortuna Major.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No, no, no. Wait, wait. Watch this. Oh, amazing! Just with my voice.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Fortuna Major.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes, all right. Go in.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Thank you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: She's still doing that after three years. She can't even sing. Exactly. Hey, man. Hey, man. Oh, God. That's awful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: She's still doing that after three years. She can't even sing. Exactly. Hey, man. Hey, man. Oh, God. That's awful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: . Green. That's a monkey. What is that? You call that a monkey? Do not give him one again. Hey, Neville, try an elephant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ron, catch.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I will.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I think we have a winner.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, don't try one of them. Oh, no. Look at him. His face.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Welcome, my children. In this room, you shall explore the noble art of Divination. In this room, you shall discover if you possess the Sight. Hello. I am Professor Trelawney. Together we shall cast ourselves into the future. This term, we'll focus on Tasseomancy, the art of reading tea leaves. So please, take the cup of the person sitting opposite you. What do you see? The truth lies buried like a sentence deep within a book, waiting to be read. But first, you must broaden your minds. First, you must look beyond.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What a load of rubbish.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Where did you come from?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Me? I've been here all this time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You, boy... Is your grandmother quite well?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I think so.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I wouldn't be so sure of that. Give me the cup. Pity. Broaden your minds. Your aura is pulsing, dear. Are you in the beyond? I think you are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sure.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Look at the cup. Tell me what you see.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, yeah. Um... Well, Harry's got sort of a wonky cross. That's trials and suffering. And that there could be the sun and that's happiness. So... you're gonna suffer, but you're gonna be... happy about it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Give me the cup. Oh, my dear boy. My dear... you have the Grim.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The Grin? What's the Grin? Not the Grin, you idiot. The Grim. Taking form of a giant spectral dog. It's among the darkest omens in our world. It's an omen... of death.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You don't think that Grim thing's got anything to do with Sirius Black?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, honestly, Ron. If you ask me, Divination's a woolly discipline. Now, Ancient Runes, that's a fascinating subject.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ancient Runes? Exactly how many classes are you taking?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: A fair few.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hang on. That's not possible. Ancient Runes is in the same time as Divination. You have to be in two classes at once.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Don't be silly Ron. How could anyone be in two classes at once? Broaden your minds. Use your Inner Eye to see the future!.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's it. Come on, now. Come closer. Less talking, if you don't mind. I got a real treat for you today. A great lesson. So follow me. Right, you lot. Less chattering. Form a group over there. And open your books to page 49.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Exactly how do we do that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Just stroke the spine, of course. Goodness me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Don't be such a wimp, Longbottom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm okay. Okay.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I think they're funny.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, yeah. Terribly funny. Really Witty. God, this place has gone to the dogs. Wait until Father hears Dumbledore's got this oaf teaching classes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Shut up, Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: D-Dementor! Dementor!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Just ignore him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You're supposed to stroke it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Isn't he beautiful? Say hello to Buckbeak.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hagrid, exactly what is that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That, Ron, is a hippogriff. First thing you wanna know about hippogriffs is that they're very proud creatures. Very easily offended. You do not want to insult a hippogriff. It may just be the last thing you ever do. Now, who'd like to come and say hello? Well done, Harry. Well done. Come on now. Now... you have to let him make the first move. It's only polite. So... step up. Give him a nice bow. Then you wait and see if he bows back. If he does, you can go and touch him. If not... Well, we'll get to that later. Just make your bow. Nice and low. Back off, Harry. Back off. Keep still. Keep still. Well done, Harry. Well done. Here, you big brute, you. Right. I think you can go and pat him now. Go on. Don't be shy. Nice and slow, now. Nice and slow. Slow. Not so fast, Harry. Slow down, Harry. That's it... Nice and slow. Now let him come to you. Slowly, now, slowly, slowly... That's it... Yes! Well done! Well done, Harry, well done! I think he may let you ride him now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Put you over here, just behind the wing joint. Don't pull out any of his feathers, because he won't thank you for that. Well done, Harry, and well done, Buckbeak.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That was wicked, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well done, well done. How am I doing me first day?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Brilliant, professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes you're not dangerous at all, are you, you great ugly brute!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Malfoy, no... No! Buckbeak! Whoa, whoa, whoa... Whoa! Buckbeak! Away, you silly creature!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's killed me! It's killed me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Calm down! It's just a scratch!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hagrid! He has to be taken to the hospital.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm the teacher. I'll do it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh You're gonna regret this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Class dismissed!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You and your bloody chicken!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Does it hurt terribly, Draco?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It comes and it goes. Still, I consider myself lucky. Madam Pomfrey said another minute and I could've lost my arm. I couldn't do homework for weeks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Listen to the idiot. He's really laying it on thick, isn't he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: At least Hagrid didn't get fired.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah but I heard Draco's father's furious. We haven't heard the end of this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He's been sighted! He's been sighted!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sirius Black!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Dufftown? That's not far from here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You don't think he'd come to Hogwarts, do you? With dementors at every entrance?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Dementors? He's already slipped past them once. Who's to say he won't do it again?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's right. Black could be anywhere. It's like trying to catch smoke. Like trying to catch smoke with your bare hands.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Intriguing, isn't it? Would anyone like to venture a guess... as to what is inside?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's a boggart, that is.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Very good, Mr. Thomas. Now, can anybody tell me what a boggart looks like?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No one knows.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: When did she get here?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Boggarts are shape-shifters. They take the shape of whatever a particular person fears the most. That's what makes them so...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: So terrifying, yes, yes, yes... Luckily, a very simple charm exists to repel a boggart. Let's practice it now. Without wands, please. After me. Riddikulus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Riddikulus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Very good. A little louder and very clear. Listen: Riddikulus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Riddikulus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: This class is ridiculous.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Very good. So much for the easy part. You see, the incantation alone is not enough. What really finishes a boggart is laughter. You need to force it to assume a shape you find truly amusing. Let me explain. Uh... Neville, would you join me, please? Come on, don't be shy. Come on. Come on. Hello. Neville, what frightens you most of all?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor Snape.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sorry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor Snape.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor Snape. Yes, frightens all. And I believe you live with your grandmother.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Y-Yes but I don't want that boggart to turn into her, either.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No... it won't. I want you to picture her clothes. Only her clothes, very clearly, in your mind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: She carries a red handbag...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We don't need to hear. As long as you see it, we'll see it. Now, when I open that wardrobe... here's what I want you to do. Excuse me. Imagine Professor Snape in your grandmother's clothes. Can you do that? Yes. Wand at the ready. One, two, three. Think, Neville, think.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Riddikulus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Wonderful, Neville, wonderful! Incredible! Okay... to the back, Neville. Everyone, form a line! Form a line! I want everyone to picture the thing they fear the very most... and turn it into something funny. Next! Ron! Concentrate. Face your fear. Be brave! Wand at the ready, Ron, wand at the ready.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Riddikulus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes! You see? Very good, very good! Marvelous! Absolutely, very, very enjoyable! Parvati! Next! Show us what you see. Keep your nerve. Steady.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Riddikulus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And next! Step up, step up! Wonderful, wonderful! Here! Riddikulus! Right. Sorry about that. That's enough for today. Collect your books from the back. That's the end of the lesson. Thank you! Sorry! Sorry, you can have too much of a good thing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Now remember, these visits to Hogsmeade village are a privilege. Should your behavior reflect poorly on the school in anyway that privilege shall not be extended again. No permission form signed, no visiting the village. That's the rule, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Those with permission, follow me. Those without, stay put.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But professor I thought if you signed it, then I could...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I can't. Only a parent or a guardian can sign. Since I am neither, it would be inappropriate. I'm sorry, Potter. That's my final word.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Forget about it, guys. See you later.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor, can I ask you something?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You want to know why I stopped you facing that boggart, yes? I would've thought it'd be obvious. I assumed it would take the shape of Lord Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I did think of Voldemort at first. But then I remembered that night on the train... and the dementor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm very impressed. That suggests what you fear the most is fear itself. This is very wise.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Before I fainted... I heard something. A woman... screaming.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Dementors force us to relive our very worst memories. Our pain becomes their power.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I think it was my mother... the night she was murdered.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm sorry to hear about your broomstick. Is there no chance of fixing it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No. Professor, why do the dementors affect me so? I mean, more than everyone else?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Let! Go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The very first time I saw you, Harry, I recognized you immediately. Not by your scar, by your eyes. They're your mother, Lily's. Yes. Oh, yes. I knew her. Your mother was there for me at a time when no one else was. Not only was she a singularly gifted witch... she was also an uncommonly kind woman. She had a way of seeing the beauty in others... even, and perhaps most especially, when that person could not see it in themselves. And your father, James, on the other hand... he... He had a certain, shall we say, talent for trouble. A talent, rumor has it, he passed on to you. You're more like them than you know, Harry. In time, you'll come to see just how much.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Honeyduke's Sweetshop is brilliant, but nothing beats Zonko's Joke Shop. We never did got a chance to go to the Shrieking Shack though. You heard it's the most...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The most haunted building in Britain. Yeah I know. What's going on?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Probably Neville forgotten the password again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hey!.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, you're there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Let me through, please. Excuse me! I'm Head Boy! Get back, all of you. No one is to enter this dormitory until it's been searched.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The Fat Lady! She's gone!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Serves her right. She was a terrible singer.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's not funny, Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Keep calm, everyone. Break into fours. Back to your common room. Be quiet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Make way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The headmaster's here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come on, move.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You heard. Move!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mr. Filch? Round up the ghosts. Tell them to search every painting in the castle to find the Fat Lady.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: There's no need for ghosts, professor. The Fat Lady's there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mind where you're going! Slow down! You listen! I'm Head Boy! Come back here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Keep moving!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Dear lady, who did this to you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Eyes like the devil, he's got, and a soul as dark as his name. It's him, headmaster. The one they all talk about. He's here, somewhere in the castle! Sirius Black!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Secure the castle, Mr. Filch. The rest of you, to the Great Hall.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I've searched the Astronomy Tower and the Owlery, sir. But there's nothing there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ah, thank you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The third floor's clear too, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Very good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I've done the dungeons, headmaster. No sign of Black, nor anywhere else in the castle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I didn't really expect him to linger.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Remarkable feat, don't you think? To enter Hogwarts Castle on one's own... completely undetected?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Quite remarkable, yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Any theories on how he managed it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Many. Each as unlikely as the next.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You may recall... prior to the start of term I expressed concerns... about your appointment of Professor...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Not a single professor inside this castle would help Sirius Black enter it. I'm quite convinced the castle is safe... and I'm more than willing to send the students back to their houses.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What about Potter? Should he be warned?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Perhaps. But for now, let him sleep. For in dreams, we enter a world that's entirely our own. Let them swim in the deepest ocean or glide over the highest cloud.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Turn to page 394.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Excuse me, sir. Where's Professor Lupin?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's not really your concern, is it, Potter? Suffice it to say your professor finds himself incapable of teaching... at the present time. Turn to page 394.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Werewolves?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But sir, we just learned about red caps and hinkypunks. We're not meant to start that for weeks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Quiet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: When did she come in? Did you see her come in?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Now, which one of you can tell me the difference... between an Animagus and a werewolf? No one? How disappointing.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Please, sir. An Animagus is a wizard who elects to turn into an animal. A werewolf has no choice. With each full moon, when he transforms, he no longer remembers who he is. He'd kill his best friend if he crossed his path. Furthermore, the werewolf only responds to the call of its own kind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Thank you, Mr. Malfoy. That's the second time... you've spoken out of turn, Miss Granger. Are you incapable of restraining yourself... or do you take pride in being an insufferable know-it-all?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He's got a point, you know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Five points from Gryffindor. As an antidote to your ignorance, and on my desk, by Monday morning... two rolls of parchment on the werewolf, with emphasis... on recognizing it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sir, it's Quidditch tomorrow.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Then I suggest you take extra care, Mr. Potter. Loss of limb will not excuse you. Page 394. The term werewolf... is a contraction of the Anglo-Saxon word were... which means man, and wolf. Werewolf, man-wolf. There are several ways to become a werewolf. They include being given the power of shape-shifting... being bitten by a werewolf...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Go, Harry! Go, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Arresto momentum!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He looks a bit peaky, doesn't he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Peaky? What do you expect? He fell over 100 feet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah, come on Ron, let's walk you off the astronomy tower and see what you look like.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Probably a right sight better than he normally does.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How are you feeling?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, brilliant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You gave us a right good scare there, mate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What happened?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, you fell off your broom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Really? I meant the match. Who won?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Umm... no one blames you, Harry. The dementors aren't supposed to come inside the grounds. Dumbledore's furious. As soon as he saved you, he sent them off.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: There's something else you should know too. When you fell, your broom sort of blew into the Whomping Willow, and... Well...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Listen. Dementors are amongst the foulest creatures to walk this earth. They feed on every good feeling, every happy memory... until a person is left with absolutely nothing but his worst experiences. You are not weak, Harry. The dementors affect you most because there are true horrors in your past. Horrors your classmates can scarcely imagine. You have nothing to be ashamed of.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm scared, professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well I'd consider you a fool if you weren't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I need to know how to fight them. You could teach me. You made that dementor on the train go away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: There was only one that night.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But you made it go away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I don't pretend to be an expert, Harry. But as the dementors seem to have developed a particular interest in you... perhaps I should teach you. But after the holidays. For now, I need to rest.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Last call for Hogsmeade! Come on, now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Guys, let me go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Clever, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But not clever enough. Besides, we've got a better way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm trying to get to Hogsmeade.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We know. Don't worry. We'll get you there. We'll show you a quicker way. If you pipe down.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We know. Don't worry. We'll get you there. We'll show you a quicker way. If you pipe down.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh. Bless him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Let me go! Come on, guys. Don't...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Now, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come and join the big boys.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come and join the big boys.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What are you doing?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What's this rubbish?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What's this rubbish? he says. That there it's the secret to our success.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's a wrench giving it to you believe me. But we've decided your needs are greater than ours.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: George, if you will.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mr's. Moony, Wormtail, Padfoot and Prongs... are proud to present the Marauder's Map.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We owe them so much.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hang on. This is Hogwarts. And that... No. Is that really...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: In his study.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Pacing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Does that a lot.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: So you mean this map shows...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Everyone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Everyone?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Everyone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Where they are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What they're doing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Every minute.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Of every day.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Brilliant! Where did you get it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Knicked it from Filch's office, of course. First year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Now listen, there are seven secret passageways... out of the castle. We'd recommend

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: This one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: This one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The One-Eyed Witch passageway.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It'll lead you straight to Honeyduke's seller.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You best hurry. Filch is heading this way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh and Harry don't forget. When you're done, just give it a tap and say:

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mischief managed. Otherwise, anyone can read it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mischief managed. Otherwise, anyone can read it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Now, how much do you want? Delicious.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's meant to be the most haunted building in Britain. Did I mention that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Twice.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Do you want to move a bit closer?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: To the Shrieking Shack?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Actually, I'm fine here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, well. Look who's here. You two shopping for your new dream home? Bit grand for you, isn't it, Weasle-Bee? Don't your family sleep in uh... one room?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Shut your mouth, Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Uh, Not very friendly. Boys, I think it's time we teach Weasle-Bee how to respect his superiors.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hope you don't mean yourself!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How dare you talk to me! You filthy little mudblood! Who is that? Don't stand there! Do something!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What's up, Malfoy? Lost your skis?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Get out of the way! Move!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Malfoy! Wait! Wait!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Bloody hell, Harry. That was not funny.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Those weasels! Never told me about any Marauder's Map.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But Harry isn't going to keep it. He's going to turn it over to Professor McGonagall. Aren't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sure. Along with his Invisibility Cloak.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, Look who it is. Madam Rosmerta. Ron fancies her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's not true!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor McGonagall!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Cornelius!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Allow me, minister.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, Hagrid...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sorry about that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Rosmerta, my dear. I hope business is good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It'd be a lot better if the Ministry wasn't sending dementors... into my pub every other night!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We have... We have a killer on the loose!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sirius Black in Hogsmeade! And what would bring him here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No underage wizards allowed in today! Shut the damn door!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: So rude.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Thick heads.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes, we are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
