dialogues: Thick heads?! How dare they! Who are they calling thick heads? Young whippersnappers!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Nobody's going to come to a pub where they're gonna get scared out of their wits. Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor Dumbledore does not want dementors around the place, I can assure you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Now, tell me what this is all about.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well. Now years ago, when Harry Potter's parents realized they were marked for death... You remember? They went into hiding. Few knew where they were. One who did was Sirius Black. And he told You-Know-Who!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Not only did Black lead You-Know-Who to the Potters that night, but he also killed one of their friends, Peter Pettigrew!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Peter Pettigrew?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes, little lump of a boy. Always trailing after Sirius Black.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ah, I remember him. Never let James and Sirius out of his sight. But what happened?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well Peter Pettigrew tried to warn the Potters... and might have managed to, had he not run into an old friend, Sirius Black.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Black was vicious. He didn't kill Pettigrew. He destroyed him! A finger. That's all that was left. A finger. Nothing else.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes. Sirius Black may not have put his hands to the Potters, but he's the reason they're dead.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And now he wants to finish what he started.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mhmm.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I don't believe it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ah, that's not the worst of it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What could be worse?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: This: Sirius Black was... and remains to this day... Harry Potter's godfather!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ron, look! Sorry, sorry. Excuse me, excuse me, sorry. Harry, what happened?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He was their friend... and he betrayed them. He was their friend! I hope he finds me. Because when he does, I'm gonna be ready! When he does, I'm gonna kill him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry. There you are. You came. Are you sure about this, Harry? You know this is very advanced magic well beyond the Ordinary Wizarding Level.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm sure.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, everything's prepared. Now, the spell I'm going to try to teach you is called the Patronus Charm. Did you ever hear of it? No? Well... A Patronus is a kind of positive force. For the wizard who conjures one... it works something like a shield, with the dementor feeding on it rather than him. But in order for it to work, you need to think of a memory. Not just any memory, a very happy memory, a very powerful memory.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Can you do this? Yes. Very well. Close your eyes. Concentrate. Explore your past. Do you have a memory? Allow it to fill you up. Lose yourself within it. Then speak the incantation, Expecto Patronum.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Expecto Patronum.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Very good. Shall we? Wand at the ready.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Expecto Patronum! Expecto... Expecto... Expect...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Here we go. Come on. Sit up. Deep breaths. It's all right. I didn't expect you to do it the first time. That would have been remarkable. Here, eat this. You'll feel better.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's one nasty dementor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, no, no, no. That was a boggart, Harry. A boggart. The real thing would be worse. Much, much worse. As a matter of interest, what were you thinking? Which memory did you choose?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The first time I rode a broom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's not good enough. Not nearly good enough.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: There's another. It's not... happy, exactly. Well, it is. It's the happiest I've ever felt... but it's complicated.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Is it strong? Then let's give it a try. You feel ready?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Just do it. Expecto Patronum! Expecto Patronum!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes! Well done, Harry. Well done!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I think I've had enough for today.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes. Sit down. Here. Eat this, it helps. It really helps. And just so you know, Harry... I think you'd have given your father a run for his money. And that... is saying something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I was thinking of him. And Mom. Seeing their faces. They were talking to me. Just talking. That's the memory I chose. I don't even know if it's real. But it's the best I have.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Beautiful day.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Gorgeous.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Unless of course you've been ripped to pieces!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ripped to pieces? What are you talking about?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ronald has lost his rat.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I haven't lost anything! Your cat killed him!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Rubbish.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, you've seen the way that bloodthirsty beast of hers... is always lurking about. And Scabbers is gone.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, maybe you should take better care of your pets!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Your cat killed him!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Did not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Did.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Didn't.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How did it go, Hagrid? The hearing?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, first off, the committee members took turns... talking about why we were there. And then I got up and did my piece. Said how Buckbeak... was a good hippogriff, always cleaned his feathers. And then Lucius Malfoy got up. Well, you can imagine. He said Buckbeak was a deadly and dangerous creature... who would kill you as soon as look at you.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And then?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And then he asked for the worst, did old Lucius.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: They're not sacking you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No, I'm not sacked. Buckbeak's been sentenced to death!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Spiders! There's... There's spiders. Spiders. They want me to tap-dance. I don't wanna tap-dance!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You tell those spiders Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Right, yeah. Tell them. I'll tell them...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Peter Pettigrew?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Little lump of a boy. Always trailing after Sirius Black.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Black was vicious. He didn't kill Pettigrew, he destroyed him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Put that light out!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Watch it there, boy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We're trying to sleep here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Potter. What are you doing wandering the corridors at night?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I was sleepwalking.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How extraordinarily like your father you are, Potter. He, too, was exceedingly arrogant, strutting about the castle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: My dad didn't strut. And nor do I. Now, if you don't mind, I would appreciate it if you could lower your wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Turn out your pockets. Turn out your pockets! What's this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Spare bit of parchment.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Really? Open it. Reveal your secrets. Read it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Mr's. Moony, Wormtail, Padfoot, and Prongs... offer their compliments to Professor Snape and...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And request that he keep his abnormally large nose out of other people's business.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Why, you insolent little...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, well. Lupin. Out for a little walk... in the moonlight, are we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, are you alright?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That remains to be seen. I have just now confiscated a rather curious artifact from Mr. Potter. Take a look, Lupin. Supposed to be your area of expertise. Clearly, it's full of dark magic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, I seriously doubt it, Severus. It looks as though it's merely a parchment designed to insult anyone... who tries to read it. I suspect it's a Zonko product. Nevertheless, I shall investigate any hidden qualities it may possess. It is, after all, as you say, my area of expertise. Harry, would you come with me, please? Professor, good night.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Are you deaf? Put that light out!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come in. I haven't the faintest idea how this map came to be in your possession... but quite frankly, I am astounded that you didn't hand it in. Did it never occur to you that this, in the hands of Sirius Black... is a map to you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No. No, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Your father never set much store by the rules either. But he and your mother gave their lives to save yours. Gambling their sacrifice by wandering around the castle unprotected... with a killer on the loose seems to me a poor way to repay them! Now, I will not cover up for you again, Harry. Do you hear me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I want you to return to your dormitory and stay there. And don't take any detours. If you do, I shall know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor, just so you know, I don't think that map always works. Earlier, it showed someone in the castle. Someone I know to be dead.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, really? And who might that be?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Peter Pettigrew.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's not possible.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's just what I saw. Good night, professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Broaden your minds. You must look beyond. The art of crystal gazing is in the clearing of the Inner Eye. Only then can you see. Try again. Now, what do we have here?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, do you mind me trying? The Grim, possibly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: My dear, from the first moment you stepped foot in my class... I sensed that you did not possess the proper spirit... for the noble art of Divination. No, you see, there. You may be young in years, but the heart that beats beneath your bosom is as shriveled as an old maid's, your soul as dry as the pages of the books... to which you so desperately cleave. Have I said something?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: She's gone mental, Hermione has. I mean, not that she wasn't always mental... but now it's in the open for everyone to see.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hang on. We better take this back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm not going back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Fine. See you later.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: See you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry Potter...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor Trelawney...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He will return tonight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sorry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Tonight, he who betrayed his friends, whose heart rots with murder... shall break free. Innocent blood shall be spilt... and servant and master shall be reunited once more. I'm so sorry, dear boy. Did you say something?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No. Nothing.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I can't believe they're going to kill Buckbeak. It's just too horrible.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It just got worse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Now I'll tell you. Father said... I can keep the hippogriff's head. I think I'll donate it to the Gryffindors' room. This is going to be rich. Look who's here. Come to see the show?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You! You foul, loathsome, evil little cockroach!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hermione, no! He's not worth it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Malfoy, are you okay? Let's go. Quick.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Not a word to anyone, understood?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That felt good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Not good, brilliant!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Look at him. Loves the smell of the trees when the wind blows through them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Why don't we just set him free?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: They'd know it was me, and then Dumbledore... would get into trouble. He's coming down, you know? Dumbledore. Says he wants to be with me when they... When it happens. Great man, Dumbledore. A great man.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We'll stay with you too, Hagrid.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You'll do no such thing! Think I want you seeing something like that? No. You just drink your tea and be off. Oh. Before you do, Ron...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Scabbers! You're alive!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Keep a closer eye on your pets, Ron.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I think that means you owe someone an apology.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Right. Next time I see Crookshanks, I'll let him know.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I meant me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Blimey! What was that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ow! Hagrid!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, crikey.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Very interesting.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No, minister. Over this way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's late. It's nearly dark. You shouldn't be here. Someone sees you outside the castle at this time of night, you'll be in trouble. Big trouble. Particularly you, Harry. With you in a moment! Quick. Quick!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hagrid. It'll be fine. It'll be okay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Go on, go on!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes, that's the... lings you see over there...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: On the slope... Ah, Hagrid.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Good evening.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Minister. Just make your way through. Have a tea, if you like.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No, Hagrid, thank you. Now gentlemen...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'd like to have a cup of tea.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, I think we should get down to our business, shall we? Very well. It is the decision of the Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures that the hippogriff known as Buckbeak, hereinafter called the condemned, shall be executed this day at sundown.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Dear, dear...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Now, now, Hagrid. Now, come on. All right. It'll be all right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The execution shall dispatch...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I thought I just saw... Never mind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Let's go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Buckbeak didn't mean no harm.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, no.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He bit me! Scabbers!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ron. Ron! Ron!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Scabbers, come back!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Wait!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Scabbers, you bit me!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, you do realize what tree this is?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's not good. Ron, run!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, Hermione, run! It's the Grim! Harry!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ron! Ron, wait! Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Help!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ron! Ron! Ron! Ron! Come on! Move!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Duck!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, I'm sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Don't worry.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Where do you suppose this goes?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I have a hunch. I just hope I'm wrong.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We're in the Shrieking Shack, aren't we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come on. Ron.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ron. You're okay. The dog. Where is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry it's a trap. He's the dog. He's an Animagus.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: If you want to kill Harry, you'll have to kill us too!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No. Only one will die tonight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Then it'll be you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Are you going to kill me, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Expelliarmus! Well, well, Sirius. Looking rather ragged, aren't we? Finally, the flesh reflects the madness within.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, you'd know all about the madness within, wouldn't you Remus? I found him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I understand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Let's kill him!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No! I trusted you! And all this time, you've been his friend. He's a werewolf! That's why he's been missing classes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How long have you known?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Since Professor Snape set the essay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, well, well, Hermione. You really are the brightest witch of your age, I've ever met.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Enough talk, Remus! Come on, let's kill him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Wait!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I did my waiting! Twelve years of it! In Azkaban!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Very well. Kill him. But wait one more minute. Harry has the right to know why.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I know why. You betrayed my parents. You're the reason they're dead!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No, Harry it wasn't him. Somebody did betray your parents... but it was somebody who, until quite recently, I believed to be dead!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Who was it, then?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Peter Pettigrew! And he's in this room! Right now! Come out, come out, Peter! Come out, come out and play!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Expelliarmus! Vengeance is sweet. How I hoped I'd be the one to catch you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Severus...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I told Dumbledore you were helping an old friend into the castle, and now here's the proof.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Brilliant, Snape. Once again you've put your keen penetrating mind to the task and as usual come to the wrong conclusion. Now, if you'll excuse us, Remus and I have some unfinished business... to attend to.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Give me a reason. I beg you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Severus don't be a fool.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He can't help it. It's habit.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sirius be quiet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Be quiet yourself Remus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh listen to you two, quarreling like an old married couple.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Why don't you run along and play with your chemistry set!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I could do it, you know. But why deny the dementors? They're so longing to see you. Do I detect a flicker of fear? Oh, yes. A Dementor's Kiss. One can only imagine what that must be like. It's said to be nearly unbearable to witness, but I'll do my best.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Severus, please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: After you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Expelliarmus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry! What did you just do?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You attacked a teacher!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Tell me about Peter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He was at school with us. We thought he was our friend!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No. Pettigrew's dead. You killed him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No, he didn't. I thought so too, until you mentioned seeing Pettigrew on the map!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The map was lying, then.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The map never lies! Pettigrew's alive! And he's right there!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Me?! He's mental!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Not you! Your rat!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Scabbers has been in my family for...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Twelve years? Curiously long life for a common garden rat! He's missing a toe, isn't he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: So what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: All they could find of Pettigrew was his...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Finger! That dirty coward cut it off so everyone would think he was dead! And then he transformed into a rat!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The horntail...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Show me. Give it to him, Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What are you trying to do to him? Scabbers! Leave him alone! Get off him! What are you doing?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Remus? Sirius. My old friends! Harry! Look at you! You look so much like your father! Like James! We were the best of friends...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How dare you speak to Harry! How dare you talk about James in front of him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You sold James and Lily to Voldemort, didn't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I didn't mean to! The Dark Lord. You have no idea the weapons he possesses! Ask yourself, Sirius! What would you have done? What would you have done?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I would have died! I would have died, rather than betray my friends!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, James wouldn't have wanted me killed! Your dad... Your dad would have spared me! He would show me mercy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You should've realized, Peter, that if Voldemort didn't kill you, then we would! Together!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, this man...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I know what he is. But we'll take him to the castle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Bless you, boy! Bless you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Get off! I said we'd take you to the castle. After that, the dementors can have you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sorry about the bite. I reckon that twinges a bit.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: A bit? A bit? You almost tore my leg off!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I was going for the rat. Normally, I have a very sweet disposition as a dog. In fact, more than once, James suggested that I make the change permanent. The tail I could live with. But the fleas, they're murder.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Okay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You better go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No. Don't worry, okay? It's fine. I'll stay.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You go, I'll stay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You okay?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm fine. Go.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That looks really painful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: So painful. They might chop it.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'm sure Madam Pomfrey will fix it in a heartbeat.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's too late. It's ruined. It'll have to be chopped off.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's beautiful, isn't it? I'll never forget the first time I walked through those doors. It'll be nice to do it again as a free man. That was a noble thing you did back there. He doesn't deserve it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well I just didn't think my dad would have wanted his two best friends... to become killers. Besides, dead, the truth dies with him. Alive, you're free.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Turn me into a maggot! Turn me into a flobberworm! Anything but the dementors! Ron! Haven't I been a good friend? A good pet? You won't let them give me to the dementors, will you? I was your rat! Sweet girl! Clever girl! Surely you won't let them...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Get away from her!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I don't know if you know, Harry... but when you were born, James and Lily made me your godfather.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I can understand if you choose to stay with your aunt and uncle... but if you ever wanted a different home...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What? Come and live with you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's just a thought. I can understand if you don't want to.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Remus, my old friend! Have you taken your potion tonight? You know the man you truly are, Remus! This heart is where you truly live! This heart here! This flesh is only flesh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Expelliarmus!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Remus! Remus! Run! Run!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come on.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Wait! Wait!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hermione! Bad idea. Bad idea.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor? Professor Lupin?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Nice doggy. Nice doggy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: There you are, Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sirius!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come back here, Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sirius! No. Sirius! Expecto Patronum!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I saw my dad.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He sent the dementors away. I saw him across the lake.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Listen Harry, they've captured Sirius. Any minute the dementors are going to perform the Kiss.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You mean they're gonna kill him?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No. It's worse. Much worse. They're going to suck out his soul. Headmaster, you've got to stop them. They've got the wrong man.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's true. Sirius is innocent.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's Scabbers who did it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Scabbers?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He's my rat, sir. He's not really a rat. He was a rat. He was my brother Percy's rat. But then they gave him an owl...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: The point is, we know the truth. Please believe us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I do, Miss Granger. But the word of three 13-year-old wizards will convince few others. A child's voice, however honest and true... is meaningless to those who have forgotten how to listen. Mysterious thing, time. Powerful... and when meddled with, dangerous. Sirius Black is in the topmost cell of the Dark Tower. You know the laws, Miss Granger. You must not be seen. And you would do well, I feel, to return before this last chime. If not, the consequences are too ghastly to discuss. If you succeed tonight... more than one innocent life may be spared. Three turns should do it, I think. Oh, and by the way. When in doubt, I find retracing my steps to be a wise place to begin. Good luck.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What the bloody hell was that all about?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sorry, Ron, but seeing as you can't walk...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What just happened? Where's Ron?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: 7:30. Where were we at 7:30?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I don't know. Going to Hagrid's?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come on. And we can't be seen.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hermione! Hermione! Hermione, wait. Hermione, will you please tell me what it is we're doing?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You foul, loathsome, evil little cockroach!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hermione, no! He's not worth it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: This is not normal.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: This is a Time-Turner, Harry. McGonagall gave it to me first term. This is how I've been getting to my lessons all year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You mean we've gone back in time?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes. Dumbledore obviously wanted us to return to this moment. Clearly, something happened he wants us to change.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Good punch.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Thanks. Malfoy's coming.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Run.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Not a word to anyone, understood? I'm gonna get that jumped-up mudblood! Mark my words.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That felt good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Not good, brilliant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come on. We should be at Hagrid's.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Look. Buckbeak's still alive.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Of course. Remember what Dumbledore said? If we succeed, more than one innocent life could be spared. Let's go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Here they come. I'd better hurry.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Fudge has to see Buckbeak before we steal him. Otherwise, he'll think Hagrid set him free.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Scabbers, you're alive!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Keep a closer eye on your pet, Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's Pettigrew.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, you can't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He betrayed my parents. You don't expect me to sit here.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes, and you must! Harry, you're in Hagrid's hut now. If you just go bursting in, you'll think you've gone mad. Awful things happen to wizards who meddle with time. We can't be seen.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Fudge is coming. And we aren't leaving? Why aren't we leaving?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Are you mad?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ow!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Ow! That hurt!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Sorry. We're coming out the back door. Go!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Is that really what my hair looks like from the back?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I thought I just saw... Never mind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Let's go.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Okay, go, Harry. Go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Get away. Get off.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Minister, I really think I should sign as well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yes, very well. Perhaps it would be...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Okay, Buckbeak. Come quickly. Come with us now. Come on.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Keep trying. Come on. Quickly. Buckbeak. Okay? Quickly. Hurry up. Okay?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Your name only.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's such a very long name...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hurry up now, Buckbeak, okay? Come on. Come on, Buckbeak. Come and get the nice dead ferret. Come on. It's here. Come on, Beaky.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Here we are, minister. Follow me. Now, look there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Where?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Look beyond the rocks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What am I supposed to see?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Professor Dippet had that ling planted when he was headmaster.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Oh, yes. Indeed, indeed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And all the strawberries, you see?.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come on, Buckbeak. Come on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I see no strawberries.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Over there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Where?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Over there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: This way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Let's get this over, please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: All right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But where is it? I saw the beast, just now. Not a moment ago!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How extraordinary.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Buckbeak.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come now, Dumbledore. Someone's obviously released him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hagrid?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Buckbeak.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I don't think the minister's suggesting you had anything to do with this. How could you? You've been with us all the time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Right. Well, well. We must search the grounds.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, search the skies, if you must, minister. Meanwhile, I'd like a nice cup of tea or a large brandy. Oh, executioner, your services are no longer required. Thank you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You'll find no small glasses in this house, professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Come on. This way. This way, now. Now what?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We save Sirius.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No idea. Look. It's Lupin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Immobulus!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And Snape's coming.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And now we wait.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And now we wait.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: At least someone's enjoying himself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah. Hermione?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Before, down by the lake, when I was with Sirius... I did see someone. That someone made the dementors go away.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: With a Patronus. I heard Snape telling Dumbledore. According to him... only a really powerful wizard could have conjured it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It was my dad. My dad conjured the Patronus.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, but your dad's... Dead. I know. I'm just telling you what I saw.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Here we come.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You see Sirius talking to me there? He's asking me to come live with him.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That's great.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: When we free him, I'll never have to go back to the Dursleys'. It'll just be me and him. We could live in the country... someplace you can see the sky. I think he'll like that after all those years in Azkaban.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry! Run!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Let's go! What are you doing?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Saving your life!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Thanks. Great! Now he's coming for us.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah, I didn't think about that. Run!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: That was so scary.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Poor Professor Lupin's having a really tough night. Sirius! Come on!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: This is horrible.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What's that boy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Don't worry. My dad will come. He'll conjure the Patronus. Any minute now! Right there! You'll see!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry, listen to me. No one's coming.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Don't worry, he will! He will come! Sirius.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You're dying... both of you. Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Expecto Patronum!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You were right, Hermione. It wasn't my dad I saw earlier. It was me! I saw myself conjuring the Patronus before. I knew I could do it this time because... well, I had already done it. Does that make sense?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But I don't like flying...!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Bombarda!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I'll be forever grateful for this... to both of you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I want to go with you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: One day, perhaps. For some time, my life will be too unpredictable. And besides... you're meant to be here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But you're innocent.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: And you know it. And for now, that will do. I expect you're tired of hearing this... but you look so like your father. Except your eyes. You have...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: My mother's eyes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's cruel that I spent so much time with James and Lily, and you so little. But know this: The ones that love us never really leave us. And you can always find them... in here. You really are the brightest witch of your age.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: We have to go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: He's free. We did it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Did what? Good night.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How did you get there? I was talking to you there. And now you're there.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What's he talking about, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: I don't know. Honestly, Ron. How can somebody be in two places at once?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Hello, Harry. I saw you coming. I've looked worse, believe me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: You've been sacked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No. No. I resigned, actually.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Resigned? Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Well, it seems that somebody let slip the nature of my condition. This time tomorrow, the owls will start arriving and parents will not want... well, someone like me teaching their children.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: But Dumbledore...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Dumbledore has already... risked enough on my behalf. Besides, people like me are... Well, let's just say that I'm used to it by now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Why do you look so miserable, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: None of it made any difference. Pettigrew escaped.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Didn't make any difference? Harry it made all the difference in the world. You have uncovered the truth. You saved an innocent man from a terrible fate. It made a great deal of difference. If I am proud of anything... it is of how much you have learned this year. Now, since I am no longer your teacher... I feel no guilt whatsoever about giving this back to you. So now I'll say goodbye, Harry. I feel sure we'll meet again sometime. Until then... mischief managed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Stand back, I said! Or I'll take it upstairs if you don't settle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Harry. Wherever did you get it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Can I have a go, Harry? After you, of course.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: What are you talking about?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Quiet. Let the man through. I didn't mean to open it, Harry. It was badly wrapped. They made me do it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Did not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Did not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: It's a Firebolt. It's the fastest broom in the world.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: For me? But who sent it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: No one knows.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: This came with it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Go on, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: Yeah, let's see.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
dialogues: How fast is it, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bloody kids.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh no no no my Lord Voldemort. I only meant... perhaps if we were to do it without the boy..

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: NO! The boy is everything, it cannot be done without him and it WILL be done exactly as I say.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I will not disappoint you my lord.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Good. First, gather our old comrades. Send them a sign.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Nagini tells me the old caretaker is standing outside the door.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Step aside so I can give our guest a proper greeting.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Are you alright?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hermione. Bad dream. When did you get here?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Just now. You?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Last night.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Wake up. Wake up Ronald!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bloody hell.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Honestly. Get dressed, and don't go back to sleep. Come on Ron! Your mother says breakfast's ready.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Where are we actually going?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Don't know. Hey Dad! Where are we going?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Haven't the foggiest, keep up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Arthur! It's about time son.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Sorry Amos. Some of us had a bit of a sleepy start. This is Amos Diggory everyone, he works with me at the ministry. And this strapping young lad must be Cedric, am I right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Merlin's beard, you must be Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes sir. This way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Great great pleasure.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Pleasure to meet you too sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: That's it sir, just over there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Shall we? We don't want to be late.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Why are they all standing around that manky old boot?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: That isn't just any old manky boot mate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's a portkey.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Time to go. Ready?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What's a 'portkey'?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: After 3. One... Two...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Three!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Let go kids!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What??

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I bet that cleared your sinuses eh?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well kids, welcome to the Quidditch World Cup!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Parting of the waves I think old chap, see you at the match.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: See ya later Cedric.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Home sweet home.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Girls. Choose a bunk and unpack. Ron, get out of the kitchen we're all hungry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah get out of the kitchen Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah get out of the kitchen Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Feet off the table.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Feet off the table.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Feet off the table.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I love magic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Blimey Dad, how far up are we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well put it this way, if it rains... you'll be the first to know

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Father and I are in the minister's box, by personal invitation of Cornelius Fudge himself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Don't boast Draco. There's no need with these people. Do enjoy yourself won't you. While you can.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Come on up, take your seats. I told you these seats would be worth waiting for.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Come on!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's the Irish!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Here come the Bulgarians!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Krum!!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Krum!!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Krum!!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Good evening! It gives me great pleasure to welcome each and every one of you to the final of the 422nd Quidditch World Cup. Let the match begin!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: There's no one like Krum. He's like a bird the way he rides the wind. He's more than an athlete, he's an artist.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Think you're in love Ron?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Viktor I love you! Viktor I do!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Viktor I love you! Viktor I do!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: When we're apart my heart beats only for youuu!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: When we're apart my heart beats only for youuu!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: When we're apart my heart beats only for youuu!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Sounds like the irish have got their pride on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Stop! Stop it. It's not the irish. We've gotta get out of here. Now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Get back to the portkey everybody, and stick together. Fred, George... Ginny is your responsibility.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Been looking for you for ages. Thought we lost you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What is that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Stop! That's my son.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ron, Harry, Hermione are you alright?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Which of you conjured this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You can't possibly..

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Do not lie! You have been discovered at the scene of the crime!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Crime?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Barty, they're just kids.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What crime?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry it's his mark.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Those people tonight, in the masks... they're his too aren't they? they're his followers.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Follow me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: There was a man. Before. There.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: All of you, this way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry, who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I dunno. I didn't see his face.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Anything from the trolley? Anything from the trolley?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Anything from the trolley dears?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Packet of drewbals and a liquorice wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: On second thought, just the drewbals.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's alright I'll get it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Just the drewbals, thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Two pumpkin pasties please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Thank you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Anything sweet for you dear?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh no thank you I'm not hungry.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: This is horrible, how can the ministry not know who conjured it. Isn't there any security or?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Loads according to Dad, that's what worried them so much. Happened right under their noses.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's hurting again isn't it, your scar.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'm fine.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You know Sirius will want to hear about this. What you saw at the world cup, and the dream.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Clear the runway.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well there's something you don't see every day.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Now we're all settled in and sorted, I'd like to make an announcement. This castle will not only be your home this year but home to some very special guests as well. You see Hogwarts has been choosen...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: So Hogwarts has been choosen to host a legendary event. The Tri-Wizard tournament. Now for those of you who do not know, the tri-wizard tournament brings together three schools for a series of magical contests. From each school a single contestant is selected to compete. Now let me be clear, if choosen you stand alone. And trust me when I say these contests are not for the faint hearted, but more of that later. For now please join me in welcoming the lovely ladies of the Beauxbatons Academy of magic and their headmistress Madam Maxime.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Blimey, that's one big woman.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: And now our friends from the north, please greet the proud sons of Durmstrang and the high master Igor Karkaroff.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Blimey it's him, Viktor Krum!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Albus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Igor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Professor Dumbledore, my horses have travelled a long way. They will need attending to.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Not to worry Madame Maxime, our gamekeeper Hagrid's more than capable of seeing to them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: But you know Monsieur Hagrid, they drink only single malt whiskey.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You idiot!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Your attention please! I would like to say a few words. Eternal glory, that is what awaits the student who wins the tri-wizard tournament. But to do this that student must survive three tasks. Three extremely dangerous tasks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Wicked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: For this reason the ministry has seen fit to impose a new rule. To explain all this we have the head of the department of international magic cooperation Mister Bartimus Crouch.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bloody hell, it's Mad-Eye Moody.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Alastor Moody? The aura.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He was a catcher. Half the cells in Azkaban are full thanks to him. He's supposed to be mad as a hatter though these days.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: My dear old friend, thanks for coming.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: That stupid roof.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What's that he's drinking do you suppose?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I don't know but I don't think it's Pumpkin Juice.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: After much deliberation the ministry has concluded that for their own safety no student under the age of seventeen shall be allowed to put forth their name for the tri-wizard tournament. This decision is final.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: That's rubbish! You don't know what you're doing!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Silence!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The goblet of fire. Anyone wishing to submit themselves for the tournament merely write their name upon a piece of parchment and throw it in the flame before this hour on Thursday night. Do not do so lightly, if choosen there's no turning back. As from this moment the tri-wizard tournament has begun.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Alastor Moody.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ministry malcontent. And your new defence against the dark arts teacher. I'm here because Dumbledore asked me, end of story, goodbye, the end. Any questions? When it comes to the dark arts, I believe in a practical approach. But first, which of you can tell me how many unforgivable curses there are?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Three sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: And they are so named?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Because they are unforgivable. Use of any one of them will...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Will earn you a one way ticket to Azkaban. Correct. Now the ministry says you're too young to see what these curses do. I say different! You need to know what you're up against, you need to be prepared, you need to find somewhere else to put your chewing gum other than the underside of your desk Mr Finnigan!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Aw no way, the old codger can see out the back of his head.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: So, which curse shall we see first?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Give us a curse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well, my dad did tell me about one... The imperious curse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ahhh yes, your father would know all about that. Gave the ministry quite a bit of grief a few years ago. Perhaps this will show you why.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hello. What a little beauty.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Don't worry. Completely harmless.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: But if she bites... she's lethal!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What are you laughing at?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Talented isn't she? What shall I have her do next? Jump out the window? Drown herself?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Scores of witches and wizards have claimed that they only do did you-know-whose bidding under the influence of the imperious curse. But here's the rub, how do we sort out the liars? Another.. another.. Come on come on. Longbottom is it? Up.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Professor Sprout tells me you have an aptitude for herbology.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: There's the um... The cruciatus curse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Correct! Correct! come come. Particularly nasty. The torture curse.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Stop it! Can't you see it's bothering him, stop it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Perhaps you could give us the last unforgivable curse Miss Granger.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The killing curse. Only one person is known to have survived it. And he's sitting in this room.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Brilliant isn't he! Completely demented of course. Terrifying to be in the same room with, he's really BEEN there you know.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: There's a reason those curses are unforgivable, and to perform them in a classroom. I mean did you see Neville's face.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Neville?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Son. You alright?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Come on, we'll have a cup of tea. I want to show you something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Eternal glory, be brilliant wouldn't it? In three years from now we'll be old enough to be choosen.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah well rather you than me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Thank you thank you, well lads we've done it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Cooked it up just this morning.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's not going to work.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh yeah? And why's that Granger.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You see this? This is an age line. Dumbledore drew it himself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: So?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: So a genius like Dumbledore couldn't possibly be fooled by something pathetically dimwitted such as an age potion.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: That's why it's so brilliant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ready Fred?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ready George?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You said..

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Sit down please. And now the moment you've all been waiting for, the champions selection!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The Durmstrang champion is ... Viktor Krum!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The champion from Beauxbatons... Fleur Delacour

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The Hogwarts champion... Cedric Diggory.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Excellent! we now have our three champions! But in the end only one will go down in history. Only one will hoist this chalice of champions, this vessel of victory the tri-wizard cup!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry Potter. Harry Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No... No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry Potter!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Go on Harry. Harry for goodness sake.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He's a cheat! He's not even seventeen yet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry! Did you put your name in the goblet of fire?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Did you ask one of the older students to do it for you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You're absolutely sure?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well of course he is lying.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Neville! You're doing it again!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh, right sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Magical water plants of the highland Lochs?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
