dialogues: The hell he is. The goblet of fire is an exceptionally powerful magical object, only an exceptionally powerful conjurer could have hoodwinked it. Magic way beyond the talents of a fourth year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You seem to have given this a fair bit of thought Mad-Eye.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It was once my job to think as dark wizards do Karkaroff perhaps you remember?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: That doesn't help Alastor. Leave this to you Barty.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The rules are absolute, the goblet of fire constitutes a binding magical contract. Mr Potter has no choice, he is as of tonight... a tri-wizards champion.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: This can't go on Albus. First the dark mark, now this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What do you suggest Minerva?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Put an end to it. Don't let Potter compete.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You heard Barty the rules are clear.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well the devil with Barty and his rules. And since when did you accomodate them...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Master I too find it difficult to believe this mere coincidence, if we are to truly discover the meaning of these events perhaps we should for the time being let them unfold.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Do nothing?? Offer him up as bait? Potter is a boy not a piece of meat.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I agree with Severus. Alastor, keep an eye on Harry will you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I can do that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Don't let him know though, he must be anxious enough as it is... knowing what lies ahead. Then again, we all are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: How did you do it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Never mind. Doesn't matter. You could have let your best friend know though.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Let you know what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You know bloody well what.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I didn't ask for this to happen Ron. Okay? You're being stupid.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah that's me, Ron Weasley... Harry Potter's stupid friend.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I didn't put my name in that cup. I don't want eternal glory I just wanna be.. Look, I don't know what happened tonight and I don't know why, it just did ok.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Piss off.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What a charismatic quartet. Hello!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'm Rita Skeeter, I write for the daily prophet. But of course you know that don't you. It's you we don't know, you're the news. What quirks lurk beneath those rosy cheeks? what mysteries do the muscles mask? does courage lie beneath those curls? In short, what makes a champion tick. Me, myself and I want to know. Not to mention my rabid readers. So, who's feeling up to sharing? Mmm? Shall we start with the youngest. Lovely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: This is cosy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's a broomcupboard.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You should feel right at home then. Don't mind if I use the quill do you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh, no.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: So Harry, here you sit, a mere boy of twelve..

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'm fourteen.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: ...about to compete against three students. Not only vastly more emotionally mature than yourself but have mastered spells that you wouldn't attempt in your dizziest daydreams. Concerned?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I dunno I haven't really thought about it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Course you're not just any ordinary boy of twelve are you...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Fourteen.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The story's legend. Do you think it was the trauma of your past that made you so keen to enter such a dangerous tournament.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No I didn't enter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Course you didn't. Everyone loves a rebel Harry.  Scratch that last. Speaking of your parents, were they alive, how do you think they'd feel? proud? or concerned that your attitude shows at best a pathological need for attention, at worst a psychotic deathwish.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hey, my eyes aren't glistening with the ghosts of my past.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry. I couldn't risk sending Edward. It was since the world cup and the ministry's been intercepting more and more owls and she's too easily recognised. We need to talk Harry. Face to face. Meet me in the Griffindore common room at one o clock this Saturday night and make sure you're alone. P.S....

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The bird bites.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Sirius?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry Potter aged 12, suspect entrant in the tri-wizard tournament. His eyes swimming with the ghosts of his...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Sirius?! How...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I don't have much time Harry so let me get straight to it. Did you or did you not put your name into the goblet of fire?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Shh... I had to ask. Now, tell me about this dream of yours. You mentioned Wormtail and Voldemort, but who was the third man in the room?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I dunno.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You didn't hear a name?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No. Umm.. Voldemort was giving him a job to do. Something important.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What was that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He wanted... me. I dunno why, but he was gonna use this man to get to me. I mean it was only a dream right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes. It's just a dream. Look Harry, the deatheaters at the world cup, your name rising from that goblet these are not just coincidences. Hogwarts isn't safe any more.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What are you saying?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'm saying the devils are inside the walls. Igor Karkaroff, he was a deatheater. And no one, no one stops being a deatheater. Then there's Barty Crouch, heart of stone, sent his OWN son to Azkaban.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Do you think one of them put my name in the goblet?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I haven't a clue who put your name in that goblet Harry but whoever did it is no friend to you. People die in this tournament.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'm not ready for this Sirius.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You don't have a choice.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Someone's coming!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Keep your friends close Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Who you talking to?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Who says I was talking to anyone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I heard voices.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Maybe you're imagining things, wouldn't be the first time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You're probably just practicing for your next interview I expect.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Amazing. Amazing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Moody gave it to me. That day we had tea.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: We've already been through enough people why don't you just go and do it yourself? Ughh. What do you want me to say again?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ronald would like me to tell you that Seamus told him that Dean was told by Parvati that Hagrid was looking for you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Is that right? Well.... what?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Uhhh...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Dean was told by Parvati that... Please don't ask me say it again. Hagrid's looking for you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well you can tell Ronald...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'm NOT an owl!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Did you bring your father's cloak like I asked you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah I brought the cloak. Hagrid where are we going?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You'll see soon enough. Pay attention this is important.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What's with the flower? Hagrid have you combed your hair?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: As a matter of fact I have. You might like to try the same thing now and again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hagrid?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh, the cloak. Put the cloak on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bonsoir Olympe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh Hagrid. I thought you weren't coming, I thought perhaps... you had... forgotten me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Couldn't forget you Olympe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What is it you want to show me? When we spoke earlier you sounded so exhilirated.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You'll be glad you came. Trust me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ahh, c'est magnifique!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Can we get closer?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Dragons? That's the first task? You're joking.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Come on Harry. They're seriously misunderstood creatures.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Although, I have to admit that horntail is a right nasty piece of work. Poor Ron nearly fainted just seeing him you know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ron was here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh sure. His brother Charlie helped bring him over from Romania. Didn't Ron tell you that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No he didn't. He didn't tell me a thing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Cedric rules!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Like the badge?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Excuse me..

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Can I have a word?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Alright.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Dragons. That's the first task. They've got one for each of us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Are you serious? And Fleur and Krum, do they...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Right. Hey listen, about the badges. I've asked them not to wear them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Don't worry about it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You're a right foul git you know that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You think so?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I know so.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Anything else?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah. Stay away from me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Fine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Why so tense Potter? My father and I have a bet you see. I don't think you're gonna last ten minutes in this tournament. He disagrees. He thinks you won't last

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I don't give a damn what you or your father thinks Malfoy. He's vile and cruel, and you're just pathetic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'll teach you to cast when someone's back is turned.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Professor Moody what are you doing?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Teaching.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Is that a student?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Technically it's a ferret.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: My father will hear about this!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Is that a threat!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I could tell you stories about your father that would curl even your greasy hair boy! It doesn't end here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: We never use transfigration as a punishment, surely Dumbledore told you that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He might've mentioned it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well you will do well to remember it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: come with me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: That's a foal glass. Lets me keep an eye on my enemies. If I can see the whites of their eyes they're standing right behind me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Wouldn't even bother telling you what's in ther. You wouldn't believe it if I did. Now... what are you going to do about your dragon?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh... um... You know I just thought I'd...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Sit. Listen to me Potter. Your pal Diggory, by your age he could take a whistle into a watch and have it sing you the time. Miss Delacour, she's as much a fairy princess as I am. As for Krum, his head may be filled with sawdust but Karkaroff's is NOT. They'll have a strategy, and you can bet that it'll play to Krum's strengths. Hmm? Come on Potter. What are your strengths?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Um... I dunno.. I can fly. I mean I'm a fair flyer.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Better than fair the way I heard it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: But I'm not allowed a broom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You're allowed a wand.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Pssst! Harry? Is that you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: How are you feeling? OK? The key is to concentrate. After that you just have to...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Battle a dragon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Young love! Ohh how.. stirring. If everything goes unfortunately today you might make the front page.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You have no business here. This tent is for champions and friends.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No matter. We've got what we wanted.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Good day champions. Gather round please. Now you've waited, you've wondered and at last the moment has arrived. The moment only four of you can fully appreciate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What are you doing here Miss Granger?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh um.. Sorry I'll just go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Barty. The bag.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Champions, in a circle around me. Miss Delacour over here, Mr Krum, and Potter over here. Right. Miss Delacour, if you will...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The welsh green. Mr Krum...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The chinese fireball. Oooooh.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The swedish short-snout. Which leaves...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Nothing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The hungarian horntail. These represent very real dragons, each of which has been given a golden egg to protect. Your objective is simple, collect the egg. This you must do, for each egg contains a clue without which you cannot hope to proceed to the next task. Any questions?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Very well. Good luck champions. Mr Diggory the sound of the cannon...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Three of our champions have now faced their dragons and so each one of them will proceed to the next task. And now our fourth and final contestant.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Your wand harry! Your wand!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: We knew you wouldn't die Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Lose a leg.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Or an arm.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Pack it in altogether.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Go on Harry, what's the clue?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Who wants me to open it? You want me to open it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What the bloody hell was that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Alright everyone, go back to your knitting. This is gonna be uncomfortable enough without all you nosey sods listening in.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I reckon you'd have to be barking mad to put your own name in the goblet of fire.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Caught on have you. Took you long enough.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Wasn't just me who thought you'd done it. Everyone was saying it behind your back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Brilliant. That makes me feel loads better.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: At least I warned you about the dragons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hagrid warned me about the dragons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh no no, I did. Don't you remember? I told Hermione to tell you that Seamus told me that Parvati told Dean that Hagrid was looking for you. Seamus never actually told me anything, so it was really me all along. I thought you'd be alright, you know, after you figured that out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Who could possibly figure that out? That's completely mental.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah it is isn't it. Suppose I was a bit distraught.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Boys.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Look at this! I can't believe it she's done it again. Miss Granger a plain but ambitious girl seems to be developing a taste for famous wizards. Her latest prey sources report is none other than the Bulgarian bon-bon Viktor Krum. No word yet on how Harry Potter's taking this latest emotional blow.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Parcel for you Mr Weasley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Thank you Nigel.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Not now Nigel. Later. Go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I told him I'd get him Harry's autograph. Oh look mum's sent me something. Mum sent me a dress??

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well it does match your eyes. Is there a bonnet?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ginny these must be for you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'm not wearing that it's ghastly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What are you on about?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: They're not for Ginny they're for you! Dress robes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Dress robes? for what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The yule ball has been a tradition of the tri-wizard tournament since its inception. On Christmas eve night we and our guests gather in the great hall for well mannered frivolity. As representitives of the host school I expect each and every one of you to put your best foot forward, and I mean this literally because the yule ball is first and foremost... a dance.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Silence. The house of Godrick Griffindore has commanded the respect of the wizard world for nearly ten centuries. I will not have you in the course of a single evening besmirching that name by behaving like a babbling, bumbling band of baboons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Try saying that five times faster.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Now to dance is to let the body breathe, inside every girl a secret swan slumbers longing to burst forth and take flight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Something's about to burst out of Hilary but I don't think it's a swan.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Inside every boy a lordly lion prepared to prance. Mr Weasly, will you join me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Now, place your right hand on my waist.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Where?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: My waist.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Now bend your arm. Mr Filch...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: One two three, one two three, one two three.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oi! Never gonna let him forget this are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Never.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Never.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Everybody come together.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Boys, on your feet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Why do they always have to travel in packs? How are you supposed to get one alone to ask them...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Blimey Harry, you slayed dragons. If you can't get a date who can?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I think I'd take the dragon right now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I take after my mum. Though I didn't know her very well, she left when I was about three. No, not the maternal sort her, broke my dad's heart though. You know he was a tiny little fellow my dad, I could pick him up with one hand by the age of six and put him up in the dresser.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: And then he died when I was still in school. So I had to make me own way as it were. But enough of me, what about you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: This is mad. At this rate we'll be the only ones in our year without dates.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well, us and Neville!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: But then again he can take himself.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It might interest you to know that Neville's already got someone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Now I'm really depressed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well Hermione, you're a girl.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh well spotted.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Come on. It's one thing for a bloke to show up alone. For a girl it's just sad.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I won't be going alone because believe it or not someone's asked me. And I said yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bloody hell.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Look. We've just got to grit our teeth and do it. Tonight when we get back to the common room, we'll both have partners. Agreed?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Agreed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Cho!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Watch yourself on the stairs, it's a bit icey at the top.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ok thanks. Cho?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Um.  I just wondered if maybe you wanted to go to the ball with me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Sorry? I didn't catch that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Um. I was just wondering if maybe you wanted to go to the ball with me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh. Um. Harry I'm sorry but someone's already asked me. And well I've said I'll go with him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ok. Great. Fine. No problem. Good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry I really am sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What happened to you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He just asked Fleur Delacour out.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What did she say?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No of course.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: She said yes??

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Don't be silly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: There she was walking by. You know I like it when they walk. I couldn't help it, it just sort of slipped out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Actually he sort of screamed at her, it was a bit frightening.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What did you do then?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What else? I ran for it. I'm not cut out for this Harry. I don't know what got into me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hi Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hi Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hey!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bloody hell.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What are those??

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: My dress robes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well they're alright. No lace, no dodgy little collar.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well I expect yours are more traditional.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Traditional?? They're ancient! I look like my great aunt Tessie.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I smell like my great aunt Tessie. Murder me Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Leave it alone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Poor kid, bet she's alone in her room crying her eyes out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hermione of course. Come on Harry, why'd you think she wouldn't tell us who she's coming with?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Because we'd take the mickey out of her if she did.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Because nobody asked her. I would have taken her myself if she weren't so bleeding proud.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hello boys. Don't you look...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: ... dashing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Here you are Potter. Are you and Miss Patil ready?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ready professor?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: To dance. It's traditional that the three champions or in this case four are the first to dance. Surely I told you that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh well now you know. Oh, as for your Mr Weasly you may proceed into the great hall with Miss Patil.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: She looks beautiful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah she does.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Is that Hermione Granger? With Viktor Krum??

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No. Absolutely not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry. Take my waist.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Now.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hot isn't it? Viktor's gone to get drinks. Care to join us?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No, we'd NOT care to join you and Viktor.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What's got your wand in a knot?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He's a Durmstrang. You're fraternising with the enemy.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The enemy?? Who was it wanting his autograph? Besides, the whole point of the tournament is international magical cooperation, to make friends.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hrmph, I think he's got a bit more than friendship on his mind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Are you going to ask me to dance or not?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He's using you.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: How dare you! Besides I can take care of myself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Doubt it. He's way too old.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What? What? That's what you think?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah that is what I think.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You know the solution then don't you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Go on.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Next time there's a ball pluck up the courage and ask me before somebody else does, and not as a last resort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well that's completely off the point. Harry...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Where have you been? Nevermind! Off to bed both of you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: They get scary when they get older.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ron you spoil everything!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Let me see it again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ah yes, the time is close now. Harry! At last! Step aside Wormtail so I can give our guest a proper greeting!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You alright Harry? I just got in. Me!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry you told me you'd figured the egg out weeks ago. The task is two days from now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Really? I had no idea. I suppose Viktor's already figured it out.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I wouldn't know, we didn't actually talk about the tournament. Actually we didn't really talk at all, Viktor's more of a physical being. I just mean he's not particularly... Mostly he watches me study. It's a bit annoying actually. You are trying to figure this egg out aren't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What's that supposed to mean?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I mean these tasks are supposed to test you, in the most brutal way they're almost cruel. And um, I'm scared for you. You got by the dragon mostly on nerve, I'm not sure it's going to be enough this time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hey Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Cedric.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: How are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Spectacular.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Look I realise I never really thanked you properly for tipping me off about those dragons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Forget about it. I'm sure you would have done the same for me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Exactly. You know the prefects bathroom on the fifth floor?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's not a bad place for a bath. Just take your egg and mull things over in the hot water.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I must be out of my mind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'd try putting it in the water if I were you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Myrtle!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Long time no see.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I was circling a blocked drain the other day and could swear I saw a bit of polyjuice potion. Not being a bad boy again are you Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Polyjuice potion! Kicked the habit. Myrtle, did you say try putting it in the water?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well. That's what he did. The other boy, the handsome one. Cedric.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well go on, open it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Come seek us where our voices sound. We cannot sing above the ground. An hour long you'll have to look, to recover what we took.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Myrtle, there aren't Merpeople in the black lake are there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ahhh, very good. Took Cedric ages to riddle it out. Almost all the bubbles were gone...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry, tell me again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Come seek us where our voices sound.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The black lake, that's obvious.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: An hour long you'll have to look.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Again obvious, though I must admit potentially problematic

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Potentially problematic? When was the last time you held your breath under the water for an hour Hermione?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Look Harry, we can do this. The three of us can figure it out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hate to break up this scholar session but Professor McGonagall would like to see you in her office. Not you Potter, just Weasly and Granger.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: But sir, the second task is only hours away and...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Exactly. Presumably Potter is well prepared by now and could do with a good night's sleep. Go. Now! Longbottom!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Why don't you help Potter put his books back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You know, if you're interested in plants you'd be better with Gorshok's Guide to Herbology. Do you know there's a wizard in Nepal whose growing gravity resistant trees?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Neville. No offense, but I really don't care about plants. Now if there's a Tibetan turnip that will allow me to breathe underwater for an hour then great.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I don't know about a turnip but you can always use gilliweed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You're sure about this Neville.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Absolutely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: For an hour.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Most likely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Most likely?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well there is some debate among herbologists as to the effects of freshwater versus saltwater.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You're telling me this now? You must be joking.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I just wanted to help.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well that makes you sight better than Ron and Hermione. Where are they anyway?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You seem a little tense Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Do I?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Welcome to the second task. Last night something was stolen from each of our champions. A treasure of sorts. These four treasures, one for each champion, now lie on the bottom of the black lake. In order to win each champion need only find their treasure and return to the surface. Simple enough. Except for this, they will have one hour to do so and one hour only. After that they'll be on their own.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Put that in your mouth.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You may begin at the start of the cannon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What's the matter with him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I don't know I can't see him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh my god I've killed Harry Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The Beauxbatons champion Miss Delacour has unfortunately been forced to retire. She will take no further part in this task.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: But she's my friend too!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Only one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Get him another towel.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I want all the judges over here now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You saved her, even though she wasn't yours to save. My little sister!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Thank you! And you... . You helped!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well... yeah... a bit

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Merci.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hermione

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Are you alright? You must be freezing! Personally I think you behaved admirably.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I finished last Hermione.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Next to last.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Attention! Attention! The winner is... Mr Diggory!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: For showing unique command of the bubblehead shark. The way I see it, Mr Potter would have finished first had it not been for his determination to rescue not only Mr Weasly but the others as well. We've agreed to award him second place! For outstanding moral fibre.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: All that moral fibre eh?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Blimey even when you go wrong it turns out right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well done 'moral fibre'.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Congratulations Potter, fine achievement. Well done boy. I'm sorry we haven't spoken, after all your story is one I've heard many times. Quite remarkable. Tragic of course, to lose one's family. Never whole again are we? Still, life goes on. And here we stand. I'm sure your parents would be very proud today Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bartimus! Not trying to lure Potter into one of the ministry's summer internships are we? Last boy who went into the department of ministries never came out!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: And they say I'm mad.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: So I remember, I remember when I first met you all. Biggest bunch of misfits I've ever set eyes on. Always reminded me of myself a little. And here we all are, four years later.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: We're still misfits.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Maybe. But we've all got each other, and Harry of course. Soon to be! The youngest! Tri-Wizard champion there's ever been! Hooray!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Mr Crouch?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: A man has died here. And he won't be the last, you must take action.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I will not. In times like these the wizard world looks to its leaders for strength Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Then for once show them some.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The tri-wizard tournament will not be cancelled. I will not be seen as a coward.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: But surely that is what's right, no matter what others think.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What did you say? What did you say to me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Excuse me gentlemen, it may interest you to know that this conversation is no longer private.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry! Harry how good to see you again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I can come back later Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh not necessary Harry the minister and I are done. I'll be back in a moment. Minister, after you. Harry do feel free to indulge in a liquorice snack in my absence, but I have to warn you they're a little bit sharp.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Agh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Professor?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Igor Karkaroff, you have been brought from Azkaban at your own request to present evidence to this counsel. Should your testimony prove consequential. Counsel may be prepared to order your immediate release. Until such time you remain in the eyes of the ministry a convicted deatheater. Do you accept these terms?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I do sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What do you wish to present?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I have names sir. There was a Rosier, Evan Rosier.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Mr Rosier is dead.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Dead?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah took a piece of me with him though didn't he.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I didn't know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: If that is all the witness has to offer...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No! No! There was Rookwood, he was a spy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Augustus Rookwood? Of the department of ministries.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ya ya, the same. He passed information to you know who from inside the ministry itself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Very well. Counsel will deliberate. In the meantime you will be returned to Azkaban.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: NO! WAIT! PLEASE! I have more. Snape, Severus Snape.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The counsel is very much aware you have given evidence on this matter. Severus Snape was indeed a deatheater and prior to Lord Voldemort's downfall turned spy for us at great personal risk. Today he's no more a deatheater than I am.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's a lie! Severus Snape remains faithful to the dark lord.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Silence!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Unless the witness possesses any name of genuine consequence this session is now concluded.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh no no no no no. I heard about one more.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What's that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The name...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I know for a fact this person took part in the capture, and by means of the cruciatus curse, torture of the aurer Frank Longbottom and...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The name! Give me the wretched name!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Barty Crouch! ... Junior.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Get your hands off me you pathetic little men. Hello father.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You are no son of mine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Curiosity's not a sin Harry, but you should exercise caution. It's a pensieve, useful if like me you find your mind a wee bit stretched. It allows me to see what small things I've already seen. You see Harry I've searched and searched for something, some small detail. Something I might have overlooked, something that would explain why these terrible things have happened. Every time I get close to an answer it slips away, it's maddedning.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Sir, Mr Crouch's son, what happened to him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He was sent to Azkaban. Destroyed Barty to do it. But he had no choice, the evidence was overwhelming. Why do you ask?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's just that I had a dream about him. It was in the summer, before school. In the dream I was in a house and Voldemort was there only he wasn't quite human, and Wormtail was there too and Mr Crouch's son.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Have there been other dreams like this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes. Always the same one. Sir... these dreams, what I see, you don't think it's actually happening do you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I think it's unwise for you to linger over these dreams Harry, I think it's best that you simply...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Cast them away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's a sign Severus, you know what it means as well as I.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Potter! What's your hurry? Congratulations, your performance in the black lake was inspiring. Gilliweed, am I correct?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Ingenious. A rather rare herb gilliweed, not something found in your every day garden. Nor is this, know what it is?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bubble juice sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Veritaserum. Three drops of this and you-know-who himself will spill his darkest secrets. The use of this on a student is regrettably forbidden, however should you ever steal from my personal stores again, my hand might just slip over your morning pumpkin juice.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I haven't stolen anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Don't lie to me. Gilliweed might be innocuous, but boomslang skin? lacewing flies? You and your friends are brewing polyjuice potion and believe me I'm going to find out why.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Earlier today Professor Moody placed the tri-wizards cup deep within the maze. Only he knows its exact position. Now as Mr Diggory...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: and Mr Potter tied for first position they will be the first to enter the maze. Followed by Mr Krum...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The first person to touch the cup will be the winner. I've instructed the staff to patrol the perimeter, if at any point should a contestant wish to withdraw from the task he or she need only send up red sparks with their wands. Contestants, gather round.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: In the maze you'll find not dragons or creatures of the deep. Instead you'll face something more challenging. You see, people change in the maze. Oh find the cup if you can, but be very weary you could just lose yourselves along the way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Champions! Prepare yourselves.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: On the count of three... ONE...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Fleur? Fleur!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Get down!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No stop! He's bewitched Cedric.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Get off me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He's bewitched!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry! Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You know for a moment there I thought you were gonna let it get me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: For a moment so did I.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Some game huh?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Some game.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Go. Take it, you saved me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Together, on three. One, two, three!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You ok?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yeah, you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Where are we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I've been here before.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's a portkey. Harry the cup is a portkey.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I've been here before in a dream. Cedric, we have to get back to the cup? Now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What are you talking about?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Get back to the cup!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Who are you? What do you want?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Kill the spare.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Cedric!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Do it, now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bones of the father, unwillingly given.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Flesh of the servent willingly sacrificed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Blood of the enemy forcibly taken.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The dark lord shall rise again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: My wand Wormtail.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Hold out your arm.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Master. Thank you master.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The other arm Wormtail.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Welcome my friends. Thirty years it's been, and yet you stand before me as though it were only yesterday. I confess myself disappointed, not one of you tried to find me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Not even you, Lucius.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: My lord. Had I detected any sign or even a whisper of your whereabouts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: There were signs my friend, and more than whispers.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I assure you I never renounced the old ways. The face I have been obliged to present each day since your absence, that was my true mask.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I returned.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Out of fear, not loyalty. Still you have proved yourself useful these past few months Wormtail.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Thank you master, thank you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Oh, such a handsome boy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Don't touch him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry! I'd almost forgotten you were here. Standing on the bones of my father. I'd introduce you but word has it you're almost as famous as me these days. The boy who lived. How lies have fed your legend Harry. Shall I reveal what really happened that night thirteen years ago? Shall I divulge how I truly lost my powers? It was love. You see when dear sweet Lily Potter gave her life for her only son she provided the ultimate protection. I could not touch you. It was old magic, something I should have forseen. But no matter, no matter. Things have changed, I can touch you now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Astonishing what a few drops of your blood will do eh Harry? Pick up your wand Potter. I said pick it up, get up. Get up! You've been taught how to duel I presume yes? First we bow to each other. Come on now Harry the niceties must be observed, Dumbledore would not want you to forget your manners now would he? I said bow!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: That's better. And now...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Atta boy Harry, your parents would be proud. Especially your filthy mongrel mother. I'm going to kill you Harry Potter, I'm going to destroy you. After tonight no one will ever again question my powers. After tonight if they speak of you they'll speak only of how you begged for death, and I being a merciful lord obliged. Get up.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Don't you turn your back on me Harry Potter I want you to look at me when I kill you, I want to see the lights leave your eyes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Have it your way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Do nothing. He is mine to finish. He's mine!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry when the connection is broken you must get to the portkey. We can delay it for a moment to give you time but only a moment, do you understand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry take my body back will you? Take my body back to my father.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Let go. Sweetheart you're ready. Let go! Let go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry! Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Tell me what happened!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: He's back, he's back! Voldemort's back. Cedric, he asked me to bring his body back. I couldn't leave him, not there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It's alright Harry. It's alright, he's home, you both are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Keep everybody in their seats. A boy has just been killed. The body must be moved Dumbledore, there are... too many people.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Let me through! That's my son! My boy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Are you alright Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Does it hurt?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Not so much now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'd better take a look at it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The cup was a portkey. Someone had bewitched it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: What was it like? What was he like?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: The dark lord. What was it like to stand in his presence?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I dunno. It was like I'd fallen into one of my dreams. One of my nightmares.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Were there others? In the graveyard, were there others?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Um. I don't think I said anything about a graveyard Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Marvellous creatures dragons aren't they? Do you think that miserable oaf would have led you into the woods if I hadn't suggested it? Do you think Cedric Diggory would have told you to hold the egg under the water if I hadn't have told him first myself? Do you think Neville Longbottom the witless wonder could have provided you with gilliweed if I hadn't have given him the book that led you straight to it? Huh??

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: It was you from the beginning. You put my name in the goblet of fire. You bewitched Krum. But...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You won because I made it so Potter. You ended up in that graveyard tonight because it was meant to be so. And now the deed is done. The blood that runs through these veins runs within the dark lord. Imagine how he will reward me when he learns that I have once and for all silenced the great Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Severus...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Do you know who I am?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Albus Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Are you Alastor Moody? Are ya?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Is he in this room? Is he in this room?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry get away from there!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Are you alright Alastor?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'm sorry Albus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: That's Moody, but then who's...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Polyjuice potion.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Now we know who's been stealing it from your store Severus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: We'll get you up in a minute.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Barty Crouch Junior.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'll show you mine if you show me yours.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Your arm Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: You know what this means don't you? He's back. Lord Voldemort has returned.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Send an owl to Azkaban, think they'll find they're missing a prisoner.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I'll be welcomed back like a hero.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Perhaps. Personally I've never had much time for heroes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Today we acknowledge a really terrible loss. Cedric Diggory was as you all know, exceptionally hard working, intricately fair minded. And most importantly a fierce fierce friend. I think therefore you have the right to know exactly how he died. You see, Cedric Diggory was murdered by Lord Voldemort. The ministry of magic does not wish me to tell you this. But not to do so I think would be an insult to his memory. Now the pain we all feel at this dreadful loss reminds me, reminds us that while we may come from different places and speak in different tongues, our hearts beat as one. In light of recent events the bonds of friendship we made this year will be more important than ever. Remember that and Cedric Diggory will not have died in vain, you remember that. And we'll celebrate a boy who was kind and honest and brave and true right to the very end.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: I never liked these curtains. Set them on fire in my fourth year, by accident of course. I put you in terrible danger this year Harry I'm sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Professor, when I was in the graveyard there was a moment... um... when Voldemort's wand and mine sort of connected.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Priori Incantatem. You saw your parents that night didn't you? They reappeared.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No spell can reawaken the dead Harry I trust you know that. Dark and diffiult times lie ahead. Soon we must all face the choice between what is right what is easy. But remember this, you have friends here. You're not alone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Write to me. Promise.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Bye.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Au revoir Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Do you think we'll ever just have a quiet year at Hogwarts?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: No I don't think so.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Everything's going to change now isn't it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Yes.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Promise you'll write this summer. Both of you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Well I won't. You know I won't!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
dialogues: Harry will won't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, it's you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What should we do with him, Big D?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Big D? Cool name, but to me, you'll always be Ikkle Duddicums.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Shut up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ooo, tough guy. Not so tough in your bed, are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You boys go home now, or I'll be calling your parents!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I heard you talking in your sleep, last night. Crying. "No, don't kill Cedric, don't kill Cedric! Dad, help me, heeelp me! He's going to kill me! Boo-hoo!"

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Shut up, Dudley. I'm warning you...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Why should I?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Because if you don't I'll turn you into the idiot pig you are!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Not so brave now, are you Duddykins? Now tell your little friends to go away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: G-go home!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Get out of here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't you ever speak about that again. You understand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't point that thing at me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I said, DO YOU UNDERSTAND? !

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's happening?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Quiet!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dudley! Run!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come on! They break into a run. A dementor drifts into the alleyway in front of them. Skidding to a stop, Harry turns around, to find the other dementor cutting off the way back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dudley, no!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Lumos!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: "Expecto Patronum!'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Bow to death, Harry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Haaaaaaaarry!...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: "Expecto Patronum! '

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What the heii are those?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dementors.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What happened, Duddikins?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What the hell is a dementoid?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: They didn't--?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I want some answers!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We were attacked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: By those...things?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: They're evil. If they get the chance, they'll suck your soul out through your mouth.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How do you know that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Fought 'em off, eh, Dud? Gave 'em the ol' one-two?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You can't give a Dementor the 'ol one-two.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Why is he all right then?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Because I used magic to save his

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Lumos!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Who are all you lot?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Quiet, Dursley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, douse the light. We're exposed here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What are you doing here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We're your advanced guard, Harry. Dumbledore just sent us as soon as he heard about the attack. We're taking you to safety. We're just waiting for the all clear.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How'd he know? It just happened!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You didn't think Dumbledore'd let you wander around on your own, did you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, I don't believe you've met Nymphadora Tonks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Tonks, would you go get Harry's broom from the house?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's been going on? What's Lord Vol-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We're not talking about it here, it's too risky.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Blast it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mad-eye, dear, you do realize that's disgusting?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I want 365 degree visibility on the return trip.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How are we getting there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Brooms.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There's the first signal.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Right, let's go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: On your broom, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Form up! Form up around Harry. Make it snappy! The advanced guard surrounds Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stop being so cheerful, Mad-eye.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We must be ready. This would be the perfect moment for Voldemort to strike Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Uh, is that very likely?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No one's going to die.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There's the second signal!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mount your brooms, everyone. Here we go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The third signal, everyone. Let's

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stay in formation!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We need more height!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Contacts to the south!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mad-eye! You, Tonks, and Lupin take Harry! We'll slow them down!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There's the other one, Alastor!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Expecto--!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, leave it to us!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: "Expecto Patronum!'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Get Harry to the safe house!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come on, Potter! Keep moving!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But I can help!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Potter, getting yourself killed won't do a thing. Now move!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We're not far, now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Did you get rid of them?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: They're gone, Alastor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We're there!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Prepare for descent! Form up around Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stay here, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Clear!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Right, Harry, this way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Here, read this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come on, inside. Hurry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Get in, quick, Harry. Don't touch anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Filth! Scum! Half-breeds, mutants, freaks, begone from this place! How dare you befoul the house of my fathers?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Shut up, you miserable old hag! Quiet!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Blood traitor, abomination, shame of my flesh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Was that your--?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mother, yes. Dear old mum.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But...why here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hello, Harry dear.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mrs. Weasley!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sirius, the meeting is about to start!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, dear, go on upstairs-- quietly, if you please. They're all up there.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Let him breathe, Hermione!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, Harry! We've missed you! Are you furious with us, I bet you are!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Good to see you, mate.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
