movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come on, inside.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sorry we haven't written, Harry, but Dumbledore made us promise not to.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We wanted to, mate, we really did, but he thought they would get intercepted. There is an awkward silence.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He thought you would be safest there.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He was so angry when he heard. It was...scary...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So, why's he keeping me in the dark?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Didn't you bother asking?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We've only seen him twice, and not for very long. He's really busy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So I get to spend the summer with the Dursleys while you two are here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's not that fun, mate. Mum won't let us anywhere near the meetings.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You've still been here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's been going on?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We've already told you, we're not privyed to the meetings. But we do know a few things.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Some of the Order are following known Death Eaters, like Lucious Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's this Order everyone's talking about?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The Order of the Phoenix. Dumbledore started it last time to fight You-Know-Who. He only reorganized it after last term.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You can come down now, the meeting's over.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Arthur-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, the Ministry is furious with you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You'll have to go to an disciplinary meeting tomorrow.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Okay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm not really hungry. I think I'll go to bed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You surprise me, Harry. I figured the first thing you'd do is start asking about Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I wanted to, but I didn't think you'd tell me anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And that was quite right, Harry! You're much to young--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He has a right to know, Molly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's not your decision!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I know what Dumbledore said, but he needs to know something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's not a child, Molly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's not an adult either!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I only have Harry's best interests at heart.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's not your son.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Who else does he have, then?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's got me. He's like a son to me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What do you want to know, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Where's Voldemort? What's he doing?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's hiding for the moment, because the Ministry is ignoring his return and he doesn't want that to change.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The last person You-Know-Who wanted to alert was Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And what's his plan?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's building up his army again, just like before.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And you're stopping him from gaining followers?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We're doing our best, but it's proving to be...difficult.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You see, when the Ministry of Magic insists that Voldemort isn't back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But...why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Fudge likes being Minister of Magic. If it turns out that Voldemort came back under his watch, he'll be sacked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But you're telling people, right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, they think I'm a mass- murderer, Lupin is a werewolf, Tonks and Arthur would lose their jobs at the Ministry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But Dumbledore is doing all he can.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: If he keeps it up, he might end up in Azkaban. And that would give You- Know-Who a clear field to--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You-Know-Who wants something. Something he didn't have last time. A weapon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What kind of weapon?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm sorry, Harry, we can't say anything more.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Morning, dear! Did you have a good sleep?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No, my scar kept hurting.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah...nerves...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Good luck, Harry!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: They'll have to let you off, Harry... You were defending

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Thanks, Hermione.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What does he get a hug for?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, sure, that's why.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Me? Jealous? Of course not, it just doesn't seem fair that you hug one friend more than the other, is all...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Would you like a hug?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, come on, Harry. Time to go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Bye.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Good, good, not very many Muggles.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, come on Harry, in we go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I do love using the Fellytone! Now, let's see, what's the number again...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Welcome to the Ministry of Magic. Please state your business.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry Potter, disciplinary hearing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Pleas stand by.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Keep close, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ah, Perkins, good morn-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Arthur, they've changed the time of Potter's hearing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Blast! Dumbledore thought they might try that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It started at eight!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Good lord, that was five minutes ago! Come on, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Department of Mysteries.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Department of Mysteries?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yep, I've got no idea what they get up to in here, it's top secret.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come on, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've been there before...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Now, Harry, I find that highly unlikely...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There you are, Harry, in you go...good luck...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You're late.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Er...sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No matter, the accused will take his seat.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Very well, we are ready to begin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Witness for the Defence, Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ah...you...er...got our message that the time had changed, did you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well. The...ah...charges.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The charges against the accused shall now be read into the record: That the accused did with deliberation and fore-knowledge of the illegality of his actions, produce a patronus charm in full sight of a Muggle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, but-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Within full sight of a Muggle?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, but-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You produced a Patronus? A fully- formed Patronus, with a clearly- defined shape?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That is most remarkable, Mr. Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It doesn't matter how impressive it was!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But I did it because of the Dementors!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What do you mean?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My cousin and I were attacked by Dementors. That's why I had to use the Patronus, to drive them away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ah, yes, yes, another cock-and-bull story.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dementors in Little Whinging?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, come now, Susan. He's clearly lying.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We haven't got time to-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Very well. Weasley, fetch the witness.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Full name?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Arabella Doreen Figg, resident of Little Whinging.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So...what is your story?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I was sitting on my porch when I saw the two Dementors gliding towards the two boys.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What did the Dementors look like?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, they were big and wore great, tattered cloaks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Anything else?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I-I felt them. It was horrible...like I would never be happy again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Very well, you may go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Not very convincing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, I disagree. She described their effects very completely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So two Dementors just happen to be in Little Whinging? I think not...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Only if the Dementors are still taking their orders from only the Ministry these days. I believe you know my views on this, Cornelius.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, and they're nothing but bilge, Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Excuse me, Dumbledore, but did you just accused the Ministry of Magic of ordering an attack on this boy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dementors are irrelevant!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, yes, if he's telling the truth!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Very well, all for clearing the accused of charges?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: All opposed?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Excellent.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, you've been let off! That's wonderful!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You were tried by the full court?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I think so, yeah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Er...is Percy mad at you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ah...yes...I'm afraid we had a bit of a row. He, well, he sided with Fudge and the rest of us sided with Dumbledore, so Percy left.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, well, if it isn't Patronus Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What are you doing here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come now, Potter, I really don't think that private matters between the Minister and myself are any concern of yours.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Shall we continue this in your

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Certainly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: If he wanted to talk to the Minister, why down here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dunno, Harry. Some things are just beyond comprehension.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Settle down, you three!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sirius, we saw Fudge talking with Lucius Malfoy on Level Nine again. Tell Dumbledore, next time he comes in, would you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah, absolutely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, I'd better be off. I've got a bewitched vomiting toilet to deal with.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: George, remember that concept. Vomiting Toilet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Right you are, Fred.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Also, I'm covering for Tonks on guard duty later tonight, so I won't be back until late.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You all right, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah...just...my scar...the pain is getting stronger.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, I've got something that might interest you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This was the original Order of the Phoenix. Found it while we were cleaning.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There's Mad-eye and Dumbledore, right next to Dedalus Diggle; Marlene McKinnon, she was killed two weeks after this was taken...;

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: then there's Frank and Alice Longbottom, tortured into insanity by Death Eaters; Lupin, of course..

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My parents.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I miss them, Sirius...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I know, Harry, I know. I miss them too.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's not fair that I got to spend so much time with them and you didn't...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Why'd they have to die, Sirius, why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I know I'm not your father, Harry, but I'll always be there for you, if I can help it...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Kreacher, get out of here! Now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, how the old Mistress would weep to see the traitor in her house...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Who..who was that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Kreacher. He's been alone with the house for years, he's gone a bit funny.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, Ron and I, we've been named House Prefects! She hands Harry a letter.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What about you, Harry?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Are you sure? I would have thought you would get one!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm sure. Nothing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So...congratulations Ron, Hermione...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come on, lets go back downstairs!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, do go enjoy yourselves.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What is that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes it is, it's right there!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I see them too, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Er...you are?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Luna. Luna Lovegood.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, thanks Luna.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hagrid's cabin looks deserted.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I hope he's all right...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What if he were still on his...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What if he's still on his mission from Dumbledore?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah, could be.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I beg a few moments of your attention, as I have a few start of term announcements. Right off, our caretaker, the good Mr. Filch, has reminded me for what he says is the four-hundred and sixty-second time that he had an annually updated list of various banned items, usually introduced by our humour experts Fred and George Weasley...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: ... which are posted in an extensive list on the door to Mr. Filch's door.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Also, we have two staffing changes this year. Professor Grubby-Plank will be taking the post of Care of Magical Creatures post as Professor Hagrid is on...extended leave.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Additionally, we have Professor Umbridge, who has kindly agreed to fill the post of Defense Against the Dark Arts--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hem, hem, Headmaster, if I could address the school?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Thank you, Headmaster. Now, how are we all doing tonight? I thought I would just say a few words. I am here at the Ministry of Magic's bequest, under Educational Decree twenty-two, which states that if the Headmaster of Hogwarts is unable to fill any teaching post the Ministry shall select one for the position.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So why didn't your mum want you to come back to Hogwarts, Seamus?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Me mam didn't want me to come back to Hogwarts...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well...because of you...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What did I do?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She...well, she figure's you're, well...you're lying about You-Know- Who and Dumbledore's a right nutter...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Where'd she get that from?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No one believes me, Hedwig. No one...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm alone...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sorry, Professor...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hmm, let's see, five points from Gryffindor for coming in late.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Now, as I was saying before Mr. Potter interrupted with his antics, your Defense Against the Dark Arts education has been rather fragmented and disjointed in your past classes, hasn't it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I will be following a pre-approved Ministry-prepared, theory-centered Defense lesson plan.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Copy this down.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I wanted to know something about your course aims.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, they should be perfectly self- evident.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But surely the whole point of Defense against the dark arts is practical application?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Miss Granger, this class has been approved by Ministry experts. Are you a Ministry Expert?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No, but-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Then you have no business challenging those who are. We will be learning about spells in a safe, risk-free environment-

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But we've got O.W.L.s coming up! You expect us to do the spells with no practice?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What good's theory in the real world?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What about Lord Voldemort?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ten points from Gryffindor, Mr. Potter. Let me set the record straight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Some of you have been told that a certain dead wizard has returned. This is a lie.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It-is-NOT-a-LIE!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mr. Potter, you have just landed yourself in detention!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So, according to you, Cedric Diggory dropped dead? Or are you calling me a murderer?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The boy's death was a tragic accident.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It was MURDER! I saw it happen!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mr Potter, you have earned yourself a week's worth of detentions!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah, talk to somebody who cares.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That goes to Professor McGonagall, dear.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah. But she called me a liar!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Good. Off you go.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How can Dumbledore let that horrible woman teach? And when we're taking our OWL tests too!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You reckon she's here to spy on us?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, not us specifically, but definitely Dumbledore and the Order.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh! Sorry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah, well, you're going to have to get out of it somehow. We're holding tryouts for Keeper now Wood's gone, and I wanted to have the whole team there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'll never get out of it, Angelina.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, just...don't do it again!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, Harry, shall we start on Snape's report?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Later, I've got detention.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Good luck, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ah, Potter. Sit down.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You're going to be doing lines, tonight, Mr. Potter, and you'll be using this quill.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You will write "I will not tell lies" until I tell you to stop. Understand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There's no ink.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh...you won't need ink.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Problem, Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That's enough for this evening. Same time, tomorrow, and we'll see if we can get the message to sink in a bit deeper.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hey, Harry.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Have you seen Ron? I can't find him anywhere.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No, I haven't.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's been acting fishy all week. He's up to something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That's enough for tonight, Potter. Let's see that hand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry! I tried out for Quidditch Keeper at the tryouts! I'm on the team!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry--bloody hell!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's got to be taken to the hospital wing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You said she was making you do lines!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She is. But the quill has some sort of spell on it. It uses blood for ink.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That old hag! She's sick!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No, I'm telling anyone.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, I really think you should tell--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I don't need his help. I don't need anyone's help.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hagrid's still not back yet. I hope he's all right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've asked Sirius about it.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, you can't write to him! Owls are being intercepted, it isn't safe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't worry, Hermione, I wrote it in code. Anyway, I figured I need to tell someone about Umbridge. My scar hurt again last night in detention.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Always knew she was a bit fishy.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You think she's working for You- Know-Who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, it's a possibility, isn't it?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I suppose so. He could have her under the Imperious Curse, though it's unlikely. Dumbledore'd know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah, but Dumbledore didn't have a choice, did he? She'd been sent here by the Ministry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Greetings my children. I sense even now that many of you have already made the transition into the beyond!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Today we will be continuing our interpretation of prophetic dreams. Please divide into your groups and discuss your recent night time visions using the text as a guide.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And how long have you been at this post?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I understand you are the descendent of the famous Seer Cassandra Trelawney?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I am.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And you are the first since Cassandra to have the Second Sight?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: These things tend to skip...several...generations.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Of course.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Now, if you would kindly make a prediction for me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The Inner Eye does not See upon command!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My dear boy, your dream diary, if you please!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My dear boy! My poor boy! These dreams are evil portends!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, yes, oatmeal! Are you telling me you cannot see the signs? The foretelling of suffering and death?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Er...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Perhaps you are not as in the beyond as the others.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, if that's the best you can do, Professor, I will be going.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Where are we going, Hermione?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There we are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: "The Hog's Head," Hermione?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come on, I'll explain in a minute.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hermione, what's going on?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: These are some people I mentioned my Defense Against the Dark Arts idea with.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You mean about us teaching ourselves?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hey, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hey, Neville.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Uh...same to you, Luna.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hear, hear!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Obviously, this will help us pass our O.W.L.s, but more importantly, it gives us the ability to protect ourselves from...Lord Voldemort. Several people jump or wince in fear at the name.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That's the first time you've said his name.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How do we know You-Know-Who's really back?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dumbledore believes he is.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You mean Dumbledore believes him.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That's true, but I think we're drifting from the purpose--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's okay, Hermione.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I believe Voldemort's back because I fought him last year. Dumbledore's already told the school that. If you didn't believe him you won't believe anyone.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well...anyway...uh, I think that in order to learn properly we'll need a teacher.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But we're all students. None of us has the experience to--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Someone here does. Everyone looks at her. She is staring directly at Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I for one would like to know why Potter's qualified and the rest of us aren't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: One of the portraits said you'd killed a Basilisk in the Chamber of Secrets with that sword in Dumbledore's office.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Uh...well, yeah, I did.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Blimey, Harry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Wow...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Can't forget that he saved the Sorcerer's Stone from You-Know-Who in his first year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And last year he got through the Triwizard Tournament!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Not to mention you dueled with You- Know-Who all alone and he still couldn't kill you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And you fought off those dementors that attacked you this summer.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So all in favor of taking lessons from Harry?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Where are we going to meet?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What about an unused classroom?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That might work. I'll look into that.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ok, good.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I think we should put our names down, so we know who was here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I don't know...if it were found...I mean, Umbridge wouldn't like what we're doing...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Honestly, Ernie, do you think I'd just leave it lying around? Besides, its enchanted.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Also, what should we call ourselves?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What about the Anti-Unbridhe League?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I think it should be Dumbledore's Army. There is excited agreement. Harry smiles at her.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We'll let you know when we're going

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I think that went well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And did you see Cho, Harry?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, she couldn't keep her eyes off you, could she?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, you won't believe...that Umbridge woman...this is too much!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's she done now?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Follow me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: "By order of the Hogwarts High Inquisitor: All student organizations, societies, teams, groups, and clubs are henceforth disbanded. Permission to reform must be approved by High Inquisitor Umbridge. No student organization can exist without the knowledge and approval of the High Inquisitor. Any student found to be a part of an illegal organization will be expelled immediately."

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She refused to allow us to reform the Gryffindor team. We had to go to Dumbledore to get her to allow it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Not only that, but what about the

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This isn't a coincidence.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She knows.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She can't!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Look, we don't know how many people could have overheard our meeting and told her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Or somebody at the meeting could have blabbed to her.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No, they couldn't have. The parchment we all signed was enchanted, like I said. No one can betray the D.A. without us knowing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What would we do without you, Hermione?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hedwig!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She's hurt!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She doesn't look very good.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, you'd better take her to Professor Grubby-Plank. She'll know what to do.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Where on earth are you going at this time of night?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's Hedwig. I think she's been attacked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, I think you might be right, Potter. She looks at Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: London.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, give her to me. I'll run her

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There you are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Bear in mind, Potter, that channels of communication in and out of Hogwarts are being watched, won't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Good. Now, off to bed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mr. Harry Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dobby! What are you doing here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dobby is cleaning, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What is it, Dobby.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dobby...Dobby wishes he could help Harry Potter. Dobby has heard him muttering in his sleep.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't worry about it, Dobby. But I don't think you can help me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Actually, there is something you can do, Dobby.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I need a room where twenty-eight people can practice Defense Against the Dark Arts without the teachers knowing. Especially Professor Umbridge.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dobby knows of the perfect place, Harry Potter! It is the Room of Requirement, sir. You can only use the room in times of great need. Whatever you need will be there for you, Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That's brilliant, Dobby!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dobby can show you now, if you wish, Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Better not, Dobby. School is pretty intense right now. We'll do it ina few months, before the holidays.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: ...and Slytherin is up forty to ten. Alica with the quaffle!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Weasley is our King, Weasley is our King, He always lets the Quaffle in, Weasley is our King!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Just ignore them, Ron!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I should thank you, Weasley. You're definitely our best player!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, are you all right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Bet you loved that, Potter! Saved Weasley's neck, didn't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've never seen a worse Keeper! Maybe we should add some more verses to our little song. About his filthy mother!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And his pathetic loser of a father too!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But then, you like the Weasleys, don't you? How can you stand the stink? I guess it reminds you of your own dear mother!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Impedimenta!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't make me stupify you, Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My office. Now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: In all my thirty-nine years at this school, I have never seen such a disgusting display.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Malfoy provoked us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Of course he wanted to provoke you! He'd just lost!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I cannot express in words the disappointment I feel right now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What is it, Dolores?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I thought you might need some additional authority in dealing with these two.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You thought wrong. Now kindly remove yourself from my office.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Now, I don't care what Malfoy said. Your performance out there was shameful. Fifty points from Gryffindor, and I'm giving you both a week's worth of detentions.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I hardly think that's an adequate punishment for this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Educational Decree Twenty-Five. It gives me, as High Inquisitor, the power to give punishments and privileges, and to alter those given out to students by other members of the staff.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So, I think a life-long ban from playing quidditch should do the trick for both of these. Oh, and this one's twin as well. He was going to attack Malfoy as well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ban us...for life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, indeed, Mr. Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ah, I'll take your brooms as well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, have a wonderful day.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You've--!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My hands are tied, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I can't believe it...three players banned for life in one day...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm going to resign.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You can't!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm horrible! I should never have joined.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: If you quit, we'll be out four players!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This is the worst day of my life.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I know something that could cheer you up.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hagrid's back!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hagrid, what happened to you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've fine, I tell yeh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come off it, Hagrid! We're not blind!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Can' answer tha', I'm afraid. Top secret, that is. Business of the Order.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We know you were looking for giants, Hagrid. Dumbledore said so last year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh. Well, yeah, I was, then. Went with Madame Maxime. Took us a month to get to their camp.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: A month?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: O' course! Can' do magic, not with the Ministry followin' us all the way. Plus, giants aren't fond o' wizards. Don' trust 'em.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So what did you do when you found them?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So...no giants are coming?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, not righ' away. We brought our message, an' I expec' a fair few'll remember it afore teh end comes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Glad to see all of you could find this place all right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hey, Harry, what is all this stuff?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Loads of Defense Against the Dark Arts equipment. Hopefully we'll be able to get to all of it before the end of term.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh please. Professor Lockhart taught us that in second year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Lockhart didn't teach as much as prune himself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Besides, it works. I used it against You-Know-Who last June. It saved my life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Right. Well, let's split into pairs and give it a go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Expelliarmus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well done, Neville!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Look here, you lot! Neville's really got the hang of this one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Expelliarmus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I did it! I did it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Never forget this spell, Neville. It could save your live some day.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Okay, everyone. We've done a lot today, and I've seen some great improvement. That's it for now. We'll meet back here, same time next week!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's wrong with him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Get McGonagall! Go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry! HARRY!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Wake up, Potter. Wake up. Please...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mr. Weasley's been attacked!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You dreamed this, Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No, I saw it happen! I...I was there...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You're sure this happened, Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We're going to see the Headmaster, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Professor McGonagall, and...ah...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What can I do for you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, Potter has had some kind of nightmare...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How did you see this? How were you positioned when you saw it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh. Uh...I was the snake. I saw it from the snake's perspective.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Is Arthur seriously injured?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You were listening?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Naturally.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Raise the alarm. We must make sure Arthur is found by the right people.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Many of our previous headmasters and mistresses have portraits in other institutions, allowing them to move between them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Fawkes, we will need a warning.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Naturally, naturally.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What news?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I shouted until someone came. They carried him up seconds ago. He doesn't look good. Covered in blood...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dumbledore, I've just seen them arrive at St. Mungos. Apperated there moments ago. He looks really bad.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Minerva, the rest of the Weasleys will need to be awoken.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Phineas.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Phineas, I need you to visit your other portrait. Tell Sirius what happened and that we are coming to stay for a while.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's late, Dumbledore...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm going, I'm going...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sit, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: As you are well aware, I will be teaching you Occlumency. The headmaster feels you should learn this form of magic to defend yourself against the Dark Lord, who is skilled at Legilimency.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's that, Professor?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Legilimency is the ability to extract thoughts and feelings from others.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Voldemort can read minds?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: As usual, you have all the subtlety of a stone wall, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The mind is not a book, of which any page can be examined. The mind is complex and multi-layered.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So he could read our minds right now?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But hasn't it helped so far? I mean, it saved Mr. Weasley's life, didn't it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, it did, but at the expense of our advantage. The connection between you was so powerful during your vision of the snake that the Dark Lord became aware of it. The Headmaster fears that he may try to use this to his advantage, to manipulate you through false visions.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Wand out, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You may use any spell you can think of to try and repel me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What are you going to do?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I am going to break into your mind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, you stopped me eventually. Ideally, you should repel me with your mind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Clear your mind, Potter. Abandon

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come on, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've been there before...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What was that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've just realized...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Realized what, Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's in the Department of Mysteries, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What did you say?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That corridor, I've been dreaming about it for months...it leads to the Department of Mysteries, I'm sure of it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There are many things in the Department of Mysteries, Potter, none of which concern you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I can do whatever I wish!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This is my home!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Not anymore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Now remove yourself from this castle!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I have the authority, Headmaster!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, I agree with you, Professor Umbridge. You do have the power to dismiss my teachers. However...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: -..-You cannot send them from this

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And what of her quarters when I appoint a new teacher.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Happily, that will not be necessary. I have found a successor

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: ...the Ministry can only appoint new teachers if I cannot find one. I think you will find him suitable enough.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This is Firenze.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So you're saying this weapon You- Know-Who's after is in the Department of Mysteries?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's got to be.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That's got to be what Surgis Podmore was doing in the Ministry when he was arrested.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Probably. Mr. Weasley was probably there when he was attacked, too. That must be what the Order's guarding!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But why the Department of Mysteries?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It makes perfect sense, Ron. It's got to be something the Ministry's been developing. Something top secret.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Look at this. There's been a mass escape from Azkaban.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Bloody hell!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: They're all Death Eaters!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Since I had received information some time ago that Potter and a number of other students had met in the Hog's Head to start an illegal group--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm not sure that's true, Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm sorry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: In point of fact, when young Potter met those students it was not illegal.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But two days later, Educational Decree Twenty-Four was introduced.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Again, quite correct. However, I wonder if you have any evidence that proves this group has been meeting since then?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I have a witness right here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Correct again. I must confess that I was, however, under the impression that this young girl only told you a meeting was going on tonight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Let's ask her, shall we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You can shake your head for an

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What do you mean by shaking your head, girl?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But what about Potter? He was the

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Why are you shaking your head, girl?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Again, I cannot have you manhandling my students, Professor Umbridge.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My apologies, Headmaster. I forgot myself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, what about the meeting tonight?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So, Dumbledore, you've been behind this whole thing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, Minister. You've caught me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I would never call you that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This has all been your doing! You've been recruiting students for your army!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Quite correct, Cornelius.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I knew it! I KNEW it! You've been plotting against me all this time!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This is too good to be true!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Professor, no!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Quiet, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, shut up, Potter. So, you'll be coming with us to the Ministry--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ah, yes. I was wondering when we'd hit that little snag.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I see no snag, Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But I do. You seem to be laboring under the delusion that I would 'come quietly.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Resisting arrest, now are you, Dumbledore?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You would really take on two Aurors, Dolores, and myself, Dumbledore?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Naturally. All of you did rather well on your spellwork at this school, but if you attempt to take me in by force, I'm afraid I shall have to hurt you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Are you all right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, we're fine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm not going into hiding. Fudge will soon regret removing me from Hogwarts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm so sorry, Professor!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's fine. Now listen to me, Harry. Keep studying Occlumency! Do everything Professor Snape tells you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Close your mind! You will understand, in time. Fudge is stirring.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Lay back down. They must not think we have had time to talk.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Find him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: "By Order of the Ministry of Magic: Dolores Jane Umbridge will replace Albus Dumbledore as Head of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry."

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My first act as your new Headmistress is to form an Inquisitional Squad, lead by Draco Malfoy. They will report directly to me about the goings on in the halls of this school.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Furthermore, our good caretaker, Mr. Filch has requested we reinstate the 'old punishments.' I have decided that there is no reason we shouldn't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Are you sure you can't? Hagrid said it was important.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No way. Quidditch practice. If I don't show up, Angelina'll go mad.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hagrid...we've been walking for a good hour.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Its jus' up ahead, here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Could you tell us what it is, Hagrid, please?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: All righ'. Well, I'm showin' yeh this, because tha' Umbridge woman put me on probation. I can' last much longer afore I get sacked like Trelawney.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We won't let her!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Of course we'll help.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Knew yeh'd say yes!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Okay, real quiet like from here on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There we are!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hagrid, I thought none of them wanted to come!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: None o' them did, Hermione! I didn' have much ruddy choice inna matter! I couldn' leave 'im!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, why, Hagrid? Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's me brother!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, half-brother anyway. Me mum had 'im afore she died.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Here. I'll introduce yeh to Grawp!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeh all righ', Grawp?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Look wha' I brough' yeh, Grawpy! Two new friends an' all. We 'ave Harry Potter here, see? An' over here is Hermy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hermy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Bad Grawpy! Bad boy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We don' attack our friends, Grawpy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: See, he don' know any better.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Anyway, all yeh need teh do is go an' talk to 'im. Give 'ima bit o' company.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh blimey...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I thought we told you that you were no longer welcome in this place, Hagrid. You or that beast you brought from afar.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: S'not up to you who comes and goes in this forest.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You stopped us from invoking our punishments on Firenze for becoming the servant of the humans at

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stopped yeh from committin' murder, yeh mean!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, you'll tolerate 'im as long as he's here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We allow you to pass this time, Hagrid, because you have young with you. But the next time you enter this forest, your life is forfeit.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Have you been practicing, Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, we shall see, won't we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Put that away, James.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm bored. Wish it was full moon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Easy for you to say.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This should cheer you up, Sirius. Look. Sirius grins.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: All right, there, Snivellus?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Expelliarmus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Impedimenta!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You just wait...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And now, the moment you've all been waiting for--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Leave him alone, James Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Another charity case, Lily?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What has he done to you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Nothing. It's more the fact that he exists, you see...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Semper---

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Levicorpus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Leave him alone, Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I will if you go out with me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I wouldn't go out with you if it were a choice between you and the giant squid! Now let him down.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Locomotor mortis!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I said, leave him alone!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't make me hex you, Lily.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Then let him go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Fine!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You're lucky Lily was here, Snivellus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I don't need help from a mud-blood like her!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Apologize to her! Now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't make him apologize. Honestly, you're as bad as he is!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You make me sick, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Lily! Hey Lily!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Having fun, Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Been enjoying yourself?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Amusing man, your father...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I--sorry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You will repeat what you saw to no

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No, of course not!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You had better not, Potter, or you will experience a pain so horrible you will wish you had never been born!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Now get out of my sight! Do not set foot in this office ever again!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Can you reach it? Can you take it for me, Black?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I would rather die!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, you will die. Eventually. But there are hours, even days of pain awaiting you before then.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm going to enjoy this, Black. I have you, and soon I shall have the weapon. And then not even your pathetic Order can stand in my way! Voldemort laughs, a horrible spine-chilling laugh.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Are you all right, Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Pressure of exams. It happens. Take a breath, and maybe you'll be ready to go back in. Time is nearly up, but---

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No--no, I've done all I can.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You all right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Voldemort! He's got Sirius! In the Department of Mysteries!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How do you know?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I just saw it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How're we going to get there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: To the Department of Mysteries?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We've got to do something!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How'd Voldemort get into the Ministry of Magic without being seen? I mean, he and Sirius are the two most wanted wizards in the world...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah. They can't just waltz into the Ministry of Magic!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It just seems so unlikely, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I won't let Sirius die!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We heard Harry yelling. What's up?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Voldemort's broken into the Department of Mysteries. He's got Sirius there!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Think, Harry! Voldemort knows you! He knows you'd rush off to save Sirius.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There isn't anyone else, Hermione! Everyone from the Order is gone!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Anything we can do to help?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No, there isn't!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes, they can, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Before we do anything, we need to establish that Sirius really isn't at Headquarters. Which means we'll need to break into Umbridge's office.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Might be able to.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Just give us a few seconds.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Mind you, it's got to be really good!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's been too quiet around here

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Time we did some real damage to this place.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
