movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We'll also need to keep everyone away from her office.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We can do that! Me and Luna'll guard the hallway.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We'll probably only manage five minutes or so.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That's all we'll need.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Right. You've got ten minutes to get to Umbridge's office. And whatever you do, stay away from the Astronomy Tower for the next couple of hours.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That was worth it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've got you now!

dialogues: Thank you for playing, one and all.

dialogues: Sirius! Lupin? Hello?

dialogues: So, turning a hallway into a swamp is funny, is it?

dialogues: Fairly amusing, yeah.

dialogues: Well, now you're going to learn what happens to wrongdoers in my school.

dialogues: This was never your school! Hogwarts is Dumbledore's school!

dialogues: Well, now you're going to get your

dialogues: You know, I don't think we are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

dialogues: Master does not tell Kreacher where he goes.

dialogues: Potter, if I want nonsense shouted at me, I shall inform you. He sweeps from the office. Umbridge is enraged.

dialogues: We've played nicely, Potter. You

dialogues: Shut up, Potter! Now talk, you silly girl! Who were you talking to?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We were trying to find Professor Dumbledore. We had to tell him...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That it's ready. The weapon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Much further, is it?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, yes. It's very well hidden.

dialogues: What are you doing in our forest?

dialogues: Your forest? This forest belongs to the Ministry of Magic!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stay back, you beasts!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You cannot attack me! Any attack on a wizard by a half-breed--

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't call them that!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You dare to insult us?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come no closer!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Incarcerous!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ingrates! Animals! Filthy half- bloods!

dialogues: What of these two?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: They have been here with Hagrid. They have heard the warnings and disobeyed. They must suffer the consequences!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: God, I can't wait until all you Weasleys have been expelled. Your stench has been fouling this castle for too long.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Shut up, Malfoy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That's for speaking to me. You know, you Weasleys are just as bad as Mudbloods!

dialogues: Great plan, Hermione.

dialogues: There are other ways to fly.

dialogues: I mean, they can fly, and they're

dialogues: There's nothing there, Harry.

dialogues: I can see them too.

dialogues: All right, then. Get on one, and we'll be off.

dialogues: And what about those of us who can't see them? Luna comes over to them.

dialogues: I'll show you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Never again...

dialogues: What now, Harry?

dialogues: All right, come on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Department of Mysteries.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Where is everyone?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The Ministry closed a half-hour ago. I expect they all went home.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That's how Voldemort got in unnoticed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This is it. Come on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stay close.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Now where?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I don't understand. In my dream,

spellname: Launch an object up into the air

dialogues: Who's there?

dialogues: There's no one here, Harry. This isn't the right room.

dialogues: I do. It's coming from the Veil.

dialogues: Sirius...yeah...

dialogues: Alohomora!

dialogues: Whatever's in there, the Ministry sure doesn't want anyone getting to it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This is it! Come on!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This is it. This is where Sirius is!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's in here somewhere.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air

dialogues: I don't think Sirius is here.

dialogues: Er...it's got your name on it.

dialogues: What's my name doing here?

dialogues: Don't touch it, Harry!

dialogues: Yeah, Harry, don't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's got my name on it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I warned you before that one day you would come to a sticky end, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Where's Sirius?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We don't have him, if that's what you mean. Harry is stunned.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The Dark Lord knows your weakness for heroics, Potter. All it took was a little nudge to get you here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Now give me that prophesy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What prophesy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That prophesy. Now hand it over or we'll have to use wands on you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Go ahead.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Very brave of you, Potter. Or are you foolish?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come and find out!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Really, Potter. You expect to defeat all of us with your little school friends? Now hand it over, and they won't have to die here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I haven't escaped from Azkaban for this!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No! If the prophesy is smashed--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Take the youngest girl. We'll see how committed Potter is as we torture her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You even try to take her and I'll smash this thing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So, what kind of prophesy are we talking about here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Surely you jest, Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Not really. How come Voldemort wants it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You dare to speak the Dark Lord's name?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Silence! How dare you utter that name from your half--blood mouth!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hey, did you know Voldemort's a half-blood too?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Control yourself, Bellatrix!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's so special about this

dialogues: You mean Dumbledore never told you the reason you bear that scar was hidden here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So that's what took you so long. We wondered.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Only a person for whom the prophesy was made can remove it from its self, Potter, and the Dark Lord certainly couldn't get it himself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So he used me to do his dirty work, did he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Now!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stupify!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stop them!

dialogues: Colloportus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Where'd the rest go?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, they went the wrong way!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: They might have gone on to the hall.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Check under the desks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stupify!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Avada--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

dialogues: Stupify!

dialogues: Ron!

dialogues: Impedimenta!

dialogues: We've got him!

dialogues: Pretificus Totalus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stupify!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hermione!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Please don't be dead, please don't be dead... He shakes her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's they do to her?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She's alive, Harry. There's a pulse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Can we carry her?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'll do it. You're better at fighting.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Where do we go?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I don't know...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What happened.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I think my ankle's broken. And somebody hit Ron with a weird spell...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hiyya, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: They hit her with something too.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We need to get out of here. Luna, can you help Ginny?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There they are!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Your race is run, Potter. Hand it over.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Let my friends go and I will.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You are not in a position to negotiate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't do it, Harry! Don't!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stop, Neville!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Neville? Neville Longbottom?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My dear boy, I paid your parents a visit a long time ago. We had such a time!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You put them in St. Mungos!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So, Potter. Give us the Prophesy or I'll see how long it takes to crack Longbottom like his parents.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't give it to them!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Crucio!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Are you all right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Give me the prophesy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Get out of here, you two!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That will take you back out of the Department of Mysteries.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You come with us!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You're the important one, now, Harry. I have to help the Order.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'll always be here for you, Harry. Now go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hello, cousin!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: We may have lost the prophesy, but I can still deliver you to the Dark Lord!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stupify!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Protego!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's Dumbledore!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Is that the best you've got, cousin?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry! HARRY!...he's gone...there's nothing you can do...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, no!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You can't stop me, Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'LL KILL you!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stupify!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come out, come out, Potter...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, well, have you come to avenge your dear Godfather?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Crucio!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Crucio!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Never used an Unforgivable Curse before, have you, Potter? You have to mean it, you have to want to cause the pain in your very soul...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Give me the prophesy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Can't. It got smashed by accident!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You lie!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How's Voldemort going to like that? You've failed him, and he's not very forgiving, is he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Forgive me, Master! I tried, I--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He can't hear you from here, you know!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So, you smashed my prophesy...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I grow tired of you continually thwarting my plans, Harry Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Avada Kadavra!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You should not have come here tonight, Tom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It is you who made that mistake, Dumbledore!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Avada Kedavra!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You do not seek to kill me, Dumbledore?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There are other ways to destroy a man, Tom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There is nothing worse than death!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You are quite wrong, Tom, as you have always been.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Look out!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Professor!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Stay where you are, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Are you all right, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Minister, I saw him! You-Know-Who! He was right there!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I know...I saw him too...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: If you and your men will proceed to the Death Room, you will find several Death Eaters which I and some others have apprehended.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Seize him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Minister, you have just seen You- Know-Who in the flesh only seconds ago! It is time to come to your senses!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: If you insist on trying to arrest me, I am perfectly willing demonstrate how useless such an attempt will be.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dumbledore, what the blazes happened here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I will explain everything, Minister. Just as soon as I return Harry to school.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's he doing here? And what's happened to him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Minister, you will order the removal of Dolores Umbridge from my school.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: All Educational Decrees will be nullified and you will call off the search on Hagrid so he can return to work.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I will return here later tonight, after I have seen to Harry. It should not take long. He taps the Golden centaur head.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Portus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Dumbledore, I want some answers!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: The Second War has begun, Minister.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Thank you...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Please sit, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I understand how you feel, Harry--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No you don't!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You forget that Sirius was my friend too. You are not the only person on this earth capable of feelings, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There is no shame in feeling pain, Harry. It is your greatest strength...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You don't have a clue! You can't possibly know!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What can't I know?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This pain is part of being human, Harry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I don't care! I don't care!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You do care. You care so much you feel like you will bleed to death because of it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Let me out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You can't keep me in here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I daresay I can. And if you actually do attack me with that wand, Harry, I'm afraid to say you will regret it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It is my fault Sirius died tonight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry, I owe you this explanation, to show you the failings of an old man.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I already know all this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Haven't you wondered why I haven't spoken to you, even looked at you, for months?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Well, yeah, I did...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sirius told me you believed there was a snake inside of you. This was Voldemort attempting to manipulate you. To protect you from this, I had you study Occlumency.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But Snape stopped giving me lessons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes. I thought he could overcome his feelings towards your father, but I was wrong. Some wounds cut too deep to be healed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He barely taught me, though. I always felt more open to it after the lessons. Like he was trying to open me to Voldemort--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I would trust Severus Snape with my life, Harry. You have never recovered from your mistrust of him in your first year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sirius didn't trust him. Didn't believe he'd really turned to our side...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Again, some wounds run too deep to be healed, Harry. Severus and Sirius never liked each other at school. This has never changed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: During your Occulumency lessons, Professor Snape discovered that you were dreaming about the door in the Department of Mysteries.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've been dreaming about that all year, before Voldemort discovered the connection.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes. Voldemort has been obsessed with hearing that prophesy since he returned. Because of your scar, what he was obsessed with, you were obsessed with, in the form of dreams.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Once he discovered the connection, Voldemort had little difficulty in manipulating you into thinking he had captured Sirius.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But I checked Grimmauld Place! Kreacher said--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Kreacher lied. He wanted you to go to the Department of Mysteries.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Kreacher has been serving two masters for some months now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Wait, where was Sirius when I tried to contact him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Ah. Apparently Kreacher had injured Buckbeak to distract him in case you tried to contact Headquarters.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sirius was tending to the wounds when you called.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And Hermione said we should be nice to Kreacher!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She was quite right, Harry. Kreacher is what wizards have made him. He is to be pitied, not hated.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sirius hated him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He didn't hate Kreacher himself. Kreacher was a reminder to Sirius of the home he had always hated.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah, he really hated that place. And you kept him locked up in there!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I was trying to save his life!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I also knew that Voldemort would return one day. I played to his weakness. There is an ancient magic which Voldemort has always underestimated.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: This magic is what your mother gave you when she died. That protection would only work, however, if you were cared for by a blood relative. Your Aunt, Petunia.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: She never loved me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Perhaps not. But she took you in, however grudgingly. As long as you can call your Aunt's house your home, you are protected.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You should feel honored, Cissy. As should Draco --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And now we come to the moment of terrible truth, the moment I have dreaded for fifteen years. The moment when I must lay another burden atop your already straining shoulders.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Do you remember your first year here? When you lay in the hospital wing fresh from your confrontation with Voldemort?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Do you remember what you asked me that night?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I asked you why Voldemort tried to kill me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: You have no idea the pain it causes me to tell it to you, even now. But unfortunately, I must.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I don't understand, Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Professor, why am I so important to

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: An excellent question, Harry. The answer lies in the prophesy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sir, it got smashed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That was not the only place the Prophesy is preserved.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: "The One with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches....Born to

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm not sure I understand all that, sir...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: And...it means me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Interestingly, there were two boys whom the prophesy could have been referring to. You and Neville Longbottom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: So it's not necessarily me, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What if he chose wrong?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Why didn't he wait? Why attack when we were babies?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Voldemort had an informant listening to my meeting with Professor Trelawney. Fortunately he was discovered before he could hear the entire prophesy. Voldemort had to act immediately, he didn't know the rest of the prophesy. All he knew was that he had to destroy the child who would grow to be a threat to his power.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But I don't have any special powers.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There is a room in the Department of Mysteries which is kept locked at all times. It contains a force so wonderful and yet terrible that it is greater than death itself. It is that power which you have incredible amounts of and of which Voldemort has none.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What is it, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: There is only the end of the prophesy which we haven't addressed. It states "neither can live while the other survives."

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It is the final burden which I must place on you, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: One of us has to kill the other...in the end.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hello, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hey, Nick.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I--Well, Madam Pomfrey asked me to tell you that Hermione and Ron are out of the hospital wing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh. Thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Nick, I was wondering about something?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've been expecting this...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Expecting what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: A lot of people come to me when they've lost loved ones.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I expect so...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: He's not coming back, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm sorry I couldn't be of more

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: How are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Good as new, mate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Better.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Come on, let's go in to the feast.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've got something to tell you. Something important.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: But not right now. I'm not ready.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Take your time, Harry. We'll be here when you are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Hello, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's the last night and I need to pack.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh, people take my things and hide them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I don't think they like me much. Some of them call me "Loony" Lovegood.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Do you need any help looking?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Oh no. It all turns up in the end.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Sirius Black. Hermione said he was your Godfather.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: My mother. I was nine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I'm sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: It's okay. It's not like I'll never see her again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Isn't it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Don't tell me you didn't hear them. The voices beyond the Veil?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: They were just out of sight, that's all.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Of course. Anyway, my mum always said the things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end. If not always in the way we expect. Think I'll just go have some pudding.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: I've been thinking about something Dumbledore said to me.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: What's that ?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: That even though we've got a fight ahead of us we've got one thing that Voldemort doesn't have.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Yeah ?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
dialogues: Something worth fighting for

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Narcissa!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Cissy! You mustn't do this.  He can't be trusted.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The Dark Lord trusts him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The Dark Lord is mistaken.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Or so I believe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, who can one trust these days?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He lives in this Muggle dunghill?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Run along, Wormtail.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I've nowhere else to turn, Severus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You must be joking.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I know I ought not to be here. The Dark Lord himself has forbidden me to speak of this --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: If the Dark Lord has forbidden it, you ought not to speak.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Put it down, Bella.  We mustn't touch what isn't ours. As it so happens I'm aware of your situation, Narcissa.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You? The Dark Lord told you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Your sister doubts me, Narcissa. Understandable.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Over the years I have played my part well.  So well I've deceived one of the greatest wizards of all time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dumbledore is a great wizard. Only a fool would question it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I... I don't doubt you, Severus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I can't change the Dark Lord's mind.  But it might be possible for me to help Draco.  To provide some... protection.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do you mean it, Severus?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I can try.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh, Severus, please, if you would... I would be forever in your debt.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Swear to it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Make the Unbreakable Vow. You see.  It's just empty words. Oh he'll try.  He'll give it his best effort.  But when it matters most he'll slither back into his hole.  Bloody coward...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Take out your wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Will you, Severus Snape, watch over Draco Malfoy as he attempts to fulfill the Dark Lord's wishes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I will.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And will you, to the best of your ability, protect him from harm?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I will.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And should it prove necessary, if it seems Draco will fail... will you yourself carry out the deed that the Dark Lord has ordered Draco to perform?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I will.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry Potter.  Who's Harry Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh.  Um.  No one.  Bit of a tosser.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Funny that paper of yours.  Couple nights ago, I could swear I saw one of the pictures move.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Really.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Thought I'd gone round the twist.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hey.  I was wondering...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Eleven.  That's when I get off.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I once knew a Muggle girl from Liverpool with hair like spun silk.  No light could resist it...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I like riding round on the trains. It takes my mind off... things.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Rather unpleasant to behold, isn't it?  The tale is thrilling if I do say so myself, but I'm afraid now is not the time to tell it.  Take my arm.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I just Apparated, didn't I?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Indeed.  And quite successfully I might add.  Most people vomit their first time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Can't imagine why...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Welcome to the charming village of Budleigh Babberton, Harry.  I assume right about now you're wondering why I've brought you here, am I right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: After all these years, I just sort of roll with it, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Wand out, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Lumos...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Horace!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Merlin's Beard!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: There's no need to disfigure me, Albus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I must say, you make a very convincing armchair, Horace.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's all in the upholstery. I come by the stuffing naturally. What gave me away?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dragon's blood.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, well, I couldn't very well use wizard's blood, could I?  Oho!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ah yes.  Introductions.  Harry, this is an old friend and colleague of mine, Horace Slughorn.  Horace, this is, well, you know who this is. Apparently there's some thought he may be the Chosen One.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So why all the theatrics, Horace? You weren't perhaps expecting someone else, were you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: S-someone else?  I'm sure I don't know what you mean.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh all right!  The Death Eaters have been trying to recruit me for over a year.  Do you know what that's like?  One can only say no to these people so many times before they...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Take matters into their own hands?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I never stay anywhere more than a week.  The Muggles who own this place are in the Canary Islands.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, I think it should be put back in order for them, don't you? Mind?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That was fun.  May I use the loo?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't think I don't know why you're here, Albus!  The answer is still no!  Absolutely, unequivocally no!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You look very like your father. Except for your eyes.  You've got --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: My mother's eyes, yeah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Lily.  Lovely Lily.  She was exceedingly bright -- your mother. Even more impressive when one considers she was Muggle-born.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: One of my best friends is Muggle- born.  She's the best in our year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh, but you mustn't think I'm prejudiced!  No, no, no! Your mother was one of my absolute favorites!  Look, there she is. Right up front.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: All mine, each and every one.  Ex- students, I mean.  You recognize Barnubas Cuffe, of course, editor of the Daily Prophet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Always takes my owl should I want to register my opinion on the news of the day.  And there's Ambrosius Flume of Honeydukes.  Sends a hamper of chocolate to the house each birthday.  That is, when I had a house.  And Gwenog Jones, captain of the Holyhead Harpies -- free tickets whenever I want them. Of course, I haven't been to a match in some time...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ah yes.  Regulus Black.  You no doubt know of his older brother Sirius.  Died a few weeks ago.  I taught the whole Black family except Sirius.  Shame.  Talented boy.  I got Regulus when he came along, of course, but I'd have liked the set.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Mind if I take this?  I do love knitting patterns.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Of course.  But you're not leaving?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think I know a lost cause when I see one.  Regrettable.  I would have considered it a personal triumph had you consented to return to Hogwarts, Horace.  You are, like my friend Mr. Potter -- one of a kind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: All right!  I'll do it.  But I'll be wanting Professor Merrythought's old office, not that water closet I had formerly. And I expect a raise!  These are mad times we live in!  Mad!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Indeed they are.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir, exactly what was that all --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You are talented, famous and powerful -- everything Horace values.  Professor Slughorn is going to try to collect you, Harry.  You would be his crowning jewel.  That is why he is returning to Hogwarts.  And it is crucial he return...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I fear I may have stolen a wondrous night from you, Harry. She was, truthfully, very pretty. The girl.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's alright, sir.  I'll go back tomorrow, make some excuse --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You'll not be going back to Little Whinging tonight, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But, sir.  What about Hedwig?  And there's my trunk --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Both are waiting for you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hedwig...?  Mum!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Exactly.  How'd you guess?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm joking, Mum.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're worse than Fred and George.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now you're joking.  I was only wondering when Harry got here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry Dimpleton.  Harry Potter, of course.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think I'd know if Harry Potter was in my house, wouldn't I?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well his trunk's in the kitchen. And his owl.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I seriously doubt that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry?  Did someone say Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Me, nosy.  Is he up there with you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: 'Course not.  Think I'd know if my best friend was in my room, wouldn't I?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Was that an owl I heard?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry's.  Haven't seen him, have you?  Apparently, he's wandering about the house.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Really?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Really.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But why didn't you tell us you were coming?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Didn't know. Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That man.  But then, what would we do without him?  Ron!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You've a bit of...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: When'd you get here?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A few days ago.  Though... for a bit, I wasn't sure I was coming.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Mum sort of lost it last week. Said Ginny and I had no business going back to Hogwarts.  That it's too dangerous.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh come on...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: She's not alone.  Even my parents -- and they're Muggles -- know something bad is happening.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Anyway, Dad stepped in, told her she was being barmy.  Took a day or two, but she came round.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But we're talking about Hogwarts. Dumbledore. What could be safer?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: There's been a lot of chatter lately.  That he's gotten... old.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Rubbish.  He's only -- what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A hundred and fifty.  Give or take a few years.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Step up!  Step up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Step up!  Step up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: We've got Fainting Fancy...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Nosebleed Nougats...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And just in time for school...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Puking Pastilles!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Into the cauldron, handsome.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Into the cauldron, handsome.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What'd you think, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Amazing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Pocket that and you'll pay in more than Galleons, my friend.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: We've got eyes in the back of our heads.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Bloody urchins.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Peruvian Instant Darkness Powder?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A real money spinner that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Handy if you need to make a quick escape.  Hello, ladies!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, they do really work.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Then again, the way we hear it, sis, you're doing just fine on your own.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Meaning?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Are you not currently dating Dean Thomas?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: None of your business.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: These are adorable.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Aren't they now.  Pygmy Puffs. Can't breed them fast enough.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How much for this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Five Galleons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Five Galleons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How much for me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Five Galleons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Five Galleons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But I'm your brother!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ten Galleons.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: C'mon. Let's go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hi, Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hi.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How is it Fred and George are doing it?  Half the alley's closed down.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Fred reckons people need a laugh these days.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Reckon he's right...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh no.  Look.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But everyone got their wands from Ollivander.  Young.  Old...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good.  Bad.  Speaking of which...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Is it just me?  Or do Draco and mummy look like two people who don't want to be followed?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What're they playing at?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dunno.  Let's get closer.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hey.  Where's Hermione?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry, where is she?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't know.  I'm turned around.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Bloody hell.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What just happened?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Quibbler...?  Quibbler...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: There's an article on Wrackspurts this month.  Quibbler...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He's lovely.  They've been known to sing on Boxing Day, you know. Quibbler?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Please.  What's a Wrackspurt?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: They're invisible creatures that float in through your ears and make your brain go fuzzy. Quibbler?  Quibbler?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't you see, it was a ceremony. An initiation.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Stop, Harry, I know where you're going with this --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's happened.  He's one of them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: One of what?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry is under the impression that Draco Malfoy is now a Death Eater.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're barking.  What would You- Know-Who want with a sod like Malfoy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So what's he doing in Borgin and Burke's?  Browsing for furniture?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's a creepy shop.  He's a creepy bloke.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Look.  His father's a Death Eater. It only makes sense.  Besides, Hermione saw it.  With her own eyes.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I told you.  I don't know what I saw.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I need some air.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What just happened?  Blaise?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Relax, boys.  The lights went out is all.  Come, Draco.  We'll be at Hogwarts before you know it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hogwarts.  What a pathetic excuse for a school.  I think I'd pitch myself off the Astronomy Tower if I thought I had to continue on for another two years.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What's that supposed to mean?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Let's just say I don't think you'll be seeing me wasting my time in Charms Class next year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Amused, Blaise?  We'll see just who's laughing in the end.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Where's Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Probably on the platform.  C'mon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You two go on.  I want to check something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Didn't mummy ever tell you it's bad manners to eavesdrop, Potter? Petrificus Totalus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh, right, she was dead before you could wipe the drool off your chin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Enjoy the ride back to London.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hello, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Luna.  How'd you...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Wrackspurts. Your head's full of them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sorry I made you miss the carriages, Luna.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's alright.  I enjoyed our walk. It was like being with a friend.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I am your friend, Luna.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That's nice.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: About time!  I've been looking all over for you two.  Names.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Professor Flitwick, you've known me for five years.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No exceptions, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Who are those people?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Aurors. For security.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's a not a cane, you cretin. It's a walking stick.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And what exactly would you be wanting with a walking stick?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It was his father's.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Is my father's.  He's not dead.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's alright, Mr. Filch.  I can vouch for Mr. Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Nice face, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Would you like me to fix it? Personally I think you look a bit more devil-may-care this way.  But it's up to you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Have you ever fixed one?  A nose.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  But I've done several toes and how different are they really?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What the hell.  Give it a go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Episkey.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well?  How do I look?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Exceptionally ordinary.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Brilliant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don' you worry.  He'll be 'long soon 'nuff --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Will.  You.  Stop.  Eating!  Your best friend is missing!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oi!  Turn around, you lunatic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He's covered in blood again.  Why is it he's always covered in blood?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Looks like his own this time.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Where've you been, Harry?  And what happened to your face?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Later.  What've I missed?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sorting Hat urged us all to be brave and strong in these troubled times -- easy for it to say -- it's a hat, isn't it?  First Years seemed to enjoy it, though. Wankers. Filch give you the wand outside?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Thanks...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What's happened to his hand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The very best of evenings to you! First off, please join me in welcoming the newest member of our staff, Horace Slughorn.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Professor Slughorn, I'm happy to say, has agreed to resume his old post of Potions master.  Meanwhile the post of Defense Against the Dark Arts will be assumed by Professor Snape.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now, as you know, each and every one of you was searched upon your arrival tonight.  You have a right to know why.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Once there was a young man who, like you, sat in this very Hall. Walked this castle's corridors. Slept beneath its roof.  He seemed, to all the world, a student like any other.  His name? Tom Riddle. The Hall goes utterly silent.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Today, of course, the world knows him by another name.  Which is why, as I stand looking out upon you all tonight, I am reminded of a sobering fact.  Each day, every hour, this very minute perhaps, dark forces attempt to penetrate this castle.  But in the end, their greatest weapon remains... you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Just something to keep in mind. Now, off to bed.  Pip pip!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That was cheerful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: History of Magic is up, ladies, not down.  Mr. Davies -- that's the girl's toilet...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: This can't be good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Enjoying ourself, are we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, you see, I've got an open period this morning, Professor --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So I noticed.  I would think you'd want to fill it with Potions.  Or is it no longer your ambition to become an Auror?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It is.  Or was.  But I was told I had to get an Outstanding in my

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And so you did when Professor Snape was teaching Potions. However, Professor Slughorn is perfectly happy to accept N.E.W.T. students with 'Exceeds Expectations.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Really?  Well... brilliant.  I'll head there straight away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good.  And take Weasley with you. He looks far too happy over there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But I don't want to take Potions!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry m'boy!  I was beginning to worry!  And I see we've brought someone with us...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ron Weasley, sir.  But I'm dead awful at Potions, a menace actually, so I probably should just be going --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Nonsense, we'll sort you out.  Any friend of Harry's is a friend of mine.  Right then, books out --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Um, sorry, sir, but I haven't got my book yet -- nor's Ron.  You see --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Not to worry.  You can get what you need from the cupboard.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now, as I was saying, I've prepared a few concoctions this morning.  Any ideas what these might be?  Yes, Miss...?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Granger, sir.  That one there is Veritaserum.  And that would be Polyjuice Potion.  And that is Amortentia! The most powerful love potion in the world.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's rumored to smell differently to each person, according to what attracts them.  For example, I smell freshly mown grass and new parchment and spearmint toothpaste --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: One of my best friends is Muggle- born.  She's the best in our year...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now Amortentia doesn't create actual love, of course.  That's impossible.  But it does cause a powerful infatuation or obsession. For that reason, it is probably the most dangerous potion in this room.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir, you haven't told us what's in that one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ah yes...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What you see before you, ladies and gentlemen, is a curious little potion known as Felix Felicis. But it is more commonly referred to as --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Liquid luck.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, Miss Granger.  Desperately tricky to make.  Disastrous should you get it wrong.  But brewed correctly, as this has been, it has remarkable powers.  One sip and you will find that all your endeavors succeed... at least until the effects wear off.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But then why don't people drink it all the time?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Because taken in excess it causes giddiness, recklessness and dangerous overconfidence.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Have you ever taken it, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Twice.  Once when I was twenty- four.  Once when I was fifty- seven.  Two tablespoons taken at breakfast.  Two perfect days...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So.  This is what I offer each of you today.  One tiny vial of liquid luck... to the student who, in the hour that remains, manages to brew an acceptable Draught of Living Death, the recipe for which can be found on page ten of your textbook.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You should know that in all the years of my previous tenure at Hogwarts, not once did a student brew a potion of sufficient quality to claim this prize.  In any event -- good luck.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How did you do that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Crush it.  Don't cut it.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  The instructions specifically say to cut.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  Really --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Merlin's Beard!  But it's perfect. So perfect I daresay one sip would kill us all!  Your mother was a dab hand at potions, but this... My, my, what can't you do, m'boy? Perhaps you will save us all in the end...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Here you are then, as promised. One bottle of Felix Felicis.  Use it well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good evening, Harry.  You got my message, I see.  Come, come.  Sit.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So.  How are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Fine, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Enjoying your classes?  Professor Slughorn, for one, is most impressed with you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think he overestimates my abilities, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Definitely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And what of your activities outside the classroom?  Do they bring you satisfaction?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I notice you spend a great deal of time with Miss Granger.  One can't help but wonder if --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No!  I mean... she's brilliant. And we're friends.  But... no.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Forgive me, Harry, I...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: ... I was merely curious. In any event, I'm sure you're wondering why I've summoned you here tonight.  The answer lies here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What you see before you are memories.  In this case pertaining to one individual:  Voldemort.  Or as he was known then... Tom Riddle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: This vial contains a most particular memory -- of the day I first met him.  I'd like you to see it.  If you would...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I must confess to a bit of confusion upon receiving your letter, Mr. Dumbledore.  In all the years Tom's been here, he's never once had a family visitor. Frankly, I was stunned to find that someone knew of his existence.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I am not family.  But his name has been known to me since birth.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I see...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think I should tell you.  He's a funny boy -- Tom.  Odd.  There have been incidents with the other children.  Nasty things.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Perhaps you could give me an example.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You've got a visitor, Tom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How do you do, Tom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, I'll leave you two to yourselves.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: As you wish.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're the doctor, aren't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  I am a Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't believe you.  I hear Mrs. Cole talking, her and the rest of the staff.  They want me looked at.  They think I'm different.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Perhaps they're right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm not mad.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hogwarts is not a place for mad people.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's a school.  A school of... magic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You can do things, can't you, Tom? Things the other children can't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Tell me some of the things you can do, Tom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I can make things move -- without touching them.  I can make animals do what I want without training them.  I can make bad things happen to people who are mean to me.  I can make them hurt... if I want.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Who are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm like you, Tom.  Different.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Prove it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think there is something trying to get out of your wardrobe, Tom. Open it.  Open.  It.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Take it out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Is there anything in that box you ought not to have?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Why did you want these things, Tom?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I like having things that belonged to other people.  It makes me feel ... close to them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So what brings you here, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Devastatingly handsome.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Thievery is not tolerated at Hogwarts.  At Hogwarts, you will be taught not only how to use magic, but to control it. Understood? I'll be going now, Tom.  Leave your window open tonight.  An owl will bring you a message.  Read it carefully.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I can speak to snakes too.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: They find me.  Whisper things.  Is that normal.  For someone like me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It is unusual.  But not unheard of.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Did you know, sir?  Then?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Did I know that I had just met the most dangerous Dark Wizard of all time?  No.  Had I...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Over time, while here at Hogwarts, Tom Riddle grew close to one particular teacher.  Can you guess which teacher that might be?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You didn't bring Professor Slughorn back simply to teach Potions, did you, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  I did not.  You see, Professor Slughorn possesses something I desire very dearly. And he will not part with it easily... I'd rather not divulge any more just yet, Harry.  But I promise. In time you will know everything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You said Professor Slughorn would try to collect me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I did.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do you want me to let him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: All right!  Queue up!  Excuse me...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Shut It!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Thanks.  All right.  This morning I'll be putting you all through a few drills to assess your strengths.  But know this:  Just because you made the team last year does not guarantee you a spot this year.  Is that clear?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No hard feelings, Weasley, alright?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hard feelings?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'll be going out for Keeper as well.  Nothing personal.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Really?  Strapping guy like you, you've got a Beater's build, don't you think?  Keeper needs to be agile, quick --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I like my chances.  Say... think you could introduce me to your friend Granger?  Wouldn't mind getting on a first name basis, know what I mean?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: All right.  Cormac.  Ron.  It's down to you two for Keeper.  We'll decide it with a shootout. Demelza, you'll bring the Quaffle up against Cormac.  Ginny, you'll take on Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hang on.  She's his sister.  How do I know she won't toss him a floater?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Piss off, Cormac.  How 'bout I toss you a floater?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Quiet!  I'm Captain.  We do it my way.  Now line up.  On three. One.  Two... Three!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: C'mon, Ron...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Isn't he brilliant?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Have to admit, thought I was going to miss that last one.  Hope Cormac's not taking it too hard.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Has a bit of a thing for you, Hermione.  Cormac.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He's vile.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ever heard of this spell?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No I have not. And if you had a shred of self-respect you would turn that book in.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Not bloody likely.  He's top of the class.  Even better than you, Hermione.  Slughorn thinks he's a genius.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'd like to know just whose book that was.  Let's take a look, shall we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Why not?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's... old.  The binding is fragile.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The binding is fragile?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Who's the Half-Blood Prince?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That's what it says.  Right here. 'This Book is the Property of the Half-Blood Prince.'

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: For weeks you carry around this book, practically sleep with it... and you have no desire to find out who The Half-Blood Prince is?
