movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I didn't say I wasn't curious. And, by the way, I don't sleep with it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yeah. Right. Well, it's true.  I like a nice chat before I go to bed.  Now you're always reading that bloody book.  It's like being with Hermione.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, I was curious.  So I went to

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The library.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The library.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And... nothing.  There's no reference to the Half-Blood Prince anywhere.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good.  That settles it then.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hey, you three!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What've you got there, Hagrid?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Stinksap.  Burn the whiskers right off yer chin.  Trees 'ere are drippin' with it.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Stinksap?  You're not sick, are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's not fer me.  It's fer Aragog. Yeh remember Aragog, don' yeh?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Spider?  About six feet tall?  Ten feet wide?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Tha's the one.  He's taken ill. I'm hopin' ter nurse 'im back. Keep yer fingers crossed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Barking.  Does he not remember that raving arachnid tried to eat us? What?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The Aurors. I know they're here to protect us, but... somehow I don't feel any safer.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Filius!  I was hoping to find you at the Three Broomsticks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Emergency choir practice, I'm afraid, Horace.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Who's up for a Butterbeer?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  Over here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No, no.  Sit next to me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: O-kay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What'll we have?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Three Butterbeers.  Splash of ginger in mine, please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Aw, bloody hell...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh, honestly, Ronald.  They're just holding hands...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And snogging.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'd like to leave.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Leave?  You can't be serious.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That happens to be my sister.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So?  What if she looked over here and saw you snogging me?  Would you expect her to get up and leave?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry, m'boy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hello, sir.  Wonderful to see you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Damn it all!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh, the Three Broomsticks and I go way back.  Longer than I'd care to admit.  In fact, I remember when it was simply One Broomstick!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oops!  All hands on deck, Granger!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Listen, m'boy.  In the old days, I used to throw together the occasional supper and invite a select student or two.  Would you be game?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'd consider it an honor, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You'd be welcome too, Granger.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Be delighted, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Brilliant.  Look for my owl. Good to see you, Wallenby.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What're you playing at?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dumbledore asked me to... get to know him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Get to know him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dunno.  But it must be important. Otherwise Dumbledore wouldn't ask.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Um... You've got a little...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Bit worried about her.  Did you hear that rubbish she was talking back in the pub?  Her and me snogging.  Ha.  As if...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Katie.  You don't know what it could be!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What's up?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I warned her!  I warned her not to touch it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry, she's swallowing her tongue --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'll get someone --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: There's no time!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Get back!  All o' yeh!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now, now.  Now, now...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don' go touchin' tha' but by the wrappin's.  Unnerstan'?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're sure Katie did not have this in her possession when she entered the Three Broomsticks, Leanne?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's like I said.  She went to the loo and when she came back she had the package.  She said it was important she deliver it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Did she say to whom?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: All right, Leanne.  You may go. Why is it always you three?  Hm? When something happens?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Believe me, Professor, I've been asking myself the same question for six years.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Severus. Is this it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What do you think?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think Miss Bell is lucky to be alive.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: She was cursed, wasn't she?  I know Katie.  Off the Quidditch pitch she wouldn't hurt a fly.  If she was bringing that to someone, she wasn't doing it knowingly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes.  She was cursed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It was Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That's a very serious accusation, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Indeed.  Your evidence?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I... just... know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You... just... know.  Once again you astonish with your gifts, Potter, gifts mere mortals could only dream of possessing.  How grand it must be to be the Chosen One.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I suggest you return to your dormitory.  All of you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What do you suppose Dean sees in her?  Ginny.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What does she see in him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dean?  He's brilliant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You called him a slick git not five hours ago.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yeah, well, he was running his hands all over my sister, wasn't he?  Something snaps.  You've got to hate him.  You know, on principle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I suppose.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So what is it?  He sees in her?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't know.  She's smart. Funny.  Attractive...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Attractive?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You know.  She's... got nice skin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Skin?  You're saying Dean's dating my sister because of her skin?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, no.  I mean... I'm just saying it could be a contributing factor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hermione's got nice skin. Wouldn't you say?  As skin goes, I mean.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I've never really thought about it.  But I suppose, yeah.  Very nice.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think I'll be going to sleep now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: To Hogwarts' best and brightest!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Here, here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Which one do I use for the soup?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So tell me, Cormac.  See much of your Uncle Tiberius these days?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, sir.  In fact, I'm meant to go hunting with him and the Minister for Magic over holiday.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, be sure to give them both my best.  What about your uncle, Belby?  Working on anything new? For those of you who don't know, Marcus' uncle invented the Wolfsbane Potion.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dunno.  He and me dad don't get on. Probably because Dad thinks potions are rubbish.  Says the only potion worth having is a stiff one at the end of the --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And you, Miss Granger?  What is it your family does in the Muggle world?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: My parents are dentists.  They tend to people's teeth.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Fascinating.  And is that considered a dangerous profession?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  Though, a boy named Robbie Fenwick did bite my father once. Needed ten stitches.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Miss Weasley!  Come in, come in.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sorry, I'm not ordinarily late --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No matter.  You'll be just in time for dessert.  That is -- if Belby leaves you any.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Look at her eyes.  They've been fighting again.  Her and Dean.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Nothing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Thank you, one and all, for a most stimulating evening.  We'll have to do it again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh.  Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sorry, sir, I was just admiring your hourglass.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ah, yes.  A most intriguing object.  The sands run in accordance to the quality of the conversation.  When it is stimulating, the sands run slow. When it is not...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think I'll be going.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Nonsense.  You have nothing to fear, m'boy.  As for some of your classmates, well, let's just say, they're unlikely to make the shelf.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The shelf, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ron, these chocolates, they're -- C'mon.  I'm going to introduce you to Romilda Vane.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Anyone who aspires to be anyone hopes to end up here.  Then again... you are already someone aren't you, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't really know how to answer that, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Your mother was modest too.  Your father not so much.  As you can see, he did not make the shelf.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Did Voldemort ever make the shelf, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You knew him, didn't you, sir? Tom Riddle.  You were his teacher.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Mr. Riddle had many teachers while here at Hogwarts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What was he like?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm sorry, sir.  Forgive me.  He killed my parents, you see...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Of course.  It's only natural that you should want to know more.  I'm afraid I must disappoint you, Harry.  When I first met young Mr. Riddle, he was simply a quiet, albeit brilliant, boy committed to becoming a first-rate wizard.  Not unlike the others I've known.  In fact, not unlike... you.  If the monster existed, it was buried deep within.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good luck, eh, Ron?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Counting on you, Ron.  I've two Galleons on Gryffindor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So.  How was it?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How was what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Your dinner party.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dead boring.  Though I think Harry enjoyed dessert.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ol' Sluggy's having a Christmas do, you know.  And we're meant to bring someone...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I expect you'll be going with McLaggen.  Isn't he a member of the Slug Club?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Actually, I was going to ask you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Really?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Really.  But seeing as you have such a distaste for the idea --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good luck today, Ron!  I know you'll be brilliant!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm resigning.  After today's match.  McLaggen can have my spot.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Have it your way.  Juice?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sure...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hello, everyone.  You look dreadful, Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Is that why you just put something in his cup.  Is it a tonic?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't drink that, Ron!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You could be expelled for that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dunno what you're talking about.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: C'mon, Harry.  We've got a game to win.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What's gotten into him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ginny!  Let's go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Weasley!  Weasley!  Weasley!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ron seems to be enjoying himself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yep.  Apparently it's his lucky day.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You shouldn't have done it, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yeah.  I suppose I could've just used, I dunno... a Confundus charm?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That was different.  It was tryouts.  This was an actual match --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You didn't put it in? Ron only thought you did?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Charms spell.  Just practicing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ah.  Well... they're really good.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How does it feel, Harry?  When you see Dean with Ginny? I know, Harry.  You're my best friend.  I see how you look at her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oops.  I think this room's taken.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What's with the birds?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oppugno!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It feels like this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Look, I can't help it if she's got her knickers in a twist.  What Lav and I have -- well, let's just say there was no stopping it.  It's chemical.  Will it last?  Who knows?  Point is, I'm a free agent.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He's at perfect liberty to kiss whomever he likes.  I really couldn't care less.  Was I under the impression that he and I would be attending Slughorn's Christmas party together?  Yes.  Of course, now, given the circumstances, I've had to make other arrangements.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Have you?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes.  Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I just thought, you know, since neither one of us can take who we'd really like... maybe we'd go together.  As friends.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Why didn't I think of that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So who are you taking?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Um... it's a surprise.  Besides, it's you we need to worry about. And you can't pick just anyone. See that girl over there.  That's Romilda Vane.  Rumor has it she's trying to slip you a love potion.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Really...?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hey! She's only interested in you because she thinks you're the Chosen One.  You know that, right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But I am the Chosen One.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Okay.  Kidding.  I'll just ask someone I like.  Someone cool.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I've never been to this part of the castle.  At least not while awake.  I sleepwalk, you see. It's why I wear shoes to bed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Someone has taken a BITE out of it. Thank you, Adrian! One of mine.  Class of '78.  I had hoped for more out of him, but at least the pictures are in focus. Oh my!  Excuse me, Harry.  I must greet the new Minister of Magical Transportation.  Class of '67. Mingle, m'boy!  Mingle!  We're all friends here.  And we run the world.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Drink?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Neville...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I didn't make the cut for the Slug Club.  It's okay.  He's got Belby handing out towels in the loo.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Lovegood, did you say?  I once encountered a seriously unbalanced man by that name at a book signing.  Claimed to run a magazine...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What're you doing?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And what's happened to you?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hm?  Oh, I've just escaped -- I mean, left Cormac.  Under the mistletoe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Cormac!  That's who you invited!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I thought it would annoy Ron most. But he's a menace.  He's got more tentacles than a Snarfalump plant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dragon tartar?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No thank you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Just as well.  They give one horribly bad breath.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: On second thought -- maybe it'll keep Cormac at bay.  Oh no, here he comes!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think she went to powder her nose.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How do I look?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Slippery little minx, your friend. Likes to work her mouth too, doesn't she?  Yak yak yak. What is this I'm eating, by the way?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dragon balls.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What's going on back here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You've just bought yourself a month's detention, McLaggen.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Not so quick, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think I should rejoin the party, sir.  My date...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: ... can surely survive your absence for another minute or two.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Besides, I only wish to convey a message.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A message...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: From Professor Dumbledore.  He asked that I give you his best and that he hopes you enjoy your holiday.  You see, he's traveling and won't return until term resumes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Traveling?  Where?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Take your hands off me,  you filthy squib!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Professor Slughorn, sir!  I've just discovered this boy lurking in an upstairs corridor.  He claims to have been invited to your party.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Okay, okay, I was gate-crashing. Happy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'll escort him out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Certainly... Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Maybe I did hex that Bell girl. Maybe I didn't.  What's it to you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I swore to protect you.  I made the Unbreakable Vow --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't need protection.  I was chosen for this!  Out of all others.  Me!  And I won't fail him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're afraid, Draco.  You attempt to conceal it, but it's obvious. Let me assist you --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No!  I was chosen.  This is my moment!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Unbreakable Vow.  You're sure that's what Snape said.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Positive.  Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's just, well, you can't break an Unbreakable Vow.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'd worked that much out for myself, funnily enough.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No, you don't understand -- Oh, bloody hell...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Lovely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: All she wants to do is snog me. My lips are getting chapped. Look.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'll take your word for it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So what happens?  If you break an Unbreakable Vow?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You die.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Eat up, eat up, everyone!  There's more to come!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Draco's plotting something, I know it, something to do with Voldemort.  He's been given a task or a mission -- and Snape was offering to help.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Voldemort has chosen Draco Malfoy for a mission?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I know it sounds mad --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Has it occurred to you, Harry, that Snape was simply pretending to offer Draco help so that he could find out what he's up to?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That's not what it sounded like.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Perhaps Harry's right, Remus.  To make an Unbreakable Vow, after all --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It comes down to whether or not you trust Dumbledore's judgement. He trusts Snape.  Therefore, I do.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But Dumbledore can make mistakes. He's said it himself --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're blinded by hatred.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm not --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You are!  People are disappearing, Harry.  Daily.  We can only put our trust in a handful of people. If we start fighting amongst ourselves, we're doomed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Open up, you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't trust me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: 'Course 'tis.  Made them myself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You'll have to forgive Remus.  It takes its toll -- his condition.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Are you alright, Mr. Weasley?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: We're being followed, all of us. Molly doesn't leave the house most days.  It's not been easy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Did you get my owl?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, but I thought it best if I replied in person.  If Dumbledore's traveling, it's news to the Ministry.  But perhaps that's the way Dumbledore wants it.  As for Draco Malfoy -- I know a bit more.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I sent an agent to Borgin & Burkes.  From what you describe, I think what you and Ron saw at the end of the summer -- the object that Draco seemed so interested in -- was a Vanishing Cabinet.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A Vanishing Cabinet?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: They were all the rage when Voldemort first rose to power. You can imagine the appeal. Should the Death Eaters come calling, one needed only slip inside and disappear for an hour or two.  But they're tricky contraptions.  Require a tremendous amount of looking after.  Eventually they fell out of favor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What happened to it?  The one at Borgin & Burkes?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Nothing.  It's still there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry.  You know, I went through all this before -- the last time around.  Times like these -- dark times -- do funny things to people.  It can bring them together and it can tear them apart.  Things... speed up.  It's what happens when you don't know if today will be your last.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It was delicious, Molly.  Really.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're sure you won't stay?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No, we should go. The first night of the cycle is always the worst --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Remus...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Everyone gone to bed?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Soon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't sleep these days.  So I wash my hair.  Silly, right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Happy Christmas, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sweetheart...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: There's someone out there.  I can smell him.  There's more than one --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh my god...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry, no!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Remus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ginny, stay with your mother!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No, Harry!  It's a trap!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't you smell clean.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You have to realize who you are, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I know who I am, Hermione, alright?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sorry. So tell me what Arthur said.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: If Dumbledore's traveling places, it's news to the Ministry.  But get this:  that night at Borgin & Burkes?  It seems Draco was looking at a Vanishing Cabinet.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What would Draco want with a Vanishing Cabinet?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You tell me.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He looks different, don't you think?  Draco.  Almost... ill.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Who could tell the difference?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Lav, c'mon. Of course I'll wear it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That's my Won-Won.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Excuse me, I have to go vomit.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir, is it true that Professor Merrythought is retiring?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now, Tom, I couldn't tell you if I knew, could I?  I must say, m'boy, I'd like to know where you get your information.  More knowledgeable than half the staff, you are. By the way, thank you for the pineapple -- you're quite right, it is my favorite -- how is it you knew?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Intuition.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good gracious, look at the time. Off you go, boys, or Professor Dippett will have us all in detention.  Lestrange, Avery, don't forget your essays...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Look sharp, Tom.  You don't want to be caught out of bed after hours...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I know a secret shortcut or two.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, I imagine you do.  Something on your mind, Tom?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, sir.  I couldn't think of anyone else to go to.  The other professors, well, they're not like you.  They might... misunderstand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I was in the library the other night, in the Restricted section, and I read something rather odd, about a bit of rare magic, and I thought perhaps you could illuminate me...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't know anything about such things and I wouldn't tell you if I did!  Now get out of here at once and don't ever let me catch you mentioning it again!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Confused?  I would be surprised if you weren't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't understand -- what happened?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: This is perhaps the most important memory I've collected.  It's also a lie. This memory has been tampered with.  In this case by the person whose memory it is, our friend Professor Slughorn.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But why would he tamper with his own memory?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I suspect he is ashamed of it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Why indeed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I asked you to get to know Professor Slughorn and you've done so.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now I want you to persuade him to divulge his true memory.  Any way you can.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't know him that well, sir --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're the Chosen One, Harry.  And Horace is, at heart, a decent man. Provide the proper circumstances and he will confess his sins.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: This memory is everything, Harry. Without it, we are blind. Without it, we leave the fate of our world to chance.  You have no choice. You must not fail.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now don't forget to look over the chapter on antidotes.  I'll be poisoning one of you next time we meet.  I'm joking!  Off you go! Don't forget your rattails, Miss Alys.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ah! If it isn't the Prince of Potions himself!  To what do I owe the pleasure?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, sir, I wondered if I might ask you something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ask away, my dear boy, ask away!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, you see, the other day I was in the Restricted Section -- in the library -- and I stumbled upon something rather odd while reading.  Something about a bit of rare magic...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes?  And exactly what was this rare magic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm not sure... That is, I don't recall the name... exactly.  But it got me wondering... Are there some kinds of magic you're not allowed to teach?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm a Potions Professor, Harry. Perhaps your question would best be posed to Professor Snape.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, well, we don't exactly see eye-to-eye, sir.  What I mean to say is, he's not like you.  He might... misunderstand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: There can be no light without the dark.  And so it is with magic. Myself, I have always strived to live within the light.  I suggest you do the same.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Did you say the same to Tom Riddle, sir?  When he came asking questions.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dumbledore put you up to this. Didn't he?  Didn't he!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dead. Did you actually expect you could just walk up to Ol' Sluggy and ask him to reveal his deepest, darkest secret?  Honestly, Harry, sometimes I think the Daily Prophet should call you the Dim One.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Nice.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're going to have to persuade him somehow.  And now, I'm afraid, you've made it a lot harder.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hermione.  I think Malfoy's leaving the castle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I've seen it.  Sometimes... sometimes he just disappears off the Map.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That's... not possible.  No one can leave the castle these days. The Map is wrong.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The Map is never wrong.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's beautiful, isn't it?  The moon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Divine.  Had ourselves a little late-night snack, did we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It was on your bed.  The box. Thought I'd try one...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Or twenty.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I can't stop thinking about her, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Really?  Honestly, I reckoned she was starting to annoy you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: She could never annoy me.  I think... I think I love her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Excuse me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well... Brilliant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do you think she knows I exist?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Bloody well hope so.  She's been snogging you for three months.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Snogging?  Who're you talking about?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Who're you talking about?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Romilda, of course.  Romilda Vane.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Okay.  Very funny.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What the hell was that for?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's no joke!  I'm in love with her!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Okay!  Fine!  You're in love with her!  Have you ever actually met her!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  Can you introduce me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes???!!!! Oh.  Potter.  It's you.  I'm afraid I'm busy at the moment --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir.  I'm sorry.  I wouldn't bother you if it weren't absolutely --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Where's Romilda?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What's the matter with Wenby?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ah.  Very well.  Bring him in.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'd have thought you could whip up a remedy for this in no time, Harry -- an expert potioneer like you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I figured this called for a more practiced hand, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hello, darling.  Fancy a drink?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hm.  Perhaps you're right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm sorry, sir.  About the other day.  Our... misunderstanding.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, well, water under the bridge as they say, correct?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I mean, I'm sure you're tired of it, after all these years.  The questions.  About... Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'll ask you not to use that name.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, sir.  It's just, well, Dumbledore once said that fear of a name only increases fear of the thing itself.  It seemed sensible.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: With all due respect, Dumbledore sometimes forgets that most of us do not possess powers so great that we can risk offending the most dangerous Dark Lord who ever lived.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Alright, m'boy!  Bottoms up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What's this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A tonic for the nerves.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What happened to me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Love potion.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And a bloody strong one at that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I feel really... bad.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Pick-me-up's what you need, m'boy. Do us all good, I think.  I've got butterbeer, wine -- ah -- and a dazzling oak-matured mead.  I had other intentions for this but given the circumstances...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: There we are, Potter.  To life!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ron!  Ron!!!  Professor, help him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I d-don't understand --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Professor!  Do something!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He's choking!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Breathe!  C'mon, Ron, don't be a prat.  Breathe!  BREATHE!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: These girls are gonna kill me, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Quick thinking on your part, Harry.  Using a Bezoar.  You must be very proud of your student, eh, Horace?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hm?  Oh.  Yes... very proud.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think we all agree that Mr. Potter's actions were heroic.  The question is:  Why were they necessary.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Why indeed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: This appears to be a gift, Horace. You don't by chance remember who gave you this bottle, do you -- which by the way possesses remarkably subtle hints of licorice and cherry when not polluted with poison.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Actually I had intended to give it as a gift myself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: To whom might I ask?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You, Headmaster.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Where is he?  Where's my Won-Won! Has he been asking for me? What's she doing here?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I might ask you the same.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I happen to be his girlfriend.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I happen to be his... friend.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't make me laugh.  You haven't spoken in weeks.  I suppose you want to make up with him now that he's suddenly all interesting.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He's been poisoned, you daft dimbo! And for the record, I've always found him interesting.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ha!  See? He senses my presence. I'm here, Won-Won. I'm here --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Er... My... Nee... Er!  My!  Nee!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ah, to be young and feel love's keen sting.  Come, everyone, I think Mr. Weasley is well tended.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: 'Bout time, don't you think?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I've always cherished my students. They're my life...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh shut up.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ron.  Stop.  You're making it snow.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Huh?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Tell me again how I broke up with Lavender?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Um, well, she came to visit you in the hospital, you see, and you talked -- I don't believe it was a long conversation --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't get me wrong.  I'm bloody thrilled to be shot of her.  It's just she seems... a bit put out.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Does, doesn't she?  And you say you don't remember a thing from that night?  Not one thing?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well... there is... something. But no.  It can't be.  Besides, I was completely boggled, wasn't I?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Right.  Boggled...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That's Katie.  That's Katie Bell.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How are you, Katie?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Give me a moment, girls.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I know you're going to ask, Harry. But I don't know who cursed me. I've tried to remember.  Honestly. But I just... can't...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Cruci--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sectumsempra!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't touch me!  Don't you dare touch me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You have to get rid of it.  Today.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Take my hand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The Room of Requirement...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Over the years, if someone had a secret, if they wanted to conceal something, this is where they came.  Some of these things are almost as old as the castle itself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Who showed you this?  First.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Fred and George.  First year.  I hid Tom Riddle's diary here for a time.  Wish I'd left it...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What was that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: See, you never know what you'll find up here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: All right.  Close your eyes.  That way you can't be tempted.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: There's something else.  Another secret of sorts.  One of mine...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That can stay hidden up here too, if you like.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: So.  Did you and Ginny do it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You know.  Hide the book.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh.  Yeah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Still no luck with Slughorn, I take it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Say that again.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well?  How do you feel?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Excellent.  Really excellent.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now remember.  Slughorn usually eats early, takes a short walk and then returns to his office.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Right.  I'm going down to Hagrid's.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What?  No, Harry -- you've got to go see Slughorn.  We have a plan --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  I've got a good feeling about going to Hagrid's.  I feel like it's the place to be tonight, know what I mean?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Trust me.  I know what I'm doing. Or at least Felix does.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Merlin's beard, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sorry, sir.  I should've announced myself.  Cleared my throat. Coughed.  You probably feared I was Madam Sprout.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, yes, actually -- Why would you think that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Just the general behavior, sir. The sneaking around.  The jumping when you saw me.  By the way, those Tentacula leaves -- they're quite valuable, aren't they?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ten galleons a leaf to the right buyer -- not that I'm familiar with such back alley transactions. One hears rumors is all.  My own interests are purely academic, of course.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Personally, these plants have always kind of freaked me out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Exactly how did you get out of the castle, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Through the front doors, sir.  I'm off to Hagrid's, you see.  He's a very dear friend and I felt like paying him a visit.  So if you don't mind, I'll be going.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's nearly nightfall.  Surely you realize I can't allow you to roam the grounds all by yourself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, then by all means come along, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry, I must insist you accompany me back to the castle immediately!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That would be counterproductive, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And what makes you say that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No idea.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Merlin's beard...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Is that an actual Acromantula?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A dead one, I think, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: 'Arry.  'Orace.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: My god, dear man.  How did you ever manage to kill it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Kill 'im! Me oldest friend, 'e was!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm sorry, I... didn't realize.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ah, don' worry yerself.  Yer not alone.  Seriously misunderstood creatures -- spiders.  It's the eyes, I reckon.  Unnerve people.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Not to mention the pincers.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I reckon that too... How'd yeh get outta the castle anyways?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Through the front doors.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hagrid.  I wouldn't want to be indelicate, but Acromantula venom is uncommonly rare and, well, if you wouldn't mind my extracting a vial or two -- purely for academic pursuits...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don' suppose it's doin' 'im any good, izzit?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: My thoughts exactly!  Always carry a few spare ampoules for just such occasions.  Old Potion Master's habit, you know...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Wish yeh coulda seen 'im in 'is prime.  Magnificent 'e was.  Jus' magnificent...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Why don't I say a few words?  I trust he had family?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh yeah.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Farewell...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Aragog.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Farewell, Aragog, king of arachnids.  Though your body will decay, your spirit lingers on in the quiet, web-spun places of your Forest home.  May your many-eyed descendents ever flourish and your human friends find solace for the loss they have sustained.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Tha' was... tha' was... beautiful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And Odo the hero, they bore him back home...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: To the place he'd known as a lad, They laid him to rest with his hat inside out and his wand snapped in two, which was sad...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I had 'im from an egg, yeh know. Tiny little thing he was when he hatched.  No bigger'n a Pekinese.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sweet.  I once had a fish. Francis.  Lovely little thing. One day I came downstairs and he'd vanished.  Poof.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Tha's odd.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Isn't it?  That's life, I suppose. One goes along and then... poof.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That's never unicorn hair, Hagrid?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hagrid looks up, reels a bit.  Nods.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But my dear chap, do you know how much that's worth?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No idea... no idea at all...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It was a student who gave me Francis.  One spring afternoon I discovered a bowl upon my desk with a few inches of clear water. There was a flower petal floating upon the surface.  As I watched, the petal sank, but just before it touched bottom... it transformed. Into a wee fish.  It was beautiful magic, wondrous to behold.  The petal had come from a lily.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Your mother.  The day I came downstairs, the day I found the bowl empty... was the day she...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I know what you want.  But I can't give it to you.  It will ruin me...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do you know why I survived?  The night I got this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Because of her.  Because she sacrificed herself.  Because she refused to step aside.  Because her love was more powerful than Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Please don't say his --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm not afraid of the name, Professor.  And I'm not afraid of him.  And you shouldn't be either. She didn't just die for me that night.  She died for you too.  She died for everyone who's ever woken in the middle of the night afraid a Death Eater waited on their doorstep.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Professor.  I'm going to tell you something, something others have only guessed at.  It's true.  I am the Chosen One.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Only I can kill him.  But in order to do so, I need to know what Tom Riddle asked you that night in your office all those years ago. And I need to know what you told him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Be brave, Professor.  Be brave like my mother.  Otherwise you disgrace her.  Otherwise she died for nothing.  Otherwise, the bowl remains empty forever.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No!  Absolutely not!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't think too badly of me once you've seen it.  You don't know what he was like... even then.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How is he?  Horace?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir, is it true that Professor Merrythought is retiring?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Now, Tom, I couldn't tell you if I knew, could I?  I must say, m'boy, I'd like to know where you get your information.  More knowledgable than half the staff, you are. By the way, thank you for the pineapple -- you're quite right, it is my favorite -- how is it you knew?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Intuition.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good gracious, is it that time already?  Off you go, boys, or Professor Dippett will have us all in detention.  Lestrange, Avery, don't forget your essays...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Look sharp, Tom.  You don't want to be caught out of bed after hours...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I know a secret shortcut or two.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, I imagine you do.  Something on your mind, Tom?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, sir.  I couldn't think of anyone else to go to.  The other Professors, well, they're not like you.  They might... misunderstand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I was in the library the other night, in the Restricted section, and I read something rather odd, about a bit of rare magic and I thought perhaps you could illuminate me.  It's called, as I understand it... a Horcrux.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Excuse me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Horcrux.  I came across the term while reading and I didn't fully understand it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm not sure what you were reading, Tom, but that's very Dark stuff, very Dark indeed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, sir.  Which is why I came to you.  I mean no disrespect to the rest of the staff, but I thought if anyone could tell me... it would be you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A Horcrux is an object in which a person has concealed part of their soul.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, I thought it might be something like that.  But I don't understand how that works, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: One splits one's soul and hides part of it in an object.  By doing so, you are protected should you be attacked and your body destroyed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Protected?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That part of your soul that was hidden, lives on.  In other words, you cannot die.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How does one split his soul, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I think you can guess the answer to that, Tom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Murder.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes.  Killing rips the soul apart. It is a violation against nature. After, one is never the same.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Out of curiosity, sir -- can you only split your soul once?  For instance, isn't seven the most powerfully magical number --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Seven!  Merlin's beard, Tom! Isn't it bad enough to think of killing one person?  To rip the soul into seven pieces...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: This is all hypothetical, isn't it, Tom?  All academic...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Of course, sir.  And I promise I'll not speak of our conversation.  It'll be our little secret...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: This is beyond anything I imagined.  In my life I have seen things that are unimaginably horrific.  I know now... you will see worse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do you mean to say he succeeded, sir?  In making a Horcrux?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh he succeeded.  And not just once.  Think, Harry.  He's just told us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Seven.  He made seven -- the most powerfully magical number.  But... what are they exactly?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: They can be anything.  The most commonplace of objects.  A ring, for example.  Or a book...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Tom Riddle's diary --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's a Horcrux, yes.  Four years ago, when you saved Ginny Weasley's life in the Chamber of Secrets, when you brought me this I knew.  This was a different kind of magic.  Very dark.  Very powerful.  But until tonight, I had no idea just how powerful...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And the ring...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Belonged to Voldemort's mother. It was difficult to find and...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: ... even more difficult to destroy. But if you could find them all. If you did destroy each Horcrux...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: One destroys Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But how would you find them?  They could be hidden anywhere, couldn't they...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: True.  But magic, especially Dark magic...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: ... leaves traces.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's where you've been going, isn't it, sir?  When you leave the school.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes.  And I think... perhaps... I may have found another.  But this time I cannot hope to destroy it alone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Once again, I shall ask too much of you.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry.  It's time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hermione, is the Room of Requirement unplottable?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: If one wants it to be.  Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It would explain why I thought Malfoy was leaving the castle when he disappeared off the Map.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He was going to the Room of Requirement.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Of course, and that explains the Vanishing Cabinet as well!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  I got an owl from Dad this morning.  The one at Borgin & Burke's?  It's still there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: But I'm telling you.  I saw it --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What if there are two?  Vanishing cabinets.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What if there are?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't know...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good luck, mate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't need luck.  I'll be with Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Have you ever considered that you ask too much?  That you take too much for granted?  Has it ever crossed your brilliant mind that I don't want to do this anymore?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Whether it has or hasn't is irrelevant.  I will not negotiate this with you, Severus.  You agreed.  There's nothing more to discuss.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Harry.  You need a shave, my friend.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: At times I forget how much you've grown.  At times I still see the small boy from the cupboard. Forgive my mawkishness, Harry.  I am an old man.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You look the same to me, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Like your mother, you are unfailingly kind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A trait people never fail to undervalue.  I'm afraid.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The place to which we journey tonight is exceedingly dangerous, Harry.  I promised that you could accompany me and I stand by that promise.  But there is a condition:  You must obey any command I give you -- without question.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Understand what I'm saying. Should I tell you to hide, you must hide.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Should I tell you to run, you will run.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: And should I tell you to abandon me and save yourself...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You will do so.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Your word, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: My word.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Take my arm.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir, I thought one couldn't Apparate within Hogwarts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Being me has its privileges.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's there, isn't it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: This is the place.  Oh yes, this place has known magic. Where you stand, Harry, Tom Riddle once stood many, many years ago, when he was but a poor orphan boy with a penchant for cruelty...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: One wintry afternoon, he lured two younger classmates to this cave. What happened is unclear.  But this much is known:  the children were damaged.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: In order to gain passage, payment must be made, payment intended to weaken any intruder.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You should've let me, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh, no, Harry.  Your blood is much more precious than mine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Careful.  The water.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It's there.  The only question is how do we get to it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: We couldn't, perhaps, just try a Summoning Charm, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Accio Horcrux!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Perhaps not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: If you would, Harry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir... have you ever taken Felix Felicis?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Only recreationally.  You see, I believe one creates one's own luck.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Professor... there are bodies in this lake.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Remember... the water.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do you think the Horcrux is in there, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Oh yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It has to be drunk.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You remember the condition on which I brought you with me? This potion might paralyze me.  It might cause me to forget why I'm here.  It might create so much pain I beg for relief.  You are not to indulge these requests, Harry.  It is your job to make sure I keep drinking this potion even if you have to force it down my throat.  Understood?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Why can't I drink it, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Because I am much older, much cleverer... and much less valuable. Your good health, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Professor?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Professor?  Can you hear me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't... don't make me...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You... you can't stop, Professor. You've got to keep drinking.  Like you said.  Remember.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Nooooooo!!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Make it stop... Please... make it stop...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: It will, sir.  It'll stop.  But only if you drink...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: My fault.  It's all my fault...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Too much... I can't... take it... I want... to die... kill... kill me... KILL ME, HARRY!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Your word, Harry!  Your word!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Kill me!  It's the only way!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: One more.  Just one more.  And then -- I promise... I'll do what you say.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I promise.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Water. Water...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Aguamenti.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You did it, sir.  Look --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Water!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm trying, sir.  I'm --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Go...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: We have to... go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't worry, sir.  We're nearly there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I am not worried, Harry.  I am with you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: To your Houses.  No dawdling.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: We need to get you up to the hospital, sir, to Madam Pomfrey --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  Severus... Severus is who I need... Go and wake him... Tell him what has happened...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Speak to no one else... I... I shall wait here...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: All right.  Okay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sir, are you... praying?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No, Harry.  I do not pray.  I was merely closing a window -- the one that had allowed us to Apparate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hide yourself below.  And do not speak or show yourself without my permission.  No matter what.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do as I say, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Trust me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good evening, Draco.  What brings you out on such a fine Spring evening?  Or is it Summer?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Who else is here?  I heard you talking.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I often talk aloud to myself.  I find it extraordinarily useful. That which sounds sane at a whisper can seem utterly mad when said for all the world to hear. Haven't been whispering to yourself, have you, Draco?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You are not an assassin, Draco.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: How do you know what I am?  I've done things that would shock you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Like cursing Katie Bell and hoping she would, in turn, bear a cursed necklace to me?  Like replacing a bottle of mead with one laced with poison.
