Forgive me, Draco, but these are attempts so feeble I cannot help but question if your heart has been really in them. I'm curious.  When Voldemort gave you this task, when he asked you to kill me, was it in a whisper?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He trusts me!  I was chosen!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Then I shall make it easy for you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Expelliarumus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well done, Draco.  But I warn you. Killing is not nearly as easy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're not alone.  Are you.  There are others.  How?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: The Vanishing Cabinet in the Room of Requirement.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: That cabinet has been broken for years.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I've been mending it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ingenious.  Let me guess.  It has a sister.  A twin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: In Borgin & Burkes.  They form --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: A passage, yes.  Very good. I once knew a boy years ago who made all the wrong choices.  Let me help you, Draco.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't want your help!  Don't you see!  I have to do it!  I have to! I've got to kill you or he'll kill me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Say that again, Draco.  But aloud this time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well now, look what we have here. Dumbledore.  Wandless and alone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Cornered in his own castle.  Well done, Draco.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Good evening, Bellatrix.  I think introductions are in order.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Love to, Albus.  But I'm afraid we're on a bit of a tight schedule.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: He doesn't have the stomach.  Like his father.  Let me finish him. In my own way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No!  The Dark Lord was clear.  The boy's to do it.  Go on, Draco. Now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Severus...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Well, look who's here.  Hogwarts own Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.  Come to see the slaughter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Severus... please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I gave my word.  I made a vow...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Avada Kedavra!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You can no longer stay here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Boo.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Draco!  Draco! They'll kill you if you stay.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Go on!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Go on!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Cruciatus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Incacerata!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Impedimenta!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Fight!  Fight back, you coward!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Don't ever associate that word and my name again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No!  He belongs to the Dark Lord!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Sectumsempra!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You dare use my own spells against me, Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You may have gotten your mother's eyes, but you're as dim as your father.  Yes.  It's me.  I'm the Half-Blood Prince.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hagrid... HAGRID!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hagrid!  You alright?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Take more'n tha' ter finish me off.  Not sure about me 'ouse, tho'.  But if anybody can put it righ', Dumbledore can.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Hagrid, Dumbledore --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Only thing I can't reckon is wha' Snape was doin' with tha' lot.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: An' wha's this wi' the Dark Mar'? Who's been killed? Where's Dumbledore, 'arry? Where's Dumbledore!!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Potter, in light of what's happened... should you feel the need to talk to someone...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You should know... Professor Dumbledore...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You meant a great deal to him.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do you think he would've done it. Draco?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: No.  He was lowering his wand.  In the end, it was Snape.  It was always Snape.  And I did nothing...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Strange.  Thinking this is a piece of Voldemort's soul...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yeah, strange.  Only... it's not. It's a fake.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Go on.  Open it.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: 'To the Dark Lord.  I know I will be dead long before you read this but I want you to know that it was I who discovered your secret.  I have stolen the real Horcrux and intend to destroy it as soon as I can.  I face death in the hope that when you meet your match, you will be mortal once more.  R.A.B.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Dunno.  But whoever they are, they have the real Horcrux.  Which means, it was a waste.  All of it.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Ron's okay with it, you know.  You and Ginny.  But if I were you, when he's around, I'd keep the snogging to a minimum.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I'm not coming back, Hermione.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: We reckoned -- Ron and me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I have to finish what Dumbledore started. I'm not sure where that will lead me... but I'll let you and Ron konw where I am -- when I can.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I've always admired your courage, Harry, but sometimes... you're really thick.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You don't honestly think you can find all those Horcruxes by yourself, do you? You need us, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yeah.  I do.  But do me a favor. When I'm around?  Keep the snogging to a minimum.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Like that's going to happen.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Besides, he's barking.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Funny, he says the same about you.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Yes, but I'm exceptionally perceptive.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: You're brilliant.  You both are.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: Do you think we'll ever... come back?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
dialogues: I don't know. I never realised how beautiful this place was.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: These are dark times, there is no denying.  Our world has perhaps faced no greater threat than it does today.  But I say this to our citizenry:  we, ever your servants, continue to defend your liberty and repel the forces that would seek to take it from you. Your Ministry remains strong...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione.  Your tea is ready, dear.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Coming, Mum.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't you look lovely.  All packed?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Are you sure these biscuits are sugar-free?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Quite sure, dear.  See the big bold letters that say 'Sugar Free'?  Dead giveaway.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mm.  Yes. Hello, kitten.  Don't you look lovely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Darling, don't be suspicious the biscuits taste so good, be grateful the company's so clever...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Obliviate.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Goodbye.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What are those?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Close the door.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: These are for the Order.  So many are on the run now, it helps them to stay connected with the rest of us.  Know they're not alone...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: C'mon.  Mum's got dinner ready.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Severus.  I was beginning to worry you'd lost your way.  Come.  I've saved you a seat.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You know our hosts, of course, Severus.  Narcissa in particular has been most hospitable.  Lucius, on the other hand, is, I fear, burdened by my presence.  Are you, Lucius?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My lord?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Are you burdened?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My lord is always welcome here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You bring news I trust, Severus?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It will happen Saturday next.  At nightfall.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And this information comes --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: #NAME?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I have heard differently, my lord. Dawlish, the Auror, let slip that the Potter boy will not be moved until the thirtieth of this month, the night before he turns seventeen.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This is a false trail.  The Auror Office no longer plays any part in the protection of Harry Potter. Those closest to him believe we have infiltrated the Ministry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, they've got that right, then, 'aven't they?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Pius, what say you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: One hears many things, my lord. Whether the truth is among them is not clear.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Spoken like a true politician. You will, I think, prove most useful, Pius.  Where will he be taken?  The boy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: To a safehouse.  Likely the home of someone in the Order.  I'm told it has been given every manner of protection possible. Once there, it will be impractical to attack him.  We may have compromised the Ministry, but there are those who remain loyal to him.  As long as the Ministry stands, his allies within will have the means at their disposal to insure his safety.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My lord, if I might, I'd like to volunteer myself for this task. I'd like to kill the boy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wormtail!  Have I not spoken to you about keeping our guest quiet?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes, m-my lord.  Right away, my lord.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: As inspiring as I find your bloodlust, Bellatrix, I must be the one to kill Harry Potter.  But I face an unfortunate complication.  It has recently come to my attention that my wand and Potter's share the same core. They are, in some ways, twins.  We can wound but not fatally harm one another.  Which means, if I am to kill him... I will have to do it with another's wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Come now.  Surely one of you would like the honor?  What about... you, Lucius?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I require your wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Do I detect elm?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes, my lord.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And the core?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dragon -- dragon heartstring.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My wand?  You can't possibly think I would give you my wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, my lord.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: For those of you who do not know, we are joined tonight by Miss Charity Burbage who until recently taught at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.  Her specialty was Muggle studies. It is Miss Burbage's belief that Muggles are not so different from us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: She would, given her way, have us mate with them.  To her, the mixture of magical and Muggle blood is not an abomination but something to be encouraged.  I, of course, take a contrary view.  But we're all civilized here.  All adults.  We can agree to disagree.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Severus, please.  We're friends...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Avada Kedavra!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Nagini... Dinner.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Come now, Dudley.  Hurry up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Time for the teary farewell.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I've lived in this house twenty years.  And now -- in a single night -- I'm expected to leave.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: They'll torture you.  Even Dudley. If they think you know where I'm going, they'll stop at noth--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You think I don't know that?  You think I don't know what they're capable of?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You didn't just lose a mother that night in Godric's Hollow, you know.  I lost a sister.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Do you have any?  Magic?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What a cruel thing to ask.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, this is goodbye then, boy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't understand.  Isn't he coming with us?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Absolutely not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, because -- he doesn't want to, do you, boy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Absolutely not.  Besides, I'm just a waste of space.  Isn't that right, Vernon?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Come on, Dudley, we're off.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't think you're a waste of space.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well... thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: See you, Big D.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Good riddance.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: All righ', 'arry?  Yeh look fit.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah, he's ruddy gorgeous.  What say we get undercover before someone murders him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I thought you were looking after the Prime Minister, Kingsley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're more important.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hello, Harry.  Bill Weasley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wasn't always this handsome.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dead ugly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: True enough.  Owe it all to a werewolf by name of Greyback. Hope to repay the favor one day.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You are still beautiful to me, William.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Just remember, Fleur, once you're married:  Bill takes his steaks on the raw side now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My husband, the joker.  By the way, wait until you hear the news! Remus and I are --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: All right, all right!  You'll all have time for a cozy catch-up later!  We've got to get the hell out of here and soon!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Potter, you're underage, which means you've still got the Trace on you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Trace?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You sneeze and the Ministry will know who wipes your nose.  Point is, we have to use those means of transport the Trace can't detect: brooms, thestrals and the like. We'll go in pairs.  That way if anyone's out there waiting for us -- and I reckon there will be -- they won't know which Harry Potter is the real one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The real one...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I believe you're familiar with this particular brew.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I told you he'd take it well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: If you think I'm going to let people risk their lives for me --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Never done that before, have we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This is different.  Taking that. Becoming me -- no.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, none of us really fancy it, mate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah, imagine if something went wrong and we were stuck as scrawny, specky gits forever.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Everyone here's of age, Potter, and they've all agreed to take the risk.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Technically, I've been coerced. Mundungus Fletcher, Mr. Potter. I've always been a huge admirer.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Nip it, Mundungus!  All right, Granger, as discussed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Blimey, Hermione!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Straight in here, if you please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: For those of you who haven't taken Polyjuice Potion before, fair warning.  It tastes like goblin piss.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Have a lot of experience with that, do you, Mad-Eye?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Just trying to defuse the tension.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wow -- we're identical!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wow -- we're identical!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Not yet you aren't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't have something a bit more sporty, do you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes, don't fancy this color at all.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Fancy this:  You're not you, so shut it and strip. You'll need to change too, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Bill, look away -- I'm 'ideous.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I knew Ginny was lying about that tattoo.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry, your eyesight really is awful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Blimey.  I almost forgot.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Right then.  We'll be pairing off. Each Potter will have a protector. As for you, Harry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The real Harry!  Where the devil are you, anyway?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You'll ride with Hagrid.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Brought yeh here sixteen years ago when you were barely bigger than a Bowtruckle. Seems only righ' I should be the one ter take yeh away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah, it's all very touching. Let's go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Good luck, everyone.  On the count of three.  One... two --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hagrid!  We've got to help the others!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Can't do it, 'arry.  My job's ter get you where we're goin' safe 'n sound -- Mad-Eye's orders!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What was that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dragon fire!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That's him!  The real one!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hol' tight, 'arry!  We've got ter get yeh out of here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hagrid... HAGRID...!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Avada...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry!  Hagrid!  What happened?! Have you seen the others?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Is no one back yet?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: They were on us from the star', Molly -- the Death Eaters.  And You-Know-Who as well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, thank goodness you two are all right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Haven't go' any brandy, have yeh, Molly?  Fer medicinal purposes?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron and Tonks should've already been back.  Dad and Fred as well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Oh my God!  George!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The house!  Quickly!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My boy!  My darling boy!  What've they done to you?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Remus!  What're you doing!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What creature sat in the corner the first time that Harry Potter visited my office at Hogwarts!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Are you mad...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What Creature!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: A grindylow!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We've been betrayed.  Voldemort knew you were being moved tonight. I had to make sure you weren't an imposter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who did this to him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Snape. He'll be fine, Molly.  But that's Dark Magic.  The damage is done.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Someone else is back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The last words Albus Dumbledore spoke to the pair of us?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: 'Harry is the best hope we have. Trust him.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What gave you away?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hedwig -- I think.  She was trying to protect me --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hey ya -- Well... thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Deserves that.  Brilliant, he was. Wouldn't be standing here without him.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Really?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Always the tone of surprise.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Are we the last?  Where's George?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Remus.  Where's my son?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How do you feel, Georgie?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Saint-like.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Come again?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Saint-like... You see, I'm holy. Holey, Fred, geddit?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: With the whole wide world of ear- related humor at your disposal, you go for holey?  Pathetic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Reckon I'm still better-looking than you.  Better-looking than Bill, that's for sure.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mad-Eye's dead.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mundungus took one look at Voldemort and Disapparated.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mad-Eye reckoned You-Know-Who would expect the real Harry to be with the most skilled Auror.  He knew he'd be in the most danger.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It doesn't explain how they knew we were moving Harry tonight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wha'?  One of us?  Tha's mad.  I'd wager me life it wasn' none of you lot.  An' if it was me I'd kno', wouldn' I?  Talk in me sleep on occasion, I'll admit, but there's only Fang aroun' ter hear an' mostly it's gibberish an' besides I'd cut me tongue out 'fore 'd betray 'arry e'en in me dreams --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wha's so funny!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I trust you with my life, Hagrid. I trust everyone in this room. Understood?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: 'Ear, 'ear.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Better.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No!  No!  I believed a different wand would work, I swear!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Then explain this!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Obliviate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But it makes no sense...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Perhaps our friend's loyalties lie elsewhere, Wormtail.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No!  There must be a way!  I'll think of something else!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I hope so, Ollivander, for your sake.  I won't be so forgiving next time...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Going somewhere?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No one else is going to die.  Not for me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: For you?  You think Madeye died for you?  You think George took that curse for you?  You may be the Chosen One, mate, but this is a whole lot bigger than that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Come with me.  Now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And leave Hermione?  Are you mad? We wouldn't last two days without her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't tell her I said that. Besides, you've still got the Trace on you.  And there's the wedding...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wedding?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Bill and Fleur.  Mum's been planning it for months.  Only thing that's kept her sane, I reckon.  She'll kill me if I miss it.  Kill you too.  Rather go face to face with You-Know-Who if I'm honest.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't care about a bloody wedding -- no matter whose it is. I have to start searching for the Horcruxes.  It's the only chance we have to beat him.  And the longer we wait the stronger he gets.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Tonight's not the night, mate. You'd only be doing him a favor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Do you think he knows?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I mean, they're bits of his soul, the Horcruxes.  Bits of him.  When Dumbledore destroyed the ring and you destroyed Tom Riddle's diary all those years ago -- he must've felt something right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What I'm saying is, if we do this thing right, if we find the Horcruxes and begin to destroy them one by one...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Won't he know he's being hunted?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: All together now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: One.  Two.  Three!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Were you going to tell me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And Ron and Hermione.  They'll not be going back to Hogwarts either?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I see.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dumbledore didn't want anyone to know what it is we're doing.  If I tell you, I'd be betraying him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Zip me up, will you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Seems silly, doesn't it?  A wedding.  Given everything that's going on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Maybe that's the best reason to have it.  Because of everything that's going on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Morning.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How's it look on your end, boys?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Brilliant!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Bloody hell, what's the Minister of Magic doing here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dunno.  But something tells me he didn't come to give away the bride.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: To what do we owe the pleasure, Minister?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I think we both know the answer to that question, Mr. Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And this would be...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't be coy, Mr. Potter.  Mr. Weasley.  Would you say you were close to your former Headmaster?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dumbledore?  And me?  I dunno. I reckon I was just another Weasley to him.  He was always polite --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And you, Miss Granger?  How would you characterize your relationship?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We were friendly, not close like Harry, but --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What's this all about?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This.  Despite the fact that neither of your friends appear to have been particularly close to their recently deceased Headmaster, he saw fit to remember them in his will.  Now why do you suppose that would be?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No idea.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Come now, you don't expect me to believe...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: 'Herein is set forth the Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore.  First, to Ronald Bilius Weasley, I leave my Deluminator, a device of my own making, in the hope that -- when things seem most dark -- it will show him the light.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dumbledore left this?  For me? Brilliant.  Er -- what is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wicked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: 'To Miss Hermione Jean Granger, I leave my copy of The Tales of Beedle the Bard, in the hope that she will find it entertaining and instructive.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mum used to read me those!  The Wizard and the Hopping Pot, Babbitty Rabbity and her Cackling Stump...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Oh, c'mon!  Beedle's stories are famous!  Babbity Rabbitty? No...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: 'To Harry James Potter, I leave the Snitch he caught in his first Quidditch match at Hogwarts, as a reminder of the rewards of perseverance and skill.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That's it then?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Not quite.  Dumbledore left you a second bequest:  The Sword of Godric Gryffindor.  Unfortunately, the Sword of Gryffindor was not Dumbledore's to give away.  As an important historical artifact, it belongs...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: To Harry!  It belongs to Harry! It chose him!  It came to him in the Chamber of Secrets when he most needed it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The sword may present itself to any worthy Gryffindor, Miss Granger.  That does not make it that wizard's property.  And in any event the current whereabouts of the sword are unknown.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Excuse me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The sword is missing. I won't pretend to be your friend, Mr. Potter.  But I assure you I'm not your enemy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You'll forgive me, Minister.  But it's a little hard to tell the difference these days.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dumbledore said something very similar the last time we spoke.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Where is your guard, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I came alone.  I don't really need them anymore...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We want you to be the godfather.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You mean -- But that's brilliant -- I... don't know what to say.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Say yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hello, Harry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Oh, I've interrupted a deep thought, haven't I?  I can see it growing smaller in your eyes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, 'course not.  How are you, Luna?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Very well.  I was bitten by a garden gnome only moments ago.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How is it they knew we were there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Gnome saliva is enormously beneficial!  Xenophilius Lovegood. We live just over the hill!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Nice to meet you, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I trust you know, Mr. Potter, that we at The Quibbler, unlike those toadies at the Daily Prophet, fully supported Dumbledore during his lifetime and in his death support you just as fully.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Come, Daddy.  Harry doesn't want to talk to us right now.  He's just too nice to say so.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Sir?  May I sit down?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mr. Potter!  By all means!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I found what you wrote in the Daily Prophet very moving, sir.  I take it you knew Professor Dumbledore well?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I certainly knew him the longest, if you don't count his brother Aberforth -- and somehow, people never do seem to count Aberforth.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I never even knew he had a brother, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes, well, Dumbledore was always very private.  Even as a boy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Sir, I was wondering if you'd had much contact with him before he died.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The occasional owl.  Though it was strange...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Strange, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It was the owls themselves.  They often arrived in distress.  It was clear they'd traveled great distances in some cases.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Could you tell me from where they'd come, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm afraid not.  Albus' messages mostly referenced our days together as schoolboys.  They were surprisingly intimate.  When he did speak of his current activities his words would turn elliptical.  Still, I sensed he was under great stress.  Why do you ask?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Just curious.  I was... close to Professor Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, he treasured you, Mr. Potter, I can attest to that.  I can also tell you that when a person passes, it's only natural to rue the things left unsaid, to regret the question never asked. I knew Albus nigh on 100 years, but in many ways he will always remain a riddle even to me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't despair, Elphias.  I'm told he's been thoroughly unriddled by Rita Skeeter.  In 800 pages no less.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That woman is a vulture, Muriel, and you well know it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Someone has to pick the bones to get at the truth.  I read your obituary, Elphias.  Lovely.  But you did skate over some of the sticky patches in Dumbledore's life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm sorry you think so, Muriel.  I assure you I was writing from the heart.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes, well, Rita Skeeter hasn't made that mistake, I'm sure.  Word has it someone talked to her, someone who knew the Dumbledore family well.  You and I both know who that is, Elphias.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: A monstrous betrayal.  I can only conclude the rumors are true and that she has become untethered.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who are you talking about?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, I don't suppose it'll be a secret once the book comes out. Bathilda Bagshot.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who? Bathilda Bagshot!  My god, boy, she's only the most celebrated magical historian of the last century.  Don't they read History of Magic at Hogwarts anymore?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Oh, right.  Slipped my mind...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: She knew the Dumbledores as well as anyone.  She'd have letters, perhaps an interesting photograph or two.  I'm sure Rita Skeeter would have thought it well worth a trip to Godric's Hollow to take a peek into that old bird's rattled cage.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Godric's Hollow?  Bathilda Bagshot lives in Godric's Hollow?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: For years now.  That's where she first met Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Excuse me?  You don't mean to say Dumbledore lived there too?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Of course.  The family moved there after his father killed those three Muggles.  It was quite the scandal. Honestly, my boy, are you sure you knew him at all?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Ministry has fallen.  The Minister of Magic is dead.  They are coming...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Nice meeting you, Mr. Potter!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron!  Ron!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry!  Go!  Go!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Where are we?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Shaftesbury Avenue.  I used to come here to the theater with my mum and dad.  Just popped into my head.  I don't know why...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This way!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We need to change.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How the ruddy --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Undetectable Extension Charm.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're amazing, you are.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Always the tone of surprise.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That'll be the books.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Do you reckon everyone's alright at the wedding?  Maybe we should --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: They were after you, mate.  We'd just put everyone in danger going back.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron's right.  Cappuccino, please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What she said.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Same.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wicked scar.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: So where do we go from here?  The Leaky Cauldron?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Too dangerous.  If Voldemort's taken over the Ministry, none of the old places are safe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My rucksack.  With all my things. I left it back at the Burrow --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're joking.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I've had the essentials packed for days.  Just in case.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: By the way -- these jeans?  Not my favorite.  Bit tight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Down!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stupefy!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Petrificus Totalus! Go.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: She doesn't argue.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Lock the door, get the lights.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This one's name is Rowle.  He was on the Astronomy Tower the night Snape killed Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This is Dolohov.  I recognize him from the wanted posters.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: So what do we do with you, huh? Kill us if it was turned round, wouldn't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Suppose it's him that did Mad-Eye. How would you feel then?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's better we wipe their memories.  We kill them, they'll know we were here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're the boss. Hermione?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're the best with spells.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Maybe you still have the Trace on you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Can't be. The Trace breaks at seventeen. It's Wizarding law.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We didn't celebrate your birthday, Harry.  Ginny and I -- we'd prepared a cake.  We were going to bring it out at the end of the wedding...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione.  I appreciate the thought -- honestly.  But given that we were almost killed by a couple of Death Eaters a few minutes ago...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Right.  Perspective.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We've got to get off the streets, get somewhere safe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I have an idea.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Severus Snape?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mad-Eye...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What was that about?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mad-eye's doing, I'd guess.  In case Snape decided to come snooping.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Homenum revelio.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's a spell to reveal human presence.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We're alone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Lumos.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dear Sirius.  Thank you for Harry's birthday present.  You'd think he'd been born on a broom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: James says he's got the look of a Seeker, but then James would.  We had a very quiet birthday tea, just us and old Bathilda, who dotes on Harry.  Wormy dropped by late in the day, but seemed down and didn't stay long.  James is frustrated being shut up here, but Dumbledore's still got his Invisibility Cloak, so he doesn't have much choice.  By the way, Bathilda tells the most amazing stories about our old Headmaster. I don't know how much to believe. Can it really be true that Dumbledore --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry!  Harry!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron!  I've found him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Good!  Tell him from me he's a git!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry, you can't just disappear. We thought --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's from your Mum.  To Sirius. Bathilda Bagshot...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah.  They knew her.  She wrote A History of Magic, you know.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Did she now?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm thinking maybe we should go talk to her.  She still lives in Godric's Hollow.  I'm thinking maybe she could help us.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry.  I can imagine why you'd want to go there, but... I don't think Bathilda Bagshot is going to know where Voldemort hid his Horcruxes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hey!  I think you two better come down here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The two clinging to the tree are Death Eaters for sure.  Dunno 'bout the bloke on the bench. Can't see us, of course.  But we'll have to be careful coming and going.  C'mon.  There's something else you need to see.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Lovely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: To the Dark Lord.  I know I will be dead long before you read this... I have stolen the real Horcrux and intend to destroy it...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: R.A.B. was Sirius' brother?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.  Question is, did he actually destroy the real Horcrux?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stop!  I order you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Kreacher...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Been spying on us, have you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Kreacher has been... watching. Kreacher always watches.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Maybe he knows.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ever seen this before?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Kreacher, I own this place. Sirius left it to me.  Which means I own you too.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That was Master Regulus' locket.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That's right.  But there were two, weren't there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Where's the other one?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Kreacher doesn't know where the other locket is.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But was it here?  Did you ever see it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Filthy Mudblood -- The Death Eaters will soon be coming for you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Blood-traitor Weasley --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron!  RON!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Answer her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.  It was here, in this house. A most evil object...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How do you mean?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Before he died, Master Regulus ordered Kreacher to destroy it. It was the last thing he asked of Kreacher.  But no matter how Kreacher tried, he could not..

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Where is it now?  Did someone take it, Kreacher?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He came in the night.  He took many things, including the locket.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who, Kreacher?  Who was it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mundungus.  Mundungus Fletcher.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Find him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: As your new Minister for Magic, I promise to restore this temple of tolerance to its former glory. Therefore, beginning today, each employee will be required to submit themselves for evaluation. But know this:  You have nothing to fear... as long as you have nothing to hide...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My father will hear about this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He's not here, you fools.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: They have flesh memories.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Snitches.  They're never touched by bare skin until the Seeker captures it.  Even the wizard who fabricates it wears gloves.  That way, if there's a dispute, the Snitch can identify who first touched it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You mean... it remembers me?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: When Scrimgeour first gave it to you, I thought it might open at your touch -- that Dumbledore had hidden something in it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry Potter!  So long it's been --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Expelliarmus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: As requested, Kreacher has returned with the thief Mundungus Fletcher!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dobby has also returned with the thief Mundungus Fletcher!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What are you playing at -- setting a pair of bleedin' 'ouse-elves on me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dobby was only trying to help! Dobby saw Kreacher in Diagon Alley, which Dobby thought was curious.  And then Dobby heard Kreacher mention Harry Potter's name, which Dobby thought was very curious.  And then Dobby saw that Kreacher was talking to the thief Mundungus Fletcher, which Dobby thought was very, very --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm no thief, you foul little git. I'm a purveyer of rare and wondrous objects --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're a thief, Dung.  Everyone knows it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Master Weasley!  So good to see you again!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wicked trainers.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Listen, I panicked that night, all right?  I never volunteered to die for you, mate.  Can I help it if Mad-Eye fell off his broom --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stop lying!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Piece of advice.  Let's not rehash old times.  Got it... mate?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: When you turned this place over -- don't deny it! -- you found a locket, am I right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Why?  Was it valuable?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You've still got it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No.  He's worried he should have got more money for it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wouldn't be difficult, would it? Bleedin' gave it away, din' I? There I was, pitching me wares in Diagon Alley when some ministry hag comes up and asks to see my license.  Says she's of a mind to lock me up and would've, too, she hadn' taken a fancy to that locket.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who was she?  This witch?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, she's right there, in't she? Bleedin' bow an' all.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Right. So let's do it.  Who gets who?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, unless one of you fancies wearing a skirt...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Remember what we said.  Keep your eyes down.  Don't speak to anyone unless absolutely necessary.  Act as normal as possible.  Just do what you see everyone else doing. We do that -- and with a bit of luck -- we get ourselves inside. And then...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It gets really tricky.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Correct.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This is completely mental.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Completely, utterly, without question.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The world's mental.  Come on, drink up.  We've got a Horcrux to find.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: In case you're interested, I'm Reg Cattermole, Magical Maintenance Department.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mafalda Hopkirk, assistant in the Improper Use of Magic Office.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm nobody.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're somebody.  Be careful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Morning, Reg!  Good luck today.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Oh... yeah.  Thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What do you reckon he meant by 'Good luck.'?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Apparently so.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That's bloody disgusting.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Are those...?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Muggles.  In their rightful place.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Move it, will you -- oh, Runcorn! Forgive me...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You appear to be quite popular.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I gotta tell you, I'm starting to freak out a bit.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Ministry must be hiring young these days.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: They're not Ministry.  They're Snatchers.  They hunt Muggle-borns and blood-traitors for a price.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How long did you say this batch of Polyjuice Potion would last, Hermione?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I didn't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Cattlemole!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's still raining in my office. Two days now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Really?  Have you tried an umbrella?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You do realize I'm on my way downstairs, don't you, Cattermole?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Downstairs...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: To interrogate your wife!  If my wife's blood status were in doubt and the Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement needed a job doing, I think I'd make it a priority.  You've got one hour.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Oh my god.  What am I going to do? My wife's all alone downstairs?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron.  You don't have a wife.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Look, we'll go with you --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, that's mad.  You two find Umbridge.  I'll be fine.  But how do I stop it raining?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Try Finite Incantatem.  Of course if something's gone wrong with an Atmospheric Charm --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Level Two.  Department of Magical Law Enforcement, including Wizengamot Administration Services, Auror Headquarters and Improper Use of Magic Department.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This is you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Finite Incantatem, okay.  And if that doesn't work...?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't like him being on his own down there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron's been coming here since he was two years old.  It's us you should be worrying about.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You really have horrible teeth, you know that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I say if we don't locate Umbridge within the hour, we go find Ron and come back another day.  Deal?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ah, Mafalda!  Travers sent you, did he?  Good.  We'll go straight down.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Oh, yes... of course.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Reckon the old hag will be interrogating Mudbloods all day?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Sh...careful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Runcorn.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Accio locket.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: All right, all right.  Let's calm down, shall we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It probably just snuck up here from Experimental Charms.  I think none of us will soon forget last month's Poisonous Duck...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: R-Runcorn.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: M-morning.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron, it's me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry!  Blimey, I forgot what you looked like.  Where's Hermione?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: She went down to the courtrooms with Umbridge --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I understand, Wakinda, but I can't be a party to that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hello, Reg.  Isn't Mary in for questioning today?  Try to have faith.  If there's anything Molly and I can do for you --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Let me guess.  It's raining in Yaxley's office again?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Tell him to try an umbrella.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Arthur!  You know you're being tracked, don't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Is that a threat, Runcorn?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, Arthur.  It's a fact.  They're watching you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'll tell you later.  Let's find Hermione.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Bloody cold down here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm half-blood, I tell you!  My father was a wizard!  Look him up! William Alderton!  He worked here for thirty years...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's here...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Reg...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mary Elizabeth Cattermole?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mother to Maisie, Ellie and Alfred?  Wife to Reginald?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: A wand was taken from you upon your arrival at the Ministry today, Mrs. Cattermole.  Is this that wand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Would you please tell the court from which witch or wizard you took this wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But I didn't take it.  I got it in Diagon Alley, at Ollivander's, when I was eleven.  It chose me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, no, I don't think so, Mrs. Cattermole.  Wands only choose witches.  And you are not a witch.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But I am!  Tell them, Reg!  Tell them what I am!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What the devil are you doing, Albert?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're lying.  And one mustn't tell lies, Dolores... Stupefy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Expecto PATRONUM!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Relashio!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You?  It's you! Reg, it's Harry Potter!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: 'Tis, isn't it?  This'll be one to tell the kids.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry Potter...?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry... they've seen you.  We've got to get out of here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mary.  Go home.  Get the kids. I'll... I'll meet you there.  We have to get out the country, understand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mary!  Do as I say!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm sorry.  It's just --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Long story.  Nice meeting you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Piss off.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Seal the exits!  Now!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry, quickly, in my bag, there's a small bottle labeled 'Essence of Dittany.'

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Quickly!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Accio Dittany.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Unstopper it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione.  His arm --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Just do it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What happened?  I thought we were going back to Grimmauld Place.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We were.  We were there.  But Yaxley had hold of me.  I knew we couldn't stay once he'd seen, so when he let go I brought us here. Ron got Splinched.  I'm... sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't be stupid.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's all I feel safe doing.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Salvio Hexia... Protego Totalum...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What're you doing?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Protective enchantments.  I don't fancy another visit like we had on Shaftesbury Avenue, do you? Especially with Ron like this. You can get going on the tent...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Tent?  Where am I supposed to find --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Repello Muggletum... Muffliato...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How're the mushrooms?  Seem to be the only edible things growing round here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: They're great.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Make sure to leave some for Ron.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No problem.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How bad is he?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He'll be alright in a few days. Hopefully.  If we could take him to Hogwarts, to Madam Pomfrey --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: So where do we go next?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dumbledore had a theory.  He felt that the Horcruxes would not be made out of random objects.  And he felt they wouldn't be hidden randomly either.  We know of three so far.  The ring, which according to Dumbledore belonged to Tom Riddle's grandfather.  The diary, which belonged to Tom himself. And this, which -- again, according to Dumbledore -- belonged to his mother.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It scares me a bit, that, thinking it's a piece of Vol--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, don't!  Don't say it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's taboo -- You-Know-Who's name. That's how they track people now. It's how they found us in the cafe that night.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How d'you know?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I overheard a bloke from the Enforcement office talking about it at the Ministry.  Blimey, what's that smell?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dinner?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Not bloody likely.  Smells like something Ginny would cook.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Tea?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Is that it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I know.  I felt it too. It's... it's like it's ticking or something, like it has a tiny metal heart, like it's --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: ... alive.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I hate it.  It's like he's here with us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That's why we're going to kill it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dissendium!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Incendio!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Expulso!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Confringo!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's angry.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What're you doing?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We have to keep it safe until we can figure out how to destroy it.
