spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I can put it in my bag --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Seems strange, mate.  Dumbledore sends you off to find a load of Horcruxes, but doesn't bother to tell you how to destroy them. Doesn't that bother you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You wouldn't be lying to me, would you, Gregorovitch?  Because, I must tell you... that will only make it worse for you...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who was he?  The thief?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Just a boy!  Not of the village. It was he who took it.  I never saw it again.  I swear on my life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I believe you...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I thought it had stopped.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You can't let him in, Harry. Dumbledore himself said it.  You have to close your mind.  It's too dangerous --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's not a candle I can blow out, Hermione.  It always burns, even if it's just a flicker.  Can you understand that?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Tell me. What you saw.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He's found him.  Vol--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You-Know-Who.  He's found Gregorovitch --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The wandmaker?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.  How'd you know?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Viktor got his wand from Gregorovitch.  Most Durmstrang students did at one time.  What's he got to do with You-Know-Who?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What?  Ron, no -- please --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He's gone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You-Know-Who wants something Gregorovitch once had -- dunno what.  But he's desperate to have it.  It's as if his life depends on it.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't -- It... comforts him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well it sets my teeth on edge. What's he expecting to hear?  Good news?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I think he just hopes he doesn't hear bad news.  It gets him through the day.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And what gets you through the day?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We've all made sacrifices, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How long before he can travel?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't know.  It takes time.  I'm doing all I can.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're not doing enough.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Take it off.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Take it off.  Now.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Better?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Loads.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's cold.  Even though it's been lying against your skin for days.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We'll take turns.  Okay?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What's that?  That... smell?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Snatchers.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Good to know your enchantments work.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He could smell it.  My perfume.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We have to leave.  We're not safe here.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I told you.  Ron's not strong enough to Apparate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Then we'll go by foot.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm hungry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We're all hungry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Leave it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mum can make food appear out of thin air.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No one can conjure food out of thin air.  Food is the first of the five Principal Exceptions to Gamp's Law.  The other four are --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Oh, speak English, can't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I said leave it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It'll be dark soon.  We need to find a place to sleep.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Good plan.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah.  Brilliant.  Only, correct me if I'm wrong... wasn't that yesterday's plan?  And the day before that?  And the day before that?  Walk.  Sleep.  Walk. Sleep.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My turn.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He doesn't know what he's doing, does he?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: None of us do.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wizards were here.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't like this place.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I want to go.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'll tell you in a minute.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Maybe you could tell me now.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Alright.  The Sword of Gryffindor? It's Goblin made.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Brilliant.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You don't understand.  Dirt and rust have no effect on the blade. It only takes in that which makes it stronger.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: O-kay.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry.  You already destroyed one Horcrux, right?  Tom Riddle's diary -- in the Chamber of Secrets.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: With a basilisk fang.  If you tell me you've got one of those in that bloody beaded bag of yours --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't you see!  In the Chamber of Secrets, you stabbed the basilisk with the Sword of Gryffindor.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Its blade is impregnated with basilisk venom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It only takes in that which makes it stronger...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Exactly!  Which means...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: ... it can destroy Horcruxes.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Which is why Dumbledore left it to you in his will.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're brilliant, Hermione. Truly.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Actually, I'm highly logical, which allows me to look past the extraneous detail and perceive clearly that which others overlook.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: There's only one problem...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The sword was stolen.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah, I'm still here.  But you two carry on.  Don't let me spoil your fun.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What's the problem?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Problem?  There's no problem.  Not according to you, anyway.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Look, don't be shy.  If you've got something to say, spit it out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: All right, I'll spit it out. Don't expect me to skip up and down because now there's some other damn thing we've got to find.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I thought you knew what you signed up for.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah, I thought I did too.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't understand.  What part of this isn't living up to your expectations?  Did you think we'd be staying in five-star hotels? Finding a Horcrux every other day? Did you think you'd be back to Mummy by Christmas?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, I just reckoned after all this time, we'd have actually achieved something.  I reckoned you knew what you were doing.  I reckoned Dumbledore had told you something worthwhile! I reckoned you had a plan!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I've told you everything Dumbledore told me! And in case you haven't noticed, we've found a Horcrux!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah, and we're about as near getting rid of it as we are to finding the rest of them, aren't we!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Take it off, Ron.  Please take it off.  You wouldn't be talking like this if you hadn't been wearing it all day --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah, he would.  D'you think I haven't noticed the two of you whispering behind my back?  D'you think I haven't guessed what you were thinking?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry, we weren't --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't lie!  You said it, too, you said you were disappointed --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I didn't!  Not like that!  Harry -- I didn't!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Do you know why I listen to that radio, every night?  Do you!  To make sure I don't hear Ginny's name or Fred or George or Mum or --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You think I don't listen!  You think I don't know what it's like --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stop!  Stop!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Go then.  But leave that.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And you?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Are you staying?  Or coming?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Fine.  I get it.  I saw you two the other night.  Yeah, that's right.  Didn't know I knew, did you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Salvio Hexia... Protego Totalum...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's a Muggle station.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You were right.  It's like you said.  Snitches have flesh memories.  But I didn't catch my first Snitch with my hand.  I almost swallowed it.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: 'I open at the close?'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What do you reckon it means?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't know.  But look, I've found something as well...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I thought it was a picture of an eye, but now I don't think it is. It isn't a rune and it's not in Spellman's Syllabary either.  And it's been inked in -- somebody drew it -- it isn't part of the book.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Luna's dad was wearing that, at Ron- At Bill and Fleur's wedding.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What d'you mean -- wearing it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Around his neck.  Like an amulet. I didn't think much of it at the time.  You know Luna -- she's always got some mad thing or the other she's carrying around.  I just figured it ran in the family.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Why would someone have drawn it in a children's book?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione, I've been thinking.  I -- I want to go to Godric's Hollow. It's where I was born, it's where my parents died --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And it's exactly where You-Know- Who will expect you to go. Because it means something to you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But it means something to him too, Hermione.  You-Know-Who nearly died there.  Wouldn't that be just the kind of place he'd hide a Horcrux?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's dangerous, Harry.  But I have to admit, recently even I've been thinking we might have to go.  I think it's possible something else is hidden there. The sword.  If Dumbledore didn't want it falling into the Ministry's hands, but wanted you to find it, what better place to hide it than the birthplace of the founder of Gryffindor himself?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Godric's Hollow is the birthplace of Godric Gryffindor -- I mean, 'course it is.  Obvious, isn't it?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry, did you ever even open A History of Magic?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Tossed it at Neville once when he was snoring -- might've popped open.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't ever let me give you a haircut again.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I still think we should've used Polyjuice Potion.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No.  This is where I was born. I'm not returning as someone else.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry, I think it's Christmas Eve! Listen...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Do you think they'd be in there? My mum and dad?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah. I think they would.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Is it -- ?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No.  But look.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Did you know he had a sister?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Lumos.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ignotus... Hey, Har --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Happy Christmas, Hermione.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Happy Christmas, Harry.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Someone's watching us.  By the gate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: C'mon.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't think this is a good idea.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We look like ordinary Muggles.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Muggles who've just been laying flowers on your parents' grave.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Relax.  This is right.  I know it.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Omigod.  Harry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This is where they died, Hermione. This is where he murdered them.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're Bathilda, aren't you?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry, I'm not sure about this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione, she knew Dumbledore. She might have the sword. Besides, she's barely knee-high to a house-elf.  I think we can overpower her if it turns ugly.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: There's something odd about her. And what's that smell?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: She's gaga, remember?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Here.  Let me do that.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You have a lovely house, Miss Bagshot.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Miss Bagshot?  Who is this man?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: His name.  Can you tell me his name?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: This is him, Hermione.  The one I saw in Gregorovitch's wandshop. The thief.  Miss Bagshot, who is he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: She wants us to go upstairs.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: All right...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: She wants me to go.  Alone.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's all right.  You stay here.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Lumos.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You are Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I have something for you...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Confringo!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry... Harry, can you hear me...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Good.  That's good...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We got away.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Are you alright?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm fine.  But you've been sick. Rest... Rest a bit more...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You've outdone yourself this time.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Forest of Dean.  I came here once with my mum and dad, years ago.  It's just how I remember it. The trees.  The river.  It's like nothing's changed.  Not true, of course.  Everything's changed.  If I brought my parents here, they wouldn't recognize any of it.  Not the trees.  Not the river.  Not... me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Where are they?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wendell and Monica Wilkens now reside happily in Sydney, Australia.  They have two dogs, run a small sweet shop, but floss daily.  No children.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Maybe we should just stay here, Harry.  Grow old.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You wanted to know who the boy in the photograph was.  Well, I know.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It was in Bathilda's sitting room. Rita Skeeter had sent it to her. Harry, it doesn't make for very nice reading --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who is he, Hermione?  The thief? Did Dumbledore know him?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: For a time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Tell me, Hermione.  Who is he?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Gellert Grindelwald.  He's not very well known in Britain, but there was a time, before You-Know- Who...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione, I don't need to have read A History of Magic to know who Gellert Grindelwald is.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: When Grindelwald was seventeen, he was expelled from Durmstrang. He'd started doing some twisted things at school -- experiments. A few teachers had always protected him, but they couldn't anymore.  After he left, he traveled for awhile, then ended up in Godric's Hollow where his great aunt lived, Bathilda Bagshot.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Get to the hard part, Hermione.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: She introduced him to Dumbledore. It made sense.  Dumbledore's mother had just died, Grindelwald was troubled and they were both brilliant -- they'd never really had anyone they could talk to on the same level.  They did a lot of talking that summer.  But they always returned to one particular subject.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wizard rule over Muggles.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And Dumbledore believed in it?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: 'For the Greater Good.'  What does that mean?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It was something Dumbledore came up with.  He believed wizards were superior and should rule over Muggles, but gently, for their own good.  Grindelwald took a more violent position.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It was a different time, Harry. It was one summer.  Dumbledore was young --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We're young, Hermione.  And here we are, risking our lives to fight against the very thing Dumbledore supported.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He changed, Harry.  Years later, it was Dumbledore who put Grindelwald in prison.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Where's my wand?  I'll take the watch.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione.  Where's my wand?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's my fault.  As we were leaving Godric's Hollow, I cast a curse and it rebounded... I'm sorry, Harry, I tried to mend it but wands are different --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's done.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Maybe we can --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's done.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Leave me yours.  You get back in the warm.  And give me that.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He loved you, Harry.  I know he loved you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Lumos! Accio Sword.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Diffindo.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Are -- you -- mental?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It was you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, yeah.  Bit obvious, I'd think.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And the doe.  That was you as well.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No.  I reckoned it was you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My Patronus is a stag.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Right.  Antlers.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You didn't see anyone else?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, I... I did think maybe I saw something -- when I was running -- over there --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Anything?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But I reckon whoever cast the doe, put the sword in that pool hoping we'd find it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And we did, didn't we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: See that?  It knows.  It's afraid. Do it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What?  No.  Harry.  That thing's bad for me.  I can't handle it. I'm not making excuses for how I acted, but that thing affects me more than it affects you and Hermione.  It made me think stuff -- stuff I was thinking anyway, but it made everything worse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: All the more reason.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No.  I can't --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Then why are you here?  Why did you come back?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'll have to speak to it in order for it to open.  When it does, don't hesitate.  I don't know what's in here, but it'll put up a fight.  The bit of Riddle that was in his diary tried to kill me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: On three.  One.  Two.  Three. Take me inside...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stab it, Ron.  Now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I have seen your heart and it is mine...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't listen to it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron.  Don't listen to it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron.  Stab it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We were better without you, happier without you.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who could look at you beside Harry Potter?  What are you, compared with the Chosen One...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron.  It lies!  Stab it!  STAB IT!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Your mother confessed that she would have preferred me as a son...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who wouldn't prefer him, what woman would take you, you are nothing, nothing, nothing to him...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Do it, Ron!  Kill it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: After you left, she cried for a week.  She's like my sister.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm sorry.  I'm sorry I left.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You've sort of made up for it tonight.  Getting the sword. Finishing off the Horcrux.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Saving your life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That too.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And just think of it.  Only three to go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Everything all right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Fine.  Actually... more than fine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hey.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wo -- hey -- ouch!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You -- complete -- arse -- Ronald -- Weasley!  You crawl back here after all these weeks and say, 'Hey?' Where's my wand?  Harry, where's my wand!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Um... I don't know?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry Potter, you give me my wand!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How come he's got your wand?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Never mind why he's got my wand --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What is that?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You destroyed it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's a long story.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't think this changes anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, of course not.  I only destroyed a bloody freaking Horcrux!  Why would that change anything!  Do you know what it was like for me to hear those words coming from you!  To see you doing those things --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: See me doing what things?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What happened out there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's a long story.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Look, I wanted to come back the minute I'd left.  I just... didn't know how to find you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Exactly how did you find us?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: With this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It doesn't just turn off lights. I don't know exactly how it works, but Christmas morning I -- I was sleeping -- in this little pub-- I'd given some Snatchers the slip the night before, me being a blood- traitor and all -- anyway, I was sleeping when I heard it...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: A voice.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Your voice, Hermione.  Coming out of this.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And what may I ask did I say?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: My name.  Just my name.  Like a whisper.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: So I took this and I clicked it and this tiny ball of light appeared.  And I knew.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Knew what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Just knew.  On account of Hermione's voice.  And sure enough, it floated toward me, the ball of light, right to my chest and then -- went straight through -- right here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I could feel it inside me.  It was warm, like the first sip of a good cup of tea.  And I knew it would take me where I needed to go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: So I Disapparated and came out on this hillside.  It was dark.  I didn't have any idea where I was. I just had to hope one of you would show yourselves in the end. And you did.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I've always liked it.  These flames Hermione makes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How long you reckon she'll stay mad at me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Keep talking 'bout that little ball of light touching your heart -- she'll come round.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It was true.  Every word.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Bloody hell.  I just realized. You need a wand, right?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, I've got one.  Here.  It's Blackthorn, ten inches, nothing special, but I reckon it'll do.  I took it off a Snatcher a few weeks back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't tell Hermione, but they're a bit dim, Snatchers.  This one was definitely part Troll.  The smell off him...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Engorgio.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Wo.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Reducio!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What's going on in there?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Nothing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Nothing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Maybe a bit more practice, eh?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We need to talk.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: All right.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I want to go and see Xenophilius Lovegood.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Sorry?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: See this?  It's a letter Dumbledore wrote to Grindelwald. Look at the signature.  It's the mark again.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It keeps cropping up.  Here.  In Beedle the Bard.  In the graveyard in Godric's Hollow -- what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Jesus.  It was there too.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Where?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Outside Gregorovitch's wand shop. on the alley wall...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But what does it mean?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry, you don't have a clue where the next Horcrux is.  And neither do I.  But this, this means something.  I'm sure of it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I think Hermione's right.  I think we ought to go and see Lovegood. What say we vote on it?  Those in favor...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Sorry, Harry.  Looks like it's Hermione and me this time.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Not still mad at him, are you?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm always mad at him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Luna?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Luna.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Luna.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Keep off the dirigible plums.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What is it? Who are you? What do you want --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hello, Mr. Lovegood.  I'm Harry Potter.  We met a few months back?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Would it be okay if we came in? It won't take long, sir.  I promise.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Excuse me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: So.  What brings you here, Mr. Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, sir, we need some help.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ah.  Help.  I see.  Yes, well, the thing is, helping Harry Potter, rather dangerous these days...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Aren't you the one who keeps telling everyone it's their first duty to help Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I have expressed that view, yes. In the past.  Would you excuse me one moment.  I shall return shortly and, um, try to help you...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What's going on here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He's mental.  Let's face it. Luna's always good value, but she's nutty as squirrel poo.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Do you see that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, yeah, of course.  It's massive, isn't it?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No!  Don't go near it!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's an Erumpent horn.  It's a Class B Tradeable Material.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah, all right...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: May I offer you all an infusion of Gurdyroots? We make it ourselves.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Where is Luna, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Luna?  Oh, um, she'll be along. Now how can I help you, Mr. Potter?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, sir, it's about something you were wearing around your neck at the wedding.  A symbol...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You mean this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes!  Exactly.  What we wondered, sir, is, well, what is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What is it?  Well, it's the sign of the Deathly Hallows, of course.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The what?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Deathly Hallows.  I assume you're all familiar with 'The Tale of the Three Brothers?'

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's in here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, there's no real reason to go on unless one is familiar with the tale.  Why don't you read it aloud, Miss...?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Granger.  Well... all right. There were once three brothers who were traveling along a lonely, winding road at twilight --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I can't be sure.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Midnight.  Mum always said midnight. But twilight's fine.  Better actually.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: In time, the brothers reached a river too treacherous to pass...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, there you are.  Those are the Deathly Hallows.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Sorry... I still don't really understand...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Elder Wand...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Resurrection Stone...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: ... then encloses both in a TRIANGLE. The Cloak of Invisibility. Together... they make the Deathly Hallows.  Together... they make one master of Death.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mr. Lovegood, does the Peverell family have anything to do with the Deathly Hallows?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ignotus and his brothers Cadmus and Antioch are thought to be the original owners of the Hallows and therefore the inspiration for the story.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ah, but your tea's grown cold. Excuse me, I'll be right back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Let's get out of here once he's back.  I'm not touching this stuff, hot or cold.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Which one would you choose if you could?  Of the Deathly Hallows?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It's obvious, isn't it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Wand.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Cloak.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The Stone.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're supposed to say the Cloak, but who wants to spend all day being invisible.  Dead boring if you ask me.  But an unbeatable wand!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Its owner grew drunk with power and was murdered.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yeah, but imagine what a short wicked life you'd lead.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Why the Stone, Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Well, you could bring people back, couldn't you?  Mad-Eye. Dumbledore.  Sirius.  Anybody.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But according to the story they don't want to come back.  It's all rubbish anyway.  There's no such thing as the Deathly Hallows.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But I have one.  The Invisibility Cloak my father left me.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: There have always been Cloaks --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Not like Harry's.  I've seen a fair few.  Dad used to bring home the ones the Ministry confiscated from petty thieves and the like. They always got holes or tears. Harry's is different.  It's perfect.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: And I think I've actually held the Resurrection Stone in my hands, that night in Dumbledore's office when he showed me the ring he'd destroyed, the Horcrux.  It had a symbol on it.  Now I think it was the mark of the Hallows.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Mr. Lovegood.  Thank you, sir --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You forgot the water.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The water?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: For the tea.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Did, didn't I?  How silly of me.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No matter, sir.  We really ought to be go--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: No, you mustn't --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're my only hope.  They were angry, you see, about what I'd been writing, so they took her. They took my Luna... But it's really you they want...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who took her, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Him.  Surely you call him You-Know- Who.  But his real name of course is... Voldemort.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Nooooooooo!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stop!  I've got him --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron!  Harry!  Take my hand!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That treacherous old bleeder!  Is there no one we can trust!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: They've kidnapped Luna because he supported me.  He was just desperate.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'll do the enchantments.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hello, beautiful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ah, Tom, I thought you would come one day.  But surely you must know I no longer have what you seek...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: If not you, then who?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're so innocent, Tom.  Like a schoolboy.  There's so much you don't understand...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Tell me, Grindelwald.  Tell me where to find it!  Tell me who possesses it!  The name, Grindelwald!  The name!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Can't you guess, Tom?  It lies with him, of course.  Buried within the earth.  It is he who possesses it, even in death.  Your old friend and mine... Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: They exist.  The Hallows.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: But he only wants the one, the last one.  That's what he's been looking for.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What're you saying?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He knows where it is, You-Know- Who.  He'll have it by the end of the night.  He's found the Elder Wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Don't touch her!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stop it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Your boyfriend'll get worse than that if he doesn't behave, lovely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What happened to you, ugly?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What's your name?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dudely.  Vernon Dudley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Check the list.  And you, ginger?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stan Shunpike.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Like 'ell you are.  We know skinny Stan.  Try again.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Weasley... Barney Weasley.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Weasley, eh?  Wouldn't be related to that blood traitor Arthur Weasley, would you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Piss off!  Arthur Weasley's ten times the wizard you are!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Worth ten times you if I can find him.  Wasn't you that tipped him off, was it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How 'bout you, lovely?  What do they call you...?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Penelope Clearwater.  Half-blood.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You smell like vanilla, Penelope. I think you're going to be my favorite.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: There's no Vernon Dudley on 'ere.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hear that, ugly?  The list says you're lying.  How come you don't want us to know who you are?  Hm?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: The list is wrong.  I told you who I am --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Change of plans, boys.  We won't be taking this lot to the Ministry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What did you put on me?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: A Stinging Jinx.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How long will it last?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Not long.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Show me. Get Draco. Well?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Draco. Look closely, son. If we are the ones to hand Potter over to the Dark Lord... ...everything would be forgiven. All would be as it was, you understand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Now, we won't be forgetting who actually caught him, I hope, Mr. Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You dare to talk to me like that in my own house?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Lucius. Don't be shy, sweetie. Come over. Now, if this isn't who we think it is, Draco, and we call him, he'll kill us all. We need to be absolutely sure.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What's wrong with his face?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Yes, what is wrong with his face?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: He came to us like that. Something he picked up in the forest, I reckon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Or ran into a Stinging Jinx. Was it you, dearie? Give me her wand. We'll see what her last spell was. Ah. Got you. What is that? Where'd you get that from?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: It was in her bag when we searched her. Reckon it's mine now. Are you mad? Go! Get out!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Cissy, put the boys in the cellar. I want to have a little conversation with this one, girl-to-girl.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: What are we gonna do? We can't leave Hermione alone with her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ron? Harry?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Luna?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: That sword is meant to be in my vault at Gringotts. How did you get it? What else did you and your friends take from my vault?!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I didn't take anything. Please. I didn't take anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't believe it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We have to do something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: There's no way out of here. We've tried everything. It's enchanted.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Please! please!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Shut up!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You're bleeding, Harry. That's a curious thing to keep in your sock.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Help us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Let her go.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Shut up. Get back. You, goblin, come with me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Aah!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dobby? What are you doing here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dobby has come to rescue Harry Potter, of course. Dobby will always be there for Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You can Apparate in and out of this room? Could you take us with you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Of course, sir. I'm an elf.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Works for me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dobby, I want you to take Luna and Mr. Ollivander--

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Shell Cottage on the outskirts of Tinworth. Trust me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Whenever you're ready, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Sir? I like her very much. Meet me at the top of the stairs in 10 seconds.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Ow.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Who gets his wand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I'm only going to ask you once more, goblin. Think very, very carefully before you answer.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I don't know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: You don't know? Why weren't you doing your job? Who got into my vault? Who stole it? Who stole it? Well?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: When I was last in your vault, the sword was there. Oh, well then, perhaps it just walked out on its own then.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: There is no place safer than Gringotts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Liar! Consider yourself lucky, goblin. The same won't be said for this one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Like hell.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Expellliarmus!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stupefy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stop! Drop your wands. I said, drop them! Pick them up, Draco, now. Well, well, well, look what we have here. It's Harry Potter. He's all bright and shiny and new again, just in time for the Dark Lord. Call him. Call him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stupefy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Stupid elf. You could've killed me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dobby never meant to kill. Dobby only meant to maim or seriously injure.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: How dare you take a witch's wand? How dare you defy your masters?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dobby has no master. Dobby is a free elf. And Dobby has come to save Harry Potter and his friends.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Hermione. You're all right. We're safe. We're all safe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Dobby. Dobby. No, just-- Hold on. Hold on. Look, just hold on, okay? We'll fix you. Hermione will have something. In your bag. Hermione? Hermione? What is it? Help me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: Such a beautiful place... ...to be with friends. Dobby is happy to be with his friend... ...Harry Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: We should close his eyes. Don't you think? There. Now he could be sleeping.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
dialogues: I want to bury him. Properly. Without magic.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's beautiful here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It was our Aunt's. We used to come here as kids. The Order uses it now as a safe house -- what's left of us, at least.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Muggles think these keep evil away. But they're wrong...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I need to talk to the goblin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How are you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Alive.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You probably don't remember --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And brought me here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You are a very unusual wizard.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Why did you leave Gringotts?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Soon the Death Eaters will control it. That was unacceptable to me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Then you're on our side.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: This is a wizard's war. I take no side.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It is impossible.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Alone, yes. With you, no.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How did you come by this sword?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's complicated. Why did Bellatrix Lestrange think it should be in her vault at Gringotts?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's complicated.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The sword presented itself to us in a moment of need. We didn't steal it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There is a sword in Madam Lestrange's vault identical to this one, but it is a fake. It was placed there this past summer.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And she never suspected?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Hey. Easy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The replica is very convincing. Only a goblin would recognize that this is the true Sword of Gryffindor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Who put it there? The fake.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It was not my place to ask, nor did I desire to. There are more than a few curious things in the vaults at Gringotts.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And in Madam Lestrange's vault as well?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Perhaps.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I have no interest in gold.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Then what? The goblin twists the curl at his chin... then his eyes

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That is my price.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I have your word, Harry Potter, that you will give me the Sword of Gryffindor if I help you?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry, are you thinking there's a Horcrux in Bellatrix's vault?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: She was terrified when she thought we'd been in there. She kept asking you what else we'd taken. I'd bet anything there's a Horcrux there. If we find it, we can kill it. And if we kill it, we're one step closer to killing him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And if we find one? How're we supposed to destroy it if we've given Griphook the sword?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm still working on that part.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's too weak.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Forgive me if I don't get up.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Mr. Ollivander, I need to ask you a few questions.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Anything, m'boy, anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Can you identify these, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Walnut and dragon heartstring. Twelve and three quarter inches. Unyielding. This belongs to Bellatrix Lestrange.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Hawthorn. Unicorn hair. Ten inches. Reasonably pliant. This was the wand of Draco Malfoy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Was? Isn't it still?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Perhaps not -- if you won it from him. I sense its allegiance has changed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. That much has always been clear to those of us who have studied wandlore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What do you know about the Deathly Hallows, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There are rumored to be three: The Elder Wand, the Resurrection Stone and the Invisibility Cloak. It is said that to possess them all is to make oneself the Master of Death. But few truly believe such objects exist --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But you, sir? Do you believe they exist?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're lying. You know one exists and you told him about it. You told him about the Elder Wand and where to go looking for it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He tortured me! Besides, I conveyed only rumors. There's no guarantee he will find it --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He has found it, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's all, sir. We'll leave you to get some rest now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's after you, Mr. Potter. If it's true, what you say, that he has the Elder Wand, I'm afraid you really don't stand a chance.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Then I guess I'll just have to kill him before he finds me, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're sure it's hers?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Positive. Harry turns to the two wands on the table -- the ones he showed Ollivander -- and extends the longest to Hermione.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I reckon you should take this then.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You heard Ollivander. It's Harry's now.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But I hate that thing -- that's the wand that killed Sirius! How can I hold it and not feel...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: If I can hold it, you can.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How will we know what it is when we get in there? After all, a Horcrux can be anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'll know. I can't explain. It's like...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's a bit scary.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It is, Harry. Did Dumbledore ever say anything to you, something that might explain why --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No. I just know. When one's near.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: This is the closest I could find to what you described, Hermione.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's perfect. Thank you, Fleur.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're leaving, aren't you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: In the morning.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And Griphook?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He'll be leaving too.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Listen, I don't know what you're up to, but I know goblins. If you've struck any kind of bargain with Griphook, you must be exceptionally careful to live up to it. If you don't... he won't be forgiving.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The sky has lost a star.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: My father used to say that when a child died. She looks up, smiles.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yeah. Funny. Listen, Luna, about your father, I don't want you to think I --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I know you understand why my father did what he did, Harry. That's why we don't need to talk about it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Hogwarts?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's not the place you left, you

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Neither am I.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Always good value. I'll miss her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What d'you think?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Wouldn't know you if I didn't know you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You want to tell me what that is?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Sirius gave it to me. He had a matching piece. He said if I ever needed him, all I had to do was look into it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You mean he could see you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Something like that. I don't know. He died before I ever got to use it. The thing is...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You'll think I'm mental, but more than once, when I've looked into it -- I think I've seen Dumbledore.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Bloody hell... that's a sight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well, how do I look?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Hideous.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Oh dear, I missed a spot, didn't I? Hold still...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Couldn't do anything about that bit in the back that's always flipping up, could you? Dead annoying --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Never mind. I'm good.  That is you in there, isn't it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You can give that to Hermione to hold, all right, Griphook?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Madam Lestrange.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Good morning? Good morning? You're Bellatrix Lestrange, not some dewy-eyed schoolgirl!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: She gives us away and we might as well use that sword to slit our own throats. Understand?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's right. I was being stupid.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: C'mon. Let's do it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Identification.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I wish to enter my vault.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I see. Very well. Excuse me, won't you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I don't like to be kept waiting.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Next.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's with me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: They know!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What do you mean?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: They know she's an imposter! They've been warned!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Madam Lestrange. Would you mind presenting your wand?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And why should I do that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry, what do we do? Harry...?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's the bank's policy. I'm sure you understand, given the current climate --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No, I most certainly do not understand --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm afraid I must insist.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Imperio.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Very well, Madam Lestrange. If you will follow me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But... Bogrod, there have been special instructions regarding the Lestrange vault.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm fully aware of that. I'm also aware the Lestranges are one of our oldest and most respected families.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes, sir, but our instructions are very specific --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Let me be specific with you, Ricbert. I've run this bank for forty-five years, long before anyone had even heard of a Death Eater. The day may come that they feel they can run this place better than me, but that day has not yet arrived. Am I understood!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Madam, if you will, I will escort you myself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How long before they come after us?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What's that? Up ahead.
