movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I should have known --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What is that, Griphook?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Griphook! What is that!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well done. Hey.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The Thief's Downfall. Washes away all enchantments. Can be deadly.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You don't say.  Just out of interest... is there any other way out of here?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What the devil are you all doing down here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We need him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Is this your doing, Griphook? You have no rights here anymore. When you gave up your keys, you --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Imperio!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well done.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No. It's not possible...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Bloody hell. That's a Welsh Green.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It looks like it's been down here forever.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's been trained to expect pain when it hears the noise.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's barbaric. I...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We'll only have a few seconds. In other words... they'll be no do-

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ready, Bogrod?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Hm? Oh. Yes. Of course.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Lumos !

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Lumos !

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Lumos !

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Blimey...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Look.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No wonder Bellatrix thought it was real.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Is it here, Harry? Can you feel anything?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's hot! All eyes turn to the bowl, WOBBLING MADLY on the floor, when... it SPLITS APART and begins to MULTIPLY.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ron, your foot!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We'll be crushed! Hurry!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's it. Up there.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How're we going to reach it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Give me the sword! The real one.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Keep going!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry! Behind you!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The cup!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: In here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We have a deal, Griphook.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I said I'd get you in. I never said anything about getting you out.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Griphook! Griphook!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Thieves! Help! Thieves!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Foul little git. Least we've got Bogrod.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's unfortunate.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We can't just stand here! Who's got an idea?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're asking us? You're the brilliant one.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I've got something. But it's mad.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Relashio!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's your idea?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Come on!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It doesn't realize it's free!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That was brilliant! BRILLIANT!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Bloody hell.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We're dropping!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I say we jump!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: When?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The boy has discovered our secret, Nagini. We must find out just how much he knows. We must return to our hiding places and see if the others are safe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He knows.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How is it you --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I saw him.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You let him in! Harry, you can't --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I can't always help it, Hermione!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Never mind! What did you see?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's angry. But he's scared too. He's going to make sure the other Horcruxes are safe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What happens when he finds out four are gone?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I reckon he'll do anything to stop us from finding the rest. There's more: one of them's at Hogwarts.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You saw it?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Tonight? But we have to plan. We have to figure out what --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Honestly, Hermione, when have any of our plans actually worked? We plan, we get there and all hell breaks loose.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: 'Fraid he's right. One problem: Snape's Headmaster now. We can't just walk in the front door.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We'll go to Hogsmeade. To Honeydukes. Take the secret passage in the cellar.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There's something wrong with him. In the past, I could always follow his thoughts. Now everything feels disconnected.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Maybe it's because of the Horcruxes. Maybe he's growing weaker. Maybe he's dying.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No. It's more like he's wounded. If anything, he feels more

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: They were ready for us.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We know you're here, Potter. There's no getting away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Perhaps you need some convincing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What's he mean by that?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No, you'll give us away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Expecto Patronum!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: In here, Potter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Did you get a look at him! Fora second I thought it was --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I know.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry! I can see you! In here!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You bloody fools! What were you thinking coming here? Do you have any idea how dangerous it is --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're Aberforth.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Dumbledore's brother. It's you I've been seeing -- here. It's

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Where've you left him?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's dead.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Sorry to hear it. I liked that elf.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Mundungus Fletcher, 'bout a year ago.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Dung had no right selling you that. It belonged to --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Sirius. Albus told me. He also told me that you'd likely be hacked off if you ever found out I had it. But ask yourself where you'd be if I didn't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Right then. Reckon you're hungry. Let's get you fed, then think of the best way to get you out of here.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Do you hear much from the others? From the Order?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The Order is finished. You-Know- Who's won. Anyone who says otherwise is kidding themselves.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We need to get into Hogwarts. Dumbledore gave us a job to do.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Did he now? Nice job? Easy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We've been hunting Horcruxes. We think the last one's in the school. But we'll need your help getting in.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: If we can find it and kill it, then we kill him, and then we can end this war once and for all. We need to get into Hogwarts tonight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's not a job my brother's given you, it's a suicide mission. Do yourself a favor boy. Go home. Live a little longer.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Dumbledore trusted me, to see this through.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Why should he...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Keep secrets? You tell me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I only care about the Dumbledore I knew. I trusted him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Did you now? And why is that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I had no reason not to --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's a boy's answer. A boy who goes chasing Horcruxes on the word of a man who won't even tell him where to start. You're lying. Not just to me, which doesn't matter, but to yourself as well. That's what a fool does.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're drunk.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You don't strike me as a fool, Mr. Potter. So I'll ask you again. There must be a reason. Why do you trust anything my brother ever said to you? Why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You know what to do...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Where've you sent her?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You'll see soon enough.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's Ariana, isn't it? Your sister. She's beautiful.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: She'll always be beautiful.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: She died very young, didn't she.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: My brother sacrificed many things, Mr. Potter, in his journey to find power, including her. She was devoted to him -- he gave her everything, but time.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Mr. Dumbledore... thank you.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Did save our lives twice. Kept an eye on us in that mirror. That doesn't seem like someone who's given up, does it?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: She's coming back! And she's got someone with her!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Who's that with her? Bloody hell...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I knew you'd come! I told them alii! Harry Potter would never abandon Hogwarts!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Neville, you look...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Like hell? I reckon. This is nothing. Seamus is worse. You'll see. Hermione! Ron!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Hey, Ab. There might be a couple more people on the way.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well? Ready?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I don't remember this being on the Marauder's Map.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's because it never existed till now. The seven secret passages were sealed off before the start of the year. This is the only way in or out now. The grounds are crawling with Death Eaters and Dementors.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How bad is it, Neville? With Snape as Headmaster.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Hardly ever see him. It's the Carrows you have to watch out for.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The Carrows?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Brother and sister. They're in charge of discipline. Like punishment, the Carrows.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: They did that to you? But why?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Today's Dark Arts lesson had us practicing the Cruciatus Curse. On First Years. I refused. Hogwarts has changed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Aw, c'mon. Don't be grim. We're all used to it by now. And the thing is, it helps when people stand up, gives everyone hope. I used to notice that when you did it, Harry. C'mon, we're almost there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Let's have a bit of fun, shall we?  Hey! Listen up, you lot! I've brought you a surprise!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Blimey.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Get the word out to Remus and the others that Harry's back.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: River, DA calling. Do you read? We have a new weather report: Lightning has struck. I repeat, lightning has struck...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Okay, okay! Stand down! lLet's not kill them before You-Know-Who gets the chance!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: If you're to find her, you'll find her down there.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Okay. There's something we need to find, something hidden here in the castle. It could help us defeat You-Know-Who.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We don't know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Where is it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I realize it's not much to go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's nothing to go on.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I think it might have something to do with Ravenclaw. It would be small, easy to conceal, valuable. Any ideas?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well, there's Rowena Ravenclaw's lost diadem.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The lost diadem of Ravenclaw? Hasn't anyone ever heard of it? It's quite famous.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes, but Luna, it's lost. For centuries now. There's not a person alive today who's seen it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Excuse me. But would someone tell me: what's a bloody diadem?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's a kind of crown. You know, like a tiara.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ravenclaw's was rumored to have magical properties, to enhance the wisdom of the wearer.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Hey there. Ron smiles, about to speak, then notices Ginny's eyes have not left Harry. He frowns, speaks to Hermione.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Six months she hasn't seen me and it's like I'm Frankie First Year. I mean, I'm only her brother.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Got loads of those, though, doesn't she? There's only one Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Shut up, Seamus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What is it, Ginny?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Snape knows. He knows that Harry was spotted in Hogsmeade.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Put a smile on, Miss Reynolds. Wouldn't want me to have to pay a visit to Daddy again, would you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Many of you are surely wondering why I have summoned you here at this hour. It has come to my attention that earlier this evening... Harry Potter was sighted in Hogsmeade.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I mention this in the hopes that truth will not be supplanted by

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: For myself and a few select members of the staff this comes as little surprise. We have, for some time, considered Mr. Potter's return to Hogwarts to be not only possible but inevitable. Consequently, in the past several months and under my specific direction, exhaustive defensive strategies have been employed to defeat any attempt Mr. Potter might make to breach these walls. But know this. Should anyone -- student or staff -- attempt to aid Mr. Potter, that person will be punished in a manner consistent with the severity of their transgression. Rest assured: So long as I am Headmaster at Hogwarts, Harry Potter will never again step foot in this castle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Now then. If anyone here has knowledge of Mr. Potter's movements this evening... I invite them to step forward now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I think I can help you out with that... -.. Harry appears.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And I'm afraid it's rather extensive.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How dare you stand where he stood.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Tell them how it was that night. Tell then how you looked him in the eye, a man who trusted you... and killed him. Tell them!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm a Gryffindor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I know that many of you will want to fight. Some of you may even think this wise. But this is foily.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I wish you no harm. TI have great respect for the students of Hogwarts. I was once one myself after all. I ask for but one thing and if granted no magical blood shail be spiit...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Give me Harry Potter. Do this and none shall be harmed. Give me Harry Potter and I shail leave Hogwarts untouched. Give me Harry Potter and you will be rewarded.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But he's there! Potter's there! Someone grab him!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Students out of bed! Students in the corridors!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Oh. Sorry, mum.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Right away.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Time. As much as you can give me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Is that possible, Professor?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I think you're right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You, too, Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Let me get this straight, Professor. You're giving us permission to do this?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: To blow it up. Boom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Wicked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I can bring 'er down.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You realize, of course, that nothing we do will be able to keep out You-Know-Who indefinitely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That doesn't mean we can't hold him up.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Protego Maxima... Finato Duri... Repello Inimicum...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry, Hermione and I have been thinking. It doesn't really matter if we find the Horcrux.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Unless we can destroy it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: So we were thinking --

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You were thinking. It's Ron's idea. And it's brilliant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You destroyed Tom Riddle's Diary with a Basilisk fang, right? Well, we know where we might find one, don't we?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Okay. But take this. That way you can find me when you get back.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Where are you going?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ravenclaw Common Room. Got to start somewhere. Hermione nods, slips the Map in her beaded bag and she and Ron head off. Just before they turn the corner, Ron looks back, holds Harry's glance briefly... and then is

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry! Wait! I need to talk to

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm a bit preoccupied right now, Luna.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We'll talk later, Luna.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Later.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Don't you remember what Cho said about Rowena Ravenclaw's diadem: 'There's not a person alive who's seen it.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's obvious, isn't it? We have to talk to someone who's dead.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's very impressive, isn't he?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: They never learn. Such a pity.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Begin.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But, my Lord, shouldn't we wait --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Nice night for it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Okay, Luna. Who've you got in mind?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's it. I want a charge on each and every joist.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You do know what you're doing, don't you, Seamus?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Blimey.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Not good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No. I think it best if you two talk alone. She's very shy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Tell Professor McGonagall Remus and I will handle this side of the castle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes, sir.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Dean!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's the quality of one's conviction that determines success, not the number of one's followers.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Who said that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Speaking of quality.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You shouldn't have. It's Teddy who needs you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He'll sleep 'til dawn and snore like his father. It's you who needs me tonight.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's you...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ha! dal

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yeah! You and whose army!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Woah! Easy up there!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Sorry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry talks in his sleep. Haven't you noticed?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No. Of course not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I've never got this far before.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm scared.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Me too. Hermione: I didn't expect it to be like this.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Not this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're the Grey Lady, the ghost of Ravenclaw Tower.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I do not answer to that name.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm sorry. It's Helena, isn't it? Helena Ravenclaw. Rowena's daughter. Luna told me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Are you a friend of Luna's?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes. She thought you might be able to help me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You seek my mother's diadem.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes! That's right --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Luna is kind. Unlike so many of the others, but she was wrong. I cannot help you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Wait! Please!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Many have sought my mother's diadem. Its powers are

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But I don't care about its powers! Honestly --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I don't seek it for myself! You have to believe me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I want to destroy it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's what you want, isn't it, Helena? You want it destroyed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But I only wanted to be more like her, clever and wise. She wore it so beautifully, but on me... I grew to hate it... the pain I felt... the pain I feel even now...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'll end your pain, Helena. Tell me where it is and I'll destroy it, I swear, on my mother's memory --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Another swore to destroy it, many years ago, a strange boy with a strange name...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Tom Riddle --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But he lied.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's lied to many people --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I know what he's done! I know who he is! He defiled it! With Dark Magic!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Strange... you remind me of him a bit...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's here. In the castle. In the

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: If you have to ask, you'll never know. If you know, you need only ask...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Thank you... -.. then turning...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Thank you... -.. then running.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You do it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes, you can.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Not good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ready!?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Are you bloody joking?!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's good...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's good...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That was kind of exciting. Seamus grins and winks knowingly. Ginny shakes her head.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Mad. The both of you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Not good.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Night-tee night.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You let us out of here, you filthy squib!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ginny! Neville! You alright?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Never better! Feel like I could spit fire! Haven't seen Luna, have you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Luna -- ?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm mad for her! Think it's about time I told her, seeing as there's a pretty good chance we'll both be dead by dawn!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Bloody hell. We/'ll never find him on this.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There he is.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Brilliant.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He vanished. Just now. I saw it. Ron glances at MAP -- then:

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's right. I did.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Let's go.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Brilliant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Take my hand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well, well, what brings you here, Potter? Harry looks slowly over his shoulder. Draco -- Blaise and Goyle at his side -- steps INTO VIEW, his face bisected by light. He holds a wand on Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I could ask you the same.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I virtually lived here last year. Remember?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I remember.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What's wrong with the one you have?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Easy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Why didn't you tell her?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Bellatrix. You knew it was me. But you didn't say anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Give me my wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No. I don't think so...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Besides, its allegiance is to me now. If you want it, you'll have to win it back. Perhaps even kill me...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: C'mon, Draco. Don't be a prat.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Avada Kedavra!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Expelliarmus!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Did you see where it went? The diadem!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well done. Let's find Ron and get out of here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: RUN! Goyle's set the bioody place on fire!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Split up!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Do we climb!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No, it''ll just follow us!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Here! Take one!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Serves him right.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: C'mon! This way!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Wait! What about Malfoy and Blaise!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Brilliant.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Nagini. Come.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're bloody well welcome!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ron, you once asked me if I thought he felt it -- Voldemort -- when we destroy a Horcrux, when we destroy a piece of his soul.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He does.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's the snake. She's the last one. The last Horcrux.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Where will he take her?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Someplace safe.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No. He'll keep her close.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Look inside him, Harry.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Find out where he is. If we find him, we find the snake. Then we're one step closer to ending this.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Stop looking at her. She smells your fear. It agitates her. Be grateful she's just eaten.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Forgive me, my Lord, but wouldn't it be more prudent to call off this battle and seek the boy yourself?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I do not need to seek the boy! Before the night is out, he will come to me! Do you understand!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Of c-course, my Lord.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How do you live with yourself, Lucius?  Go. Find Severus. Tell him I need to see him immediately.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I know where he is.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There's more to me than incense and tea leaves, Mr. Finnegan.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Thanks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Don't mention it.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Why doesn't it work for me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You have performed extraordinary magic with this wand, my Lord. In the last few hours alone --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No! I am extraordinary! But the wand resists me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There is no wand more powerful. Ollivander himself said it. Tonight, when the boy comes to you, it will not fail you, I am sure. It answers to you and you only.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Does it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: My Lord?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The wand. Does it truly answer to me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're a clever man, Severus. Surely you must know.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Where, Severus? Where does its loyalty lie?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: With you, of course, my Lord.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The Elder Wand cannot serve me properly, Severus, because I am

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The Elder Wand belongs to the wizard who killed its last owner. Ollivander was quite explicit about that. You killed Dumbledore, Severus. While you live, the Elder Wand cannot be truly mine.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: My Lord --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You have been a good and faithful servant, Severus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But only I can live forever...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Kill.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Nagini! Come!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Take them...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Take them!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Please.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Give me something! Quickly! A flask! Anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: They are the same...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You have your mother's eyes...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He's gone. The snake too.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You have fought valiantly... but in vain. I do not wish this. Every drop of magical bliood

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I therefore command my forces to retreat. In their absence, dispose of your dead with dignity. Treat your injured.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Never! Do you hear me! NEVER!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Where is everyone?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Lily... Then...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Lily! Come out of there! Now!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We're going home.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: She's jealous. Because she's ordinary and you're special.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That's mean.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's true. You know so yourself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No! Don't kill me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That wasn't my intention.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Stand up, Severus. I haven't much time. What message do you bring from Lord Voldemort this time?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Is this about the Prophecy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How much did you relay?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Only what I heard. But now... he thinks it refers to her.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The Prophecy did not refer to a woman. It spoke of a boy born at the end of July --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes! But he thinks it's her son! He intends to hunt them down now! To kill them!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: If she means so much to you, surely Lord Voldemort would spare her in exchange for the boy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I have asked.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You disgust me. You would sacrifice the life of an innocent child over a schoolboy crush?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: She's more than that! She's different! Beautiful. Kind.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And should I do so, what will you give me in return, Severus?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Anything.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You said you would keep her safe!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Lily and James put their faith in the wrong person. Rather like you, Severus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The boy survives.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He has her eyes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He doesn't need protection. The Dark Lord has gone --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The Dark Lord will return. And the boy will be in terrible danger when he does.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No one can know. Your word.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: My word that I shall never reveal the best of you, Severus? If you insist.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He exhibits no measurable talent. His arrogance rivals even his father's. And he seems to relish his fame.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Sometimes we see what we expect to see, Severus. Other teachers indicate the boy is modest, likeable and while no prodigy, possesses above-average gifts. Personally, I find him rather engaging.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You see what you want to see.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Perhaps. oOh. Severus.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Why did you put it on? Surely you realized it carried a curse.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I was... foolish... greedy...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Drink the rest. It will contain the curse to the hand for the time being.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: For the time being?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It will spread.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: How long?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Maybe a year.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well, this makes matters much more straightforward.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Do not ignore me, Severus. Was it not you who told me of Lord Voldemort's plan to have the Malfoy boy murder me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It is not expected that he will succeed.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You must agree.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes. You must be the one to kill me, Severus. It is the only way. Only then will the Dark Lord trust you completely.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You ask too much.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There will come a time when Harry Potter must be told something. But you must wait until Voldemort is at his most vulnerable.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Tell him what?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: On the night Lord Voldemort went to Godric's Hollow to kill Harry, and Lily Potter cast herself between them, the curse rebounded. When that happened, a part of Lord Voldemort's soul latched itself onto the only living thing it could find: Harry himself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There's a reason Harry can speak with snakes. There's a reason he can look into Lord Voldemort's mind. A part of Lord Voldemort lives inside him.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: So when the time comes, the boy must die.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You've kept him alive so that he can die at the proper moment. You've been raising him like a pig for slaughter.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But this is touching, Severus. Don't tell me you've grown to care for the boy?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Expecto Patronum!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Lily. After all this time?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Always... We GO TO BLACK...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The irony of course, Severus, is that -- in the end -- you and the boy desire the same thing...

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Where've you been?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We thought you'd gone to the forest, we thought you might be --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm going there now.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Are you mad! No!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's... meant to be.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Rubbish! You can't just give yourself up to him -- Hermione squeezes Ron's arm, silencing him.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What is it, Harry? What is it you

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There's a reason I can... hear them -- the Horcruxes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I think I've known for awhile.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'll go with you. I/'ll --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Kill the snake. Kill the snake and then it's just him. Then it will be over.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'll take him from here.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's all right. We're going to get you inside.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I kept calling. No one came.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Don't worry. I won't leave you. I promise.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You've been so brave, sweetheart.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Why are you here? All of you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We never left, dear.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Does it hurt? Dying?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Quicker than falling asleep.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And he will want it to be quick.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You're nearly there, son.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'm sorry. I didn't want any of you to die for me. And Remus, your son...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Others will tell him what his mother and father died for. Someday he'll understand...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You'll stay with me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Until the end.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He won't be able to see you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No. We're here, you see.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Stay close to me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Always...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No sign of him, my Lord.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I thought he would come. I was, it seems... mistaken.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You weren't.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Quiet!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry Potter. The Boy Who Lived. Come to die. Nagini HISSES behind her protective guard of Death Eaters. Harry's gaze shifts to her when Voldemort raises

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You cannot help.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry. You wonderful boy. You brave, brave man. Let us walk.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Sir, this, is this... I mean, forgive me, but you are dead, aren't you, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Oh, yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Then... I'm dead too?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Not?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Not.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But I didn't defend myself. I let him kill me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It's true, isn't it, sir? A bit of him lives in me, doesn't it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Did. It was just destroyed only moments ago by none other than Voldemort himself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You were the seventh Horcrux, Harry; the Horcrux he never meant to make.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And you knew this? That's why you were certain I wouldn't die?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Certain? No. Little is certain in this world, Harry. Call it an educated guess.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Professor, is that -- ?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Exactly where are we, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I was going to ask you that. Where would you say that we are?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It looks like King's Cross station -- only a lot cleaner. And without the trains.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: King's Cross! Is that right? Well, this is, as they say, your party.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Sir, why didn't you just tell me about the Deathly Hallows?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You will have to forgive me, Harry. You see... I didn't trust

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I feared that you would make the same mistake I made, that you would be intoxicated by the power the Hallows promise their possessor. But I crave your pardon, Harry. It's clear to me now, as it should have been all along, that you are the better man.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Sir --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You are the worthy possessor of the Hallows, Harry, not me. I was fit to own the Elder Wand, because I took it not for gain, but to save others from it. But I took the Stone because I longed to recall someone who has long been at peace and for that I paid with my life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You wanted to see Ariana again, didn't you, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I used the Stone as well, sir, only a little while ago when I entered the Forest. I saw my mum and dad, and Sirius and Lupin...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: True. But ask yourself this: were you calling them? Or were they calling you?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I've got to go back, haven't I?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: That is up to you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I've got a choice?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Oh yes. We are in King's Cross, you say? I think, should you so decide, you would be able to, let's say, board a train.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And where would it take me?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: On.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Voldemort's got the Elder Wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: True.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And the snake lives.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: And I've nothing to kill it with.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: 'Help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.'

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I have always prized my ability to turn a phrase -- words are, in my

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: With all due respect, sir, I think what we need here is a miracle.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I've never put much stock in miracles, Harry. On the other hand, I can attest wholly to the extensive advantages of a related phenomenon.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Which would be, sir?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Luck.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living and, above all, those who live without love.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Sir, my mother's Patronus. It was a doe, wasn't it? Just like Professor Snape's. Curious, don't you think?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Actually, if I think about it... it doesn't seem curious at all.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Professor.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Is this real? Or has this been happening inside my head?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry. But why should that mean that it is not real?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: My lord, let me help you --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I do not require assistance.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The boy. Is he dead?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Is he alive? Draco?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Don't despair, Longbottom. I put you in Gryffindor for good reason...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Who's that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: ... Hagrid's carrying?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Neville, who is that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What's going on here, Neville?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Behold, Nagini. Our work is done.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: No... NO!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Stupid girl. You cry for that?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: While your hands ran dark with the blood of mothers and sons, fathers and daughters, brothers and sisters, his were clasped in prayer -- but it was a prayer for one and one only. While you battled courageously, until you could no longer will yourself to stand, he had long since fallen to his knees. While you cursed me until your voices grew ragged, he begged me for mercy in a voice as meek as a child's.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: So do not cry for that. He's not worthy of your tears. And do not despair of his betrayal. You were never in his heart. Not for one single solitary beat.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Liar!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Did you not hear me! Harry Potter is dead! From this day forward, you put your faith in me or suffer the consequences. HARRY POTTER Is

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Now is the time to declare yourself.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Draco...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Draco, don't be stupid --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Come, Draco.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: He saved your life.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well done, Draco. Who will be next? Hm? Come now, don't be shy.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well, I must say, I'd hoped for better. Is this truly the best Hogwarts has to offer?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Who might you be, young man?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Neville Longbottom.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well, welcome, Neville. I'm sure we can find a place for you in our ranks.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Someone has to do the washing.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Now, now, Bellatrix. Let's not underestimate our young friend. By stepping forward, he lives to see another day...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I'd like to say something.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Very well, Neville. I'm sure we'd all be fascinated to hear what you have to say.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It doesn't matter that Harry is gone. A troubled MURMUR ripples through the crowd.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: This isn't over.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Potter! Harry turns. Draco's hand whips forward and -- to Harry's shock -- tosses him his wand. Ron GRINS.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well done, Malfoy!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Confringo!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: The snake! We've got to kill the snake!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Harry! Look out!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Nagini! With me!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Leave her!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I said LEAVE HER!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Nagini

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Die! Die

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Why do you live!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Because I have something worth living for.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Confringo!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Come on, granny, give us your best.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Back off, boys! She's mine!  You will never touch my chiidren again!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Be thankful we only took one. Besides...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Hermione!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes!

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I don't want you to say anything you wouldn't say if we weren't about to be killed by a giant snake! It'll just ruin it!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: You were right.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: When you told Professor Snape it was failing you. It will always fail you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It belongs to me! I killed Snape!

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Together.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What's the matter with her?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There's more to me than incense and tea leaves, Mr. Finnegan.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: I told you: it's useless to you.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Not exactly leaving the place better than we found it, are we?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Can't make an omelette without breaking a few eggs.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Something my mum used to say.

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Why didn't it work for him? The Elder wand.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Because it answers to another.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: When he killed Snape, he thought the wand would become his. But the thing is... it never belonged to Snape.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But that means...

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: It answers to me.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What do you reckon we should do with it?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: We?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Well, it wasn't boring, was it?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Together?

spellname: Launch an object up into the air
movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Don't forget to give Professor Longbottom our best.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Will there really be thestrals pulling the carriages?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: There's nothing scary about thestrals. They're gentle things. Anyway, you won't be going up to school in the carriages. You/'be going in the boats, remember?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Dad?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Yes?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: What if I'm put in Slytherin?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Albus Severus Potter. You were named after two Headmasters of Hogwarts. One of them was a Slytherin. And he was probably the bravest man I ever knew.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: But just say I am --

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Then Slytherin House will have gained a wonderful wizard. But listen, if it means so much to you, you can choose Gryffindor. The Sorting Hat takes your choice into account.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Really?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Really.

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ready?

movietitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
dialogues: Ready.
